Grand Staircase Topographical Map
Sorrows Healing Powder Supply

Daniel has mentioned that the Sorrows could use additional healing powder to supplement their existing supplies. The ingredients to make healing powder, Xander Root and Broc Flower, can be found throughout Zion. In addition, caches of healing powder may also be present at camps in the valley.
translation: 丹尼尔提到，悲恸部落可以用额外的治疗粉来增加他们的现有补给。制作治疗粉的原料有山德根和布洛克花，它们遍布锡安公园。另外在一些山谷的营帐里，你也可以找到不少储藏的治疗粉。

original: Grand Staircase Map
Year: 2077

October 28th
Five days on foot, still can't sleep. 

Outside it's like nothing happened. Sky looks wrong, that's all.

Hike back to overturned NatGuard truck near Toquerville? After blisters heal, maybe.

Looks like USGS team was researching something here in cave. Cleared out when bombs fell, left equipment behind.  Probably thought they had families to run back to.

October 29th
Char, must've said this out loud a thousand times walking here. Maybe writing it will feel more like you heard. 

You were right.

I was north of Spanish Fork. Took the 77 along Provo Bay to steer clear of town. Would've been home in an hour. Engine died, truck just stopped. So did a Chryslus in other lane. Knew right away. 

First nuke hit SLC inside a minute. I was looking South - Lucky Man! Flash behind me so bright world looked on fire. Old couple from the Chryslus starts screaming they can't see.

Didn't watch you die, Char. Saved my eyes. Counted 12 more flashes next 7 minutes. Ground shook each time, 18 seconds later. 

When nothing hit for half hour, took a look. Globe of fire where you and Alex died. Didn't kid myself. 

Didn't know what to do. Grabbed my pack and rifle. 

Saw to the old couple. Sat them up against car, let them hold and comfort each other. Told them I was going to get help, everything be okay. One bullet through both heads. Instant. 

Five day hike back to Zion. 

You told me. Stop running off to the wild. Man belongs with his family. 

You were right. You were right. You were right. You were right. Wasn't there to hold you and my boy. Died without me. Never touch you or him again.

Should shoot myself. What I deserve. 

Can't. Maybe soon.

October 31st
Black rain falling outside. Geiger jumping. Should let it kill me but bottling water from back of cave all the same.

November 2nd
Sounds dead outside, but can't look. Geiger goes lethal 15 feet from cave mouth. 

Do the math. Radiation goes down before water runs out or I never leave this cave.
translation:
10月28日
走了五天，始终无法入睡。

外面看起来很平静。天色有些不对劲，仅此而已。

返回托凯维尔附近那辆掀翻的国民卫队的货车那儿？水泡消了再考虑吧。

美国地质勘探局的队伍似乎在洞穴里研究什么东西。核弹落下的时候里面的人已被疏散，只剩下一些装备。估计他们都回到自己家人那里去了。

10月29日
夏儿。一路走来我大概已经反复念了上千次。写下来，更觉得仿佛你能听见。

你说的对。

我沿着西班牙福克的北部，普若佛湾旁的77号公路驶离城镇。本来1小时内就可以到家。可引擎熄火了，无法发动。另一条巷子里，一辆克莱斯拉同样如此。我好像明白了什么。

没到一分钟，第一枚核弹落在盐湖城。当时我正望着南方。真是好运气！背后的光芒如此明亮，整个世界就好像被点着了。克莱斯拉里出来的老夫妇放声尖叫--他们看不见东西了。

夏尔，抱歉，我没有看着你死去，只有这样我才不会被强光刺瞎。接下来的7分钟内，我又数了12次闪光，也许更多。每次都伴着地面的摇晃，中间间隔18秒。

核弹攻击停止半小时后，我看了一眼。在你和艾利克斯死去的地方，只有一团熊熊烈火。我都没法骗自己什么了。

不知道该干什么。拿起包，掏出步枪。

我照顾了这对老夫妇。帮他们靠在车旁，让他们依靠在一起，相互慰籍。我告诉他们我去寻找帮助，一切都会好起来的。随后一枪打爆了他俩的脑袋。

花了五天，徒步走回锡安。

你告诉过我。别再向往什么冒险了，每个人都应该和家人在一起。

说的对，说的对，说的对，你说的对啊。你们死的时候，我不在场，没能在那儿搂着你，搂着我的孩子。再也没有机会了。

应该毙了自己。活着，我不配。

无法下手，也许很快。

10月31号
外面下着黑色的雨，盖格计数器闪动着。本可能就这么死去。可是洞后面还有瓶装水。

11月2号
外面死般寂静。没办法出去看看。盖格计数器在离洞口15英尺远处就显示了致命程度的辐射。

算了算，如果水喝光之前辐射仍无法减弱，我就再别想离开这个山洞。

original: Year: 2078

January 1st
Happy New Year.

Two months in cave. Still lethal outside. Don't get it. In army they said 2-4 weeks cleared fallout. 

Less than a month's water left. Been mopping condensation off cave walls, wringing shirt into bottles. Trading calories for H2O. Food stocks holding. Thanks, USGS.

If there was even a chance I'd see the two of you again, I'd run outside.

January 10th
Sounded like windstorm out there for 2 days. Radiation down 500. What happened?

January 15th
Took a peek. Snow. It glows green.

January 28th
Radiation low enough I could risk short exposure outside.

More important, cave stream now drinkable if I use Rad drugs.

January 30th
There is nothing alive out there.
translation:
1月1日
新年快乐。

在山洞里过了两个月。还是出不去。无法理解。在军队里的时候他们说，辐射尘2~4周就能散去。

水只剩下一个月不到的量。开始用衣服收集壁上的凝露，拧进瓶子里。用热量换水分。食物储备还有不少。 多谢地质调查局。

哪怕有一丝一毫的机会能再见到你们俩，我也会冲出去。

1月10号
听上去，风暴好像刮了两天。辐射指数降至500以下。外面到底怎么样了？

1月15号
瞥了一眼。下雪了，泛着绿光。

1月28号
辐射程度降至足够低了。可以冒险去外面探一探。

更重要的是，洞里的溪流经辐射药处理可以饮用了。

1月30号
外面无一活物。

original: Year: 2083

May 5th
The comeback goes on. 

Add prickly pear to list of survivors with honey mesquite, and banana yucca. Odd nodules / mutations but safe to eat. Harvesting oh so careful, never take more than a fifth. Mouth waters every time I'm about to eat something that isn't from a can.

May 7th
Clouds of those stinging flies near fallen tree I call The Napper. Little flashes in the cloud. Something dragonfly-sized that zaps them midair then scoops them up. Something new. 

May 19th
Bighorn sheep! A family - ram, ewe, and little one 

Fucking Goddammit

May 20th
The sheep were different. Brawny. Ewe had curved horns just like the ram.

Seen some tiny lizards but this is first time seen animals that big. 

Fingers crossed. 5-10 years breeding, fresh meat, hides, horns. 

I know it's time to go back, Char. When winter has passed.
translation:
5月5日
事情变得越来越好了。

将刺梨、蜜牧豆和香蕉丝兰加入劫后“幸存者”的名单之中。虽然长着奇怪的结节/突变，但食用起来很安全。小心翼翼地按着不高于五分之一的比率采摘。每次吃这些非罐装的天然食品，我都会口水直流。

5月7日
大群蜇人蝇栖息在那棵倒下的树，我称其为“打盹者”，附近，闪着光。另一种蜻蜓大小的物种击败了它们，随后将它们给一锅端了。新物种。

5月19日
大角羊！公的、母的、小的一家子！

噢真他妈的该死

5月20日
这群羊有些奇怪，强壮。母羊和公羊一样有弯曲的角。

之前看到过一些小蜥蜴，但这是第一次看到这么大的动物。

乞求好运。，鲜肉啊，皮啊，角啊，什么都有。

该回去了，夏儿。冬天已经过去了。

original: Year: 2084

June 14th
Just got back. Tired. Good scrounging along the way. Ended up dragging back a cart of stuff.

Write tomorrow. Sleep.

June 15th
Departed April 10th. Walk to SLC took 15 days. Would've been 7-9 back in the old days, but had to circle pockets of radiation and foraged along way.

Don't know what I was thinking. Imagined I'd find my house, dig through rubble, find - something.  Your bones I hoped, and Little Nut's. Would've buried them. Here in Zion maybe.

SLC is mostly craters. Warped steel girders where highrises sat. Mounds of bricks.

Never found our house. Didn’t even find street. What wasn’t a crater was scorched clean. 

Want to believe it was fast, a flash, both of you vaporized. Lies to make me feel better. I'll never know. Which part of city got hit first? Northeast and you both died in a blink. Farther away and you burned alive screaming or the blast broken glass and bits of brick and wood splinters shredding you like hamburger. Look at it coward and listen don't turn away face it. If you'd been brave lucky man you would've found a spot and blown your brains out.

But not you. You took your time walking back, made a shopping trip of it. Scrounger.

The truck was still there on the 77 north of Spanish Fork. The Chryslus too, but no sign of the old couple's bones.

Outside Nephi I caught a trail. Three men, tracks heading toward Fountain Green. Thought about following but didn't. Stupid fantasy of friends, more likely cannibals.

June 20th
Took two days to build door and electrify it.

No soliciting, assholes. Home sweet fucking home.
translation:
6月14日
终于回来了。筋疲力尽。沿路好好地探查了一番，拉回来一大箱东西。

明天再写。睡了。

6月15日
4月10号出发。15天到盐湖城。以前的话7到9天就够了。如今必须避开辐射区，还得沿途找食充饥。

不知道一路都在想些什么，想象着当我回到家、在瓦砾中挖掘，试图...找到什么。希望是你的，或者小坚果的遗骨，我好埋起来。也许就埋在此地，锡安。

盐湖城一片坑坑洼洼。原先高楼林立的地方只剩下弯曲变形的钢梁，成堆的砖块。

压根找不到我们的房子，甚至连街道都找不到。那一片简直一个样：弹坑，烧得一干二净。

我试图说服自己，只是一瞬、光芒一闪，你俩便消弭于人世。谎言多少使我好受了些。反正我永远也没法知道，核弹究竟最先在什么地方落下。如果是东北部，你们俩眨眼间便死去；更远些的话，你们不是尖叫着被活活烧死，便是被碎玻璃、破砖片和尖木屑搅碎身体，像牛肉糜一样。噢胆小鬼，你竟拒绝面对这一切。你要是勇敢些，就应该一枪打爆自己的脑袋！

但你不是。你悠然而归，收获满满。像个捡破烂的。

西班牙福克以北的77号公路上，那卡车还那辆克莱斯拉停在一起。但那对老夫妇的尸骨却没了踪影。

在尼法县外发现了有人活动的迹象：三个人，朝方廷格林方向去了。本想跟踪，但放弃了。不大可能是朋友，那不过是天真的一厢情愿。食人族的可能性倒还更高。

6月20日
花了两天，弄了扇门，然后通上电。

混蛋们，这里闭门谢客。家，甜蜜的该死的家，

original: Year: 2095

September 20th
I count 28 of them. 11 adult males, 8 females, 9 children aged 2 - 10. Some rifles and pistols in bad repair. Old world clothes, ratty. 

September 22nd
Got close enough last night to hear them talk. Spanish, I think. From Mexico?

Heard them say "paradeeso" a bunch. Think that means paradise. Here to stay, then. 

Seem harmless. SEEM.

October 5th
The one I call "Maria" is pregnant. Think the father is "Jose" but she spends a lot of time with "Pablo" too.

October 7th
"Pedro" ran out to pee in the stream and would've seen me if he looked to his left. Too close. Need to give them space.

November 10th
"Jose" broke his leg chasing a bighorn. Too far from camp for them to hear. Told myself to leave it be but couldn't. 300 yards from their camp did my best Jose screaming imitation until a bunch of them came looking, then strung them along to the crest where they could hear the real Jose. 

Probably useless. Compound fracture, broke the skin.

November 11th
"Infec-shee-own." So many goddamn words nearly the same, think I'd be fluent. But anyway Jose's leg has got it so he's going to die. Nature for you. Of course they're giving prayer a try.

November 12th
Left bottle of antibiotics on a rock outside their camp last night. They thanked God (Dee-os) of course. As though that asshole saw fit to burn the world but still cared enough to leave some medicine on a rock. 

November 15th
Jose will always limp but otherwise he'll be okay. Good deed for the month.

Will they make it through the winter?
translation:
9月20日
28个人，成人有11男8女，9个小孩，年龄在2到10岁左右。有步枪和手枪，保养很差。穿着旧世界的衣服，破破烂烂的。

9月22日
昨晚接近了他们，听了他们的对话。西班牙语，大概吧。是从墨西哥来的？

听到他们反复嘀咕着“踢糖”什么的。可能是“天堂”的意思。大概是想定居下来吧。

看上去无害，看上去而已。

10月5日
被我唤作“玛丽亚”的女性怀孕了。我认为父亲是“何塞”，只是她也经常和“巴勃罗”做伴。

10月7日
“佩德罗”跑到小溪撒尿。如果他看看他的左侧就能发现我了。太近了，得给他们留点私人空间。

11月10日
“何塞”在追逐大角羊的时候弄断了腿。营地太远，人们听不见他的呼救声。我告诉自己别插手，结果最后还是没忍住。在距离营地300码的地方，尽我所能地开始了“何塞尖叫模仿秀”，有几个人终于注意到了，我沿路引他们来到一处山顶。在那里就能听见真正何塞的声音了。

也许尽是徒劳。复合性骨折，骨头都出来了。

11月11日
“干染。”这些鸟语，这么多词都他妈一样，我想我应该也能说得很流利。总而言之，何塞的腿已经没救了，说不定还会要了小命。你真是天性善良啊，他们无能为力，于是只好寄希望于祈祷了。

11月12日
昨晚，把一瓶抗生素放在了他们营地外面。他们把感谢都留给了上帝（Dee-os）。噢，就好像那个混蛋想烧了世界却还会在石头上留下些药。

11月15日
何塞永远的瘸了，除此以外并无大碍。本月的好事一桩。

他们能撑过这个冬天吗?

original: Year: 2096

February 11th
Fuckers killed all the men. I think they would've taken the women alive but Maria and Selena opened fire and some of the others went for their guns so they shot them down and some of the kids with them. 

If I could've warned them.

February 12th
Elena and Carmen and 5 children still alive, being kept in a pen. 

There are more than 100 of these assholes in blue suits. Every suit says "22" on the back. Why? Armed to the teeth with submachine guns, pistols. Estimate 60% male. Everyone seems to follow the dark-haired guy but can't get close enough to tell. Assholes are disciplined - patrols, sentries - they mean business. 

Say I go in at night and get the women and children out. Where to next? 

But I have to get them out. Have to.

February 13th
Recon during night. Well-organized, sentries along most approaches, but stream not covered.

Are they sick? Lots of coughing fits. Tuberculosis?

Women and children still in pen. Will try to infiltrate by stream tomorrow night.

February 14th
They ate them. 

February 19th
Ambush along riverside trail. 6 males killed. Heard their coughing a mile away.

Used their grenades to booby-trap bodies, kept half. Secured 6 SMGs, 500 rounds 10mm, 6 frags. 

February 20th
Ambush along riverside trail. 2 males died checking bodies. Killed 2 more with rifle. Shot 1 through calf and let asshole crawl off to spread message. Coughed like I'd shot him through lungs.

February 23rd
Ambush half-mile east of coal pits wash. 8 males killed.
translation:
2月11日
一帮该死的畜生把所有人都杀了。本以为他们会活捉那些女人，但是玛丽亚和瑟琳娜朝他们开了火，其他人也拿起了枪。于是他们把这些人、甚至还有几个孩子一并射杀了。

要是我能够事先警告他们...

2月12日
伊莲娜、卡门以及五个孩子还活着，被关在一个围栏里。

超过100个穿着蓝衣服的混蛋，背后统统标着“22”。这是为什么？全副武装，冲锋枪、手枪。约摸60%是男性，带头的好像是是一个黑头发的，但是无法靠近仔细观察。这帮杂种训练有素：有巡逻队伍，侦查队伍。他们有备而来。

我打算晚上潜入，把女人和小孩救出来。接下来去哪里?

不管怎样，先把他们救出来再说。必须的。

2月13日
晚上有交替守夜。精心安排的巡逻队覆盖了绝大多数接近的路。唯那条溪流是例外。

他们病了么？很多人都不停地咳嗽，难道是肺结核？

女人小孩还在围栏里。明天晚上试试从溪流处渗透。

2月14日
他们吃了他们。

2月19日
在河边的小路上设伏。杀死6名男性。在一里外就能听见他们的咳嗽声。

一半手雷用来设置尸体陷阱，一半留在自己身上。收获6把冲锋枪，500发10mm子弹，6枚破片手雷。

2月20日
在河边的小路上设伏。2名男性检查尸体时被杀，步枪射杀另外两个，还有一个畜生被射穿了腿肚子。我让他爬着离开，好回去带个信。他咳得像是我射穿了他的肺。

2月23日
在煤矿洼地以东半里处设伏。杀死8名男性。

original: Year: 2096 (II)

February 28th 
Ambush in the narrows. 6 males killed. Took a 10mm through thigh, steel jacket, missed femoral. Lucky. Used tourniquet to make sure no blood spattered on rocks back to cave. Have set traps all along entrance passage but if they find me it will be matter of time. Still, 24 confirmed kills in 10 days = at least 1/3rd their combat force, not bad for an old man. 

March 2nd 
Lucky lucky lucky lucky. Patrol was small - 3 men. Screaming woke me - point man caught under deadfall. Panic fire ricocheted into the cave, almost hit me. Crawled forward and killed them all with SMGs. Nearly used frags, stupid, finger in pin when remembered ricochets. 

Leaving at once. No other patrols in area but they'll be searching narrows for these 3. Taking as much food as I can drag with me and heading to cave south.
translation:
2月28日
埋伏在狭路。杀死6名男性。被一发10mm口径、全金属批覆弹击中了大腿，幸好没射中股神经。用止血带止血 ，确保没有溅沿路的石头上。在入口布满陷阱，即便如此，一旦他们发现了要解决我只是时间问题。不管 怎么说，10天内24个确认击杀，相当于他们三分之一的战斗力量。这对于一个老人来说还不坏。

3月2号
幸运，太幸运了。巡逻队伍规模很小，只有三个人。一阵尖叫惊醒了我，先头侦察兵踩到了死亡陷阱。他们惊慌失措地开火，我差点就被流弹打中。匍匐前进，用冲锋枪射杀了他们。差点就使上了破片手雷，愚蠢，还好在拉开引信的时候想起了跳弹的问题。

得马上离开。这片区域虽然没有别的巡逻队伍，但是他们会在这片峡口搜索这三个人。尽可能地把能带的食物都带上，随后朝南方的洞穴出发。

original: Year: 2097

January 13th 
The Coughers are gone finally. All 34 that still lived. Ate their dead for strength, then struck out SE. 

Victory. 10 months of killing. All I feel is cold.  

They deserved every goddamn bit of it.

January 17th 
Thought I was dreaming but the screams were real. For a moment thought they'd tricked me, just pretended to leave Zion, then sent a patrol to track me down. But the screams were a woman's. 

Edged around corner in passageway to have a look. One Vaulter, ankle deep in bear trap. Leveled my SMG but the way she was crying stopped me. 

How she screamed when she saw me. Been their boogey man a long time. 

Name's Sylvie. Claims she ran away from them. Calls them evil people, "children of the devil." Turns out they were sick after all, something they caught in a Vault they lived in. She never came down with it (yet).

So help me, I've wound up being her nurse.

January 18th
Her story matches what I learned from my "interrogations" last year, but according to her - let's just say it was bad to be a woman in that group. So when they left, she slipped away. 

She knows next to nothing about living outside a Vault. Says she wants to learn.
translation:
1月13日
病痨们终于离开了。活着的只有34个，吃了他们的尸体来补充体力，然后继续朝东南前进。

赢了，十个月的杀戮。心中一片冰冷。

他们罪有应得。

1月17日
本以为我在做梦，可那尖叫是真的。一度以为被他们算计了：假装离开锡安，然后派一个小队来干掉我。结果那只是一个女人的尖叫。

扒着通道拐角处的墙壁看了看。一个避难所的人，脚踝被捕熊夹深深地抓住了。端平了冲锋枪 ，但她哭泣的样子使我无法下手。

她一看到我就尖叫起来，我当他们的魔鬼已经很久了。

她叫西尔维，自称从他们当中逃离，说他们是邪恶的人，“魔鬼之子”。据说他们生了病，住在自己的避难所里染上的病。她从没患过此病（目前为止）。

噢帮帮我吧，我竟成了她的护理。

1月18日
她的故事跟我去年在“审讯”中得到的情报吻合。但她说...好吧，长话短说，在这群人中间，做个女人不太好。所以当他们离开的时候，她溜了。

她说她对于避难所以外的生活几乎一无所知。她说她想学习。

original: Year: 2100

September 9th
Never been so scared in my life. 

Canada wasn't scary, just sickening, the criminality of it. 

The end of the world wasn't scary. When I knew you and Alex were dead, I didn't have anything left to be scared about. I just went on for some reason. 

I wasn’t scared fighting the Vaulters. It was like I kept daring them to finish me. When I killed them, I think it was the closest I came to feeling happy in years. 

Sylvie is pregnant. And I am terrified.

Ridiculous old man. A father again at 47. In this world?

She's so excited and so - trusting. Says it's God's will that we have this child. Like nothing can go wrong.

You see, Char, she doesn’t know about you and Alex. Never told her. Almost did sometimes but what you and I had, it seemed wrong to share it. 

More like an old man not wanting his young wife to know how he failed the one who come before her.

Hiking into Toquerville for medical books and supplies. This will be done right.

I'm sorry, Char. Hope you can forgive me.
translation:
9月9日
一生中还从没这么害怕过。

加拿大并不可怕，只是对于它的犯罪感到厌恶。

世界的末日也没什么可怕，当我知道你和亚历克斯死了，我也没什么好怕的了。只是出于某些原因，我还得继续活下去。

与避难所里出来的家伙们战斗并不可怕，更像是我在逼着他们来结果我。而当我杀掉他们的时候，那更是这几年来我离“幸福”最接近的时刻。

西尔维怀孕了，我害怕了。

可笑的老男人，47岁的时候，在这样一个世界里，再次当上了父亲。

她对此异常兴奋，对未来充满着向往。她说我们生下这个孩子是上帝的旨意，那口气就像是相信一切都会顺利。

夏儿，你知道，她并不了解你和亚历克斯的事。我从没告诉过她。有那么几次，我差点就说了。但我似乎并不该同她分享，分享你我之间的往事。

更像是一个老头不想让他年轻的妻子知道他辜负了前任。

徒步进入托凯维尔，寻找医学书籍和补给。这次不会有错了。

夏儿，对不起，但愿你能原谅我。

original: Year: 2101

March 5th
Baby was breech. Would've been a son. Michael.

Did my best to turn him. Failed. Must've done Caesarean too late. Had to put Sylvie out and she never woke up. 

Buried them south of the narrows. 

Well. This time I was by their side. So much better. 

I think I can finally do it. Blow my fucking brains out all over this goddamn cave.
translation:
3月5日
胎位不正。应该是个男孩，迈克尔。

我尽力想把他正过来，可失败了。一定是破宫太晚。我想救下西尔维，可她再也没能醒过来。

把母子俩埋在了狭路南边。

嗯。至少这一次，我在他们的身边。好多了。

我想我终于能下手了，在这个天杀的洞穴里打爆我该死的脑袋。

original: Year: 2108

August 22nd
10 sets of tracks 1/2 mile NE of canyon entrance. Barefoot???

August 23rd
Saw them through scope. Corpses walking around.  Finally gone crazy. Dementia maybe.

August 24th
I'm not crazy, they're real. Goddammit they are real. 

Rushed me the moment they saw me, snarling like animals. They look like corpses but don't smell rotted. 

I'll be putting them out of their misery. Doing for them what I never could for myself. 

September 3rd
The last of them. All gone.
translation:
8月22日
山谷入口东南方1/2英里处发现10对脚印。赤脚？？？

8月23日
在瞄准镜里看到了他们，尸体在四处走动。我终于疯了，也许是老年痴呆。
8月24日
我没疯。他们是真的。该死，他们是真的。

他们一看到我就冲过来，像野兽一样咆哮。他们看起来就像尸体一样，却没有腐烂的味道。

我会帮助他们从痛苦中解脱出来，这是我永远无法对自己做的。

9月3日
最后一个了，都死了。

original: Year: 2113

February 5th
Happy birthday to me, happy birthday to me, happy birthday you useless old dinosaur, happy birthday to me. 

Happy 60th. What do you get a man who has everything?

A bottle of whiskey and a 12 gauge slug through the roof of the mouth! Whoo! 

Come now. What do I have to do to prove to myself that I've lived long enough? 

I'm a shriveled old man. White beard. Seen enough sunrises and sunsets. Saw the big sunset, been hanging on through the long night 36 years now. Ridiculous. 

Not kidding myself into thinking there's anything on the other side of this. Fine. Things weren't so bad before I was born. 

Char and Alex. Sylvie and Michael-who-could've-been. 

Thoughts of the beloved dead before dying. 

Goodbye, Zion. 

February 6th
Fucking didn't do it, coward as usual. Maybe two bottles next year.
translation:
2月5号
祝我生日快乐，祝我生日快乐，生日快乐，没用的老顽固，祝我生日快乐。

60大寿快乐。给这个啥都不缺的家伙准备了什么礼物？

一瓶威士忌，外加一颗从嘴里射出来的12号霰弹！哇哦！

来吧，都活了这么久了，还图什么呢？

我已经是个干瘪的老头了，胡子全白。看够了日出日落，见证了别样的“夕阳”，熬过了36年的漫漫长夜，可笑啊。

我不想自欺欺人，觉得事情还有什么好的一面。好吧，至少在我出生以前可能确实有过吧。

夏儿和亚历克斯，西尔维和迈克尔...本该是谁？

临死之际，念及挚爱之往者。

永别了，锡安。

2月6日
真该死，又没下去手，还是那么懦弱。也许明年得来上两瓶。

original: Year: 2123

April 25th 
24 of them, half boys, half girls. Youngest is 8 maybe, oldest 13-14. Dirty and scrawny, been on foot a long time. Children's crusade. 

Struck camp on nearly the same spot as los mexicanos. 30 years and a lifetime ago. 

I've spent 2 nights listening to them. English. Literate. One of them reads stories while the little ones fall asleep. 

They escaped someplace they call "The School" but can't figure out where it was. When they want a little one to behave they tell him to stop or "The Principal will get you." 

Principal better not show up or I'll blow his goddamn head off. I can still shoot straight.
translation:
4月25日 
他们一共有24个，一半男孩一半女孩。最小的大概8岁，最大的13、4岁。脏兮兮的，都很瘦，走了很久才来到这里。儿童十字军吗。

跟当初那群墨西哥人扎营的地方一模一样。只有30年，可却恍若隔世了。

我花了两个晚上偷听他们谈话。他们讲英语，受过教育。其中有个人在其他孩子入睡的时候读一些故事。

他们从一个叫“学校”的地方逃出来，但我不知道具体位置。在那里。每当他们吓唬小孩子的时候，他们就说：停下，否则“校长会给你好看”。

最好别让我看见校长这家伙，不然我打爆他的脑袋。保证准度不减当年。

original: Year: 2124

January 2nd 
I've been leaving notes for them, and gifts. 

They like the books. Started with stories but moved on to weapons manuals, medical books, practical stuff. 

In the notes, well it's embarrassing, almost like those cards people used to give to each other, everything sweet and loving. I tell them to read and to learn and to make the most of their new home. I tell them that I'm giving them Zion as a gift to make up for all the sorrows of their lives so far and all the sorrows man has visited on man. I tell them to be kind to each other and modest. I tell them never to hurt each other but that if someone else comes along and tries to hurt them to strike back with righteous anger. Stuff like that. I sign every note "The Father," because well, just because. 

January 18th
Have I mentioned that I'm dying? 

Mind's still sharp. Lungs are the problem. Might be cancer. Cough's been getting worse for months, finally there's blood in it. Getting harder to visit my little friends, breath's so short. 

I've given away most of what I own. They'll find the rest in the caves when they get a little older.

I don't want them to find me though. “The Father" is a broke-down old man? Disappointment.

It's time. I don't want another birthday.

January 23rd 
It's cold enough that I won't last long on the high mound up next to Red Gate. I think I've got enough breath left in me to make it. I'll just lie down and stare at the sky. Feels right.

I hope they'll do well. I hope no harm comes to them, from within or without. Did my best to prepare them with the last few notes. Said something kind about each one of them, what makes each one special. Told them The Father was pleased by their kind natures and that it would be up to them to handle things on their own from now on, that I'd be silent but still watching and still caring. 

Lying, then. Oh yes.

Lied to you, Char. And Alex.  And Sylvie. Told you I'd be with you forever. But I wouldn't go back and unsay it once if I could. 

What was the point of it all? So many failures. 

But I never forgot your face. Or Little Nut's. Or (sorry) Sylvie's. They used to say that happened after a while but it never did for me. 

Maybe the only point of all this living was to keep those pictures in my head going for as long as I could. It was the only life I could give you. Not a day went by without.

It wasn't choice. I chose to die again and again. Just never did. Body had its own drive.

Well, the little ones will need it. Species will need it if it's to continue. That blind drive onward. 

I wish them well. It's been a gift to me, at the end of it all, to behold innocence. 

Goodbye, Zion. 

Randall Dean Clark
Feb 5th, 2053 - Jan 2124
translation:
1月2日
我给他们留了纸条和礼物。

他们喜欢这些书。一开始是故事书，后来是武器手册、医学书籍一类的实用书。

关于那些纸条，说起来真有些尴尬，就像是人们用来表达爱意的那种卡片。我告诉他们，读书、学习，要充分利用他们的新家。我告诉他们，我把要锡安赠当作礼物赠予他们，以补偿他们生命中的所有悲恸，补偿人们相互之间业已造成的悲恸。我告诉他们，要善待彼此，谦虚待人。我告诉他们，永远不要伤害彼此，但是，若有人不怀好意，则必以正义之怒回击之。大致如此。每张纸条我都会署上“父亲” 。因为...事实嘛。

1月18日
我说过我快要死了么？

思路还算清晰。关键是肺，可能是癌症吧。咳嗽一天比一天严重，最后都咳出了血。呼吸越来越困难，很难再去见看望我的小朋友了。

我基本上已经把自己的东西全部给了他们。等他们长大一点，就能在洞里找到剩下的。

我不想让他们找到我。“父亲”只是个精神崩溃的老头？多令人失望啊。

时候到了，我大概活不到下一个生日了。

1月23日
天很冷，我现在在红门旁边的土堆上待着，估计撑不了多久了。我也就剩这么一口气了...躺下来，看看蓝天白云。感觉不错。

我希望他们能好好活下去。我希望他们不会受到任何伤害，无论是来自内部还是外部。我尽了最大的努力准备了最后几个笔记，我对他们中的每一个人都说了些好话，说了每个人的特别之处。我告诉他们，“父亲”很高兴他们有善良的本性。我告诉他们，从今以后，他们要自己面对未来的一切。我告诉他们，我将会保持沉默，但我会一直注视着他们，关心他们。

这就是骗人吧，哦，是的。

我骗了你，夏儿，还有亚历克斯，还有西尔维，我说过我会永远和你在一起。但如果可以回到过去的话，我不会收回这些话的。

到头来，一切又有什么意义呢。太多的失败了。

但我从未忘记你的脸，还有小坚果的。哦，抱歉，还有西尔维的。有人说记忆会随着时间慢慢被冲淡，但对我来说绝对不会忘记的。

或许，我活着的唯一意义就是让过去的场景在脑中一幕幕回放。我只能通过这种方法才能和你们“生活”在一起了，没有一天不是如此。

这不是选择，我一次又一次选择死亡，可一次也没能成功。身体自有其意志吧。

大概，那些小朋友们会需要，物种的延续会需要，这种盲目的，却又一往无前的意志。

我祝他们一切顺利。对我来说，这是一份礼物，让我在人生的终点，得以窥见真正的纯真。

再见了，锡安。


- 兰德尔·迪恩·克拉克

2053年2月5日- 2124年1月

original: BEWARE - A VENGEFUL SPIRIT STALKS THESE CANYONS
translation: 注意 - 一个复仇的灵魂在这片峡谷徘徊

original:
If you are reading this message then do yourself a favor and turn and run straight out of this canyon. 

For near 11 months my people have been engaged in daily battle with an evil spirit of this place. Arriving February of last year with a party 118 strong, we were attacked by primitives and forced to defend ourselves. Whereupon something began killing us in wide numbers. We have done our absolute best to find and kill this thing, thinking it was a man because it uses our firearms against us and traps of all kinds. But no man could defy our efforts as this thing has. It is more evil than any man could be.

We have been reduced to just 34 of our number. We have lost six overseers before me. Some have perished from the sickness in their lungs we carried out of the  Vault, but that number is small next to the count of friends this thing has murdered. 

Now that I am finally made overseer, we are leaving straight away and will not return. If you have come to this seeming paradise seeking the fresh water, abundant game, and shelter you suppose you will find here, do not be deceived. You will find only death here. Leave at once and put miles between you and this place.

May God have mercy on us all,

J. Hendricks
Overseer
V22 Expedition
translation:
如果你读到这条消息，那么帮自己一个忙，赶快转身跑出这个峡谷。

近11个月以来，我们的人每天都在和一个看不见的恶魔战斗。去年2月，我们带着118人的队伍抵达，遭到野蛮人的袭击，被迫自卫。于是有什么东西开始大量地杀害我们。我们觉得他可能是个人，因为他用人类的武器对付我们，而且会布置大量陷阱。我们竭尽全力寻找他，试图干掉他，但始终徒劳无功。相信这个世界上没有人比他更邪恶了。

我们现在只剩下34人了。在我之前，我们已经失去了6位监督。有些人死于我们从避难所带出来的肺部疾病，但这个数字和被这东西杀害的朋友相比是微不足道的。

我现在终于成了监督，我们准备离开这个鬼地方，再也不回来。如果你来到这个看似天堂的地方，是为了寻找淡水、丰富的猎物和你认为你能在这里找到的庇护所，不要被欺骗了。你在这里只会找到死亡。马上离开，远离这个地方。

愿上帝保佑我们，

- J. 亨德里克斯
监督
22号避难所探险队

original: Re: Shipping Error

Hi Mandy,

This is Horace Applebaum out at the Zion General Store. I placed an order three weeks ago for the De-Luxe Mountain Man All-In-One Survival Kits - you know, the ones that come with a compass, a pair of walkie-talkies, and a full first aid kit?

I'm writing to you because, as of today (06/15/2057), I still haven't received the shipment. I'm fresh out of the kits here, and with the summer tourist season picking up I really need the new ones ASAP.

Thanks,
Horace
translation:
你好，曼蒂,

我是锡安百货店的霍勒斯.阿普勒鲍姆。我3个星期前预定了豪华登山超人大礼包，你知道吧，里面有一个指南针，一对对讲机，还有一套急救包。

我之所以给你写这封信，是因为截至今天(2057年6月15日)，我还没有收到任何包裹。我这里的装备都用完了，随着夏季旅游旺季的到来，我真的需要尽快买新的。

谢谢，
- 霍勒斯

original: Re: Shipping Problems (AGAIN!)

Mandy,

Who the hell is running this shipping company? I've just received three crates of Dinky the Dinosaur(TM) Officially-Licensed Dino-Action Dolls! These things were supposed to go to some tourist trap in Nevada, how the hell did they get here?

Mandy, what the hell can I do with this stuff? Maybe if we file off the Dinky trademarking we can turn them around as kiddie souvenirs and make a few bucks, but I'm still looking at a major loss here.

Whatever's going on in your shipping department, take care of it, or I'll find somebody else to handle my orders, I swear to God.

Yours,
Horace

PS - I still haven't received that order of survival gear I requested last month. You know, things I can actually sell to people?
translation:
曼蒂,

你这个运输公司到底怎么回事？我刚刚收到了3箱大恐龙官方玩具！这不是应该要送到内华达某个旅游景点去的东西吗，怎么跑这来了？

曼蒂，你让我怎么处理这些玩意？我倒是可以把这些恐龙卖给小孩赚点钱，可我还是亏大了。

你们的运输部门到底怎么搞的？好好管管，不然我再也不在你们家下订单了，我发誓。

此致，
贺拉斯

PS - 我上个月定的登山装备到现在还没收到。你让我怎么做买卖？

original: Re: Bus Tour?

Dear Scoutmaster Mitchum,

Thanks for following up! You'll be happy to know that the Li'l Scout Lunchboxes you ordered have arrived. You can pick them up from the General Store when you arrive in Zion. The General Store is open Monday through Saturday, 7 am till nightfall. We look forward to seeing you and your scouts on Independence Day!

All the best,
Horace Applebaum
translation:
亲爱的童子军团长米切姆,

感谢您的持续关注！我们高兴地通知您，您预定的“里尔”童子军午餐盒已经送达。等您到了锡安公园，可以来我们的杂货店领取。杂货店营业时间为早7点到日落，周日休息。我们衷心期待能在独立日与你和你的童子军们如期相见！

祝您一切顺利,
- 霍勒斯.阿普勒鲍姆

original: Spear Projectile
Green Gecko Spit
Eastern Virgin
The Narrows
The Three Marys
GREETING
You friend of Sorrows, yes? Together we smash White Legs that defile holy places, yes?
translation: 你是悲恸部落的朋友？让我们一起击溃玷污圣地的白腿部落，怎么样？

original: Outman! {Burned Man}{COO-nah man}Kuna-man mad! He kill all White Legs! You talk! You stop!
translation: 外来者！{Burned Man}{COO-nah man}火烧人疯了！他杀了所有白腿部落的人！你说！你站住！

original: Foolish outman - You best White Legs, you think? By my spear you die!
translation: 愚蠢的外来者。你以为可以击败白腿部落的人？在我的长矛下，你只有死！

original: Visions guide you. You listen? Heh. Maybe yes, maybe no.
translation: 神示指引着你，你听到了吗？呵呵，或许是，或许不是。

original: {HOE-lah}Hola, outsider. Welcome, child of omens. You come to receive visions of truth?
translation: {HOE-lah}你好，外来者。欢迎你，预兆之子。你想来接受“真理神示”？

original: You have root of Sacred Datura?
translation: 你拿到神圣曼陀罗了吗？

original: These roots make sacred vision tea. You drink, you see path before you. Ready?
translation: 这些根用来制作“真理神示”茶。把它喝了，你就能看见前方的路。准备好了么？

original: Does Ghost of She lie quiet in grave?
translation: “她的幽灵”是否安息在坟墓里？

original: Daniel said that I was to travel with you until you have completed your scouting. Is this pleasing to you?
translation: 丹尼尔说，一旦等你执行完侦察任务，我就可以与你同行。听我这么说你高不高兴？

original: Have you reconsidered allowing me to travel with you?
translation: 你能不能重新考虑一下让我与你一起同行？

original: You are the one Joshua Graham sent to us. Blessings of the Father in the Cave on you - Daniel is waiting for you.
translation: 你就是约书亚·格拉汉姆派来的那个，愿先父保佑你。丹尼尔正在等你。

original: Greetings and blessings to you. Daniel still awaits you.
translation: 你好，祝福你。丹尼尔在等你。

original: {I sense you.}{KAH-too Bee-oo.}Katu Veo. Blessings of the Father in the Cave on you.
translation: {I sense you.}{KAH-too Bee-oo.}我能感觉得到你。愿先父保佑你。

original: {I sense you.}{KAH-too Bee-oo.}Katu Veo.
translation: {I sense you.}{KAH-too Bee-oo.}我能感觉得到你。

original: We go. White Legs go back to Great Salt.
translation: 我们走。白腿部落会回到大盐湖。

original: Unless you and Joshua have any objections, I'd like to start evacuating the Sorrows. I'm going to need your help, so say your piece.
translation: 除非你和约书亚有任何反对意见，否则我要开始带着悲恸部落撤离了。我将会需要你的帮助，你有什么话想说就说吧。

original: {At Pine Creek Tunnel, first time}Please, have you done everything you can for the Sorrows? Are they all accounted for?!
translation: 拜托，你已经为悲恸部落做了你能做的一切了吗？你有没有为他们尽职尽责？

original: Hoi! White Legs don't leave survivors often. You're some kind of lucky, let me tell you.
translation: 嚯！白腿部落通常不会留下任何幸存者。我得跟你说，你很幸运。

original: You came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 你来自外面的世界，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Hoi! What you doing? There's still White Legs back there!
translation: 嚯！你在干什么？白腿部落的人还在后面！

original: Wait - you came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 等等...你是从外面来的，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: {Hello}Yah ah tahg! I saw you at the southern passage - you... um... you do know there were still White Legs alive when you ran off, right?
translation: 你好！我之前在南部通道那儿看见你了。你...你该知道当你跑掉时那里还有很多白腿部落的人，对吧？

original: Joshua says you need someone to guide you around the valley. He said I should go with you, if you want.
translation: 约书亚说，你需要一个人帮你做这个山谷的向导。他说我可以胜任，如果你同意的话。

original: Change your mind about bringing me along?
translation: 你改变主意了？不想带我一起走了？

original: Good job getting those supplies to Daniel. If you were a Dead Horse, you'd get a tattoo for that.
translation: 干得好，那些补给品太有用了。如果你是死马部落的人，你一定会被赐予一个纹身，标记你的贡献。

original: You again? Talk to Joshua yet?
translation: 又是你？还没和约书亚交谈？

original: What can I tell you?
Come on, come on, no time to waste!
translation: 快点，快点，没时间浪费了！

original: Howdy, friend. Heard my little broadcast, did you? Yeah, you look the type.
translation: 你好，朋友。听到我的小广播了？哈，你看起来正是我要找的类型。

original: Howdy, friend. Heard my little broadcast, did you? Yeah, you look the type.
translation: 你好，朋友。听到我的小广播了？哈，你看起来正是我要找的类型。

original: Damn good thing you came along. Now that Ricky's skedaddled, yours is the only Pip-Boy we got.
translation: 你能跟我们来真他妈的太棒了。鉴于那个里基跑了，我们现在只有你一个人有哔哔小子了。

original: Are you here to jaw at me a while longer, or are we ready to get this show on the road?
translation: 你是在这继续跟我唠叨呢，还是我们把这场戏延续到路上呢？

original: We smash White Legs now, yes?
translation: 我们现在要痛击白腿部落，是不是？

original: Well, here we part ways. I'm needed back at the Dead Horses camp - maybe I'll see you there sometime.
translation: 好了，我们在这儿要分开了。我须要回到死马部落营地了。或许晚些我们有机会再见面。

original: This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
translation: 我们浪费太多时间了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: The time for talk has passed. The Lord's work must be done.
translation: 聊天的时间已经过去了，上帝的工作必须完成。

original: {a bit frantic}Daniel must have made it to the tunnel by now, but there are Sorrows all over the valley! We have to help them and get Daniel out of here!
translation: 丹尼尔一定已经抵达隧道了，但在这山谷里悲恸部落的人到处都是！我们需要帮助他们尽快离开这里！

original: We should have given you a better welcome on your first visit to Zion, but from what I hear, the White Legs beat us to it.
translation: 我们本应该热烈欢迎你第一次光临锡安，但可惜的是，白腿部落抢先了一步。

original: White Legs seem to be the only visitors we have these days, and I wouldn't have expected anyone from the Mojave to come looking for us.
translation: 白腿部落似乎是近一段时间内我们唯一的访客，我也没想到还会有人从莫哈维来这个地方找我们。

original: And you're a courier, no less. Not the one I was expecting, but I suppose he wouldn't have come with a caravan.
translation: 而你还是个邮差。不是我期待的那个人，但我想他也不会带着一整支商队来的。

original: I don't know if you were close to the other members of your group, but you have my sympathy.
translation: 我不知道你和商队里其他成员关系怎么样，但我还是要对你表示同情。

original: I pray for the safety of all good people who come to Zion, even Gentiles, but we can't expect God to do all the work.
translation: 我为每一位来到锡安的善良平民祈祷他们一切平安，即使他们是异教徒我也不会区别对待。但我们不能指望上帝做所有的工作。

original: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎你回来。我能为你做什么？

original: {Male PC}You looking for trouble, bud? I got plenty to spare, so watch your ass around me.
translation: {Male PC}你是来找麻烦的吗，伙计？我时间多着呢，你想要我随时奉陪。

original: You looking to join this here caravan? Look a little wet behind the ears, you ask me.
translation: 就你还想加入这个商队？要我看，你还嫩着呢。

original: {Female PC}{lecherous}Hey, little lady. Don't be scared to join this caravan! I'll keep a close eye on you - real close. Promises.
translation: {Female PC}{lecherous}嘿，小妞。想加入我们商队吗？别再犹豫了！有什么好害怕的？我会密切关注你的...非常密切，哈哈。我发誓。

original: {impatient}Yeah? What's it this time?
{the player ruined everything for you}Fuck off, okay? I hate you!
translation: {the player ruined everything for you}滚开好吗？我讨厌你！

original: I may have been exaggerating a little. Truth is, I got this suit and the Pit-Boy off a dead prospector who came out from Zion.
translation: 我说得或许有点太夸张了。事实真相就是，这件外套和哔哔小子是我从一个早就死了的从锡安来的探险者身上扒下来的。

original: Guy was dead when I found him, okay? Had a ton of shit on him. That's how I know there's good loot in Zion, see?
translation: 等我发现那家伙的时候他已经死了，好吗？他身上装满了各种废物垃圾。这也就是为什么我知道锡安有很多好东西，你明白了吧？

original: {don't bother me}Fuck off, I'm busy!
Looking to join this caravan, huh? Look to me like you can handle yourself.
translation: 想加入这支商队？看起来你自己可以搞定。

original: Something on your mind?
{terse}Leave me be. Busy.
Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎你回来。我能帮你做什么？

original: {FIRST, BUNKER, BENNY FLED}I do wish you'd come and met with me at the Lucky 38 when you first arrived on the Strip. Or after Benny fled, even.
translation: {FIRST，BUNKER，BENNY FLED}你第一次到长街的时候，我本希望你能来幸运38和我碰面。即便是本尼逃走了以后也一样。

original: {"Good (day)".}Goot.
{Hello}Yah ah tahg.
{Hi!}Hoi!
{At Pine Creek tunnel, return}Please, is it time? Is everyone safe? We {emph}have to go!
translation: {At Pine Creek tunnel, return}拜托，时间到了吗？所有的人都安全抵达了吗？我们必须出发了！

original: Uh... I apologize if this comes across as a less-than-cordial welcome, but how did you get in here? You from the Mojave?
translation: 呃...很抱歉，礼数可能不周，但你是怎么来的？你来自莫哈维？

original: Do me a favor and go to talk to Joshua, all right?
translation: 请帮我个忙，去跟约书亚谈谈，好吗？

original: The Dead Horses told me details about the attack on your caravan. A stranger's sympathy might not count for much, but for what it's worth, I'm sorry.
translation: 死马部落已经把你的商队遭到袭击的事情告诉我了。尽管一个来自陌生人的同情可能没什么价值，但我觉得多少还是需要表示一下。我为你感到抱歉。

original: The Sorrows will mourn your friends, too. They mourn everyone, even the White Legs. They have sensitive souls. Innocent, if there is such a thing.
translation: 悲恸部落也会缅怀你的朋友们。他们会缅怀任何人，也包括白腿部落。他们的灵魂很敏感，容易受到伤害。如果用一个词来形容的话，那就是既天真又纯洁。

original: In spite of what's happened, I hope that Joshua and I can help you out of here. But to be frank, we need your help, too.
translation: 不论发生了什么，我希望我和约书亚能尽快帮你离开这里。但真诚地讲，我们也需要你的帮助。

original: I'm glad to see you're still with us. How can I help you?
translation: 很高兴看到你还和我们在一起。我能帮你做什么？

original: {Hello, outsider}{oh-LAH-doo, Sah-GAH-see}Holadu, Tsagasee.
{Hello, person}{oh-LAH-doo, Nah-NAY}Holadu, Na'ne.
{I sense you. What's up?}{KAH-too Bee-oo. Nah-YOO?}Katu Veo. Nayoo?
translation: {I sense you. What's up?}{KAH-too Bee-oo. Nah-YOO?}我认识你。怎么了？

original: Wise man knows when to shut mouth. You maybe wise. Or maybe not.
translation: 聪明的人知道什么时候该闭嘴。你最好放聪明点。

original: {HOUSE RECEIVES CHIP}{tenderly regarding the Chip}Such a small thing, isn't it? And yet so... {capacious = inexhaustibly capable}capacious. So very dear.
translation: {HOUSE RECEIVES CHIP}{tenderly regarding the Chip}多么小巧的玩意，不是吗？谁又能想到它会是这么的……{capacious = inexhaustibly capable}神通广大呢。正因如此，它才显得无比贵重。

original: Decades of hiring salvagers out west to search for this little {beat}relic in the ruins of a place called Sunnyvale. Back then, anyway.
translation: 为了这个小东西，我雇了不知多少人手，在西边被称为桑尼维尔的废墟中{beat}找了整整数十年。不过那已经成为历史了。

original: That's where the Chip was printed, on October 22, 2077. It was to have been hand-delivered to me here, at the Lucky 38, the next day.
translation: 筹码就是在那里制造的，出厂日期是2077年10月22号。它本该于次日就送到幸运38，交到我的手上。

original: But the bombs fell first. Suffice it to say, the delivery was never made.
translation: 然而核弹却比它捷足先登了。毋庸说，它根本就没有被送过来。

original: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
Frag out!
Fire in the hole!
{grenade!}{GREE-nah!}Grenah!
{bomb!}Boomb!
{grenade!}Nih mah sih!
{bomb!}Bahm buh!
{alarmed}{"Run!"}{cor-ee-EN-doo}Coriendoo!
{alarmed}{"Grenade!"}{gra-NAH-hoo!}Grenahoo!
{irritated}{"Stop such noise!"}{DAY-ha roo-WE-do}Deha ruido!
{irritated}{"Do not fire weapons!"}{no dis-CAR-gay AR-moose}No discarge armoos!
translation: {irritated}{"Do not fire weapons!"}{no dis-CAR-gay AR-moose}别凯枪！

original: Be careful. Tribals don't always recognize those for what they are.
translation: 小心，部落民可不认识这些玩意。

original: Watch it. You can't just go tossing those all over Zion.
translation: 注意。别把这玩意丢得满锡安都是。

original: {explosive, bomb, yes?}Ah del tahi, bahm buh, ya?
{a warning for white legs! Heh he!}A bil he neh fuhr jahd thli gai! Heh he!
translation: {a warning for white legs! Heh he!}白腿的警告！呵呵！

original: {concerned}{"What is that thing?"}{Kay KO-sa ES-tee nah?}Ke cosa estee-na?
translation: {concerned}{"What is that thing?"}{Kay KO-sa ES-tee nah?}那是什么东东？

original: {concerned}{"Why are you putting there?"}{por kay KAH-tu PONE-gwaa ES-tee}Por ke katu pongwa estee?
translation: {concerned}{"Why are you putting there?"}{por kay KAH-tu PONE-gwaa ES-tee}尼为什么把它放在那里？

original: You're not the first to have tried.
Make the first shot count. You won't get a second.
translation: 一击必中，没有第二次机会。

original: {don't point weapons at me.}{doan poin AI-tee Ai Mee!}Do'an poin aiti ay me!
translation: {don't point weapons at me.}{doan poin AI-tee Ai Mee!}别拿舞气纸着我！

original: {stop that please}{SOO-bye thaah, saah}Subai thah, tsahh.
{don't point weapons at me.}No tsaig tuh beh dah a hih jih gahni a meer.
translation: {don't point weapons at me.}别拿舞气纸着我。

original: {stop that please}Stahp dahs pleez.
{anxious}{"I have not harmed you."}{may no err-RA-hu ah KAH-tu}Me no heranu a katu.
translation: {anxious}{"I have not harmed you."}{may no err-RA-hu ah KAH-tu}我妹有桑害你。

original: {offended}{"Lower your weapon."}{BAH-jay KAH AR-moo}Baje ka armoo.
translation: {offended}{"Lower your weapon."}{BAH-jay KAH AR-moo}把舞气放下。

original: Attack
Had enough?
Come on!
You like that?
Take it!
Die where you stand!
Prepare to meet your maker.
{I'm playing with you!}{ahm nie-YAW-wee WIH-choo}Ahm naaiyawi wichoo!
translation: {I'm playing with you!}{ahm nie-YAW-wee WIH-choo}窝来跟尼玩玩！

original: {Die, you!}{deh-YAI, you!}Deyai-yoo!
{You can't fight me!}{YOO-can no ni-KUM-pah mee}Yoocan no nikumpa me!
translation: {You can't fight me!}{YOO-can no ni-KUM-pah mee}尼打不过窝的！

original: {I'm playing with you!}Nah ash ne wit deer!
translation: {I'm playing with you!}窝来跟尼玩玩！

original: {Die!}Shtairb!
{Think you can fight me?!}Glahb ni kahn meer dah ah?!
translation: {Think you can fight me?!}尼以为尼打得过窝？！

original: {Here!}{AH-kee!}Akee!
{Take this!}{too-noo ES-tee!}Tunnoo estee!
{Fall down and die!}{oo-WAY-kah moo-WEAR-nah!}Uweka muerna!
translation: {Fall down and die!}{oo-WAY-kah moo-WEAR-nah!}躺下受史！

original: This one is mine!
Yield!
I have this under control!
Gotcha!
Hah!
Hmph!
Ugh!
Oof!
Ahh!
Argh!
Damn!
I'm hit!
<Grunt.>
<Grunt.>
<Grunt.>
<Grunt.>
<Grunt.>
<Grunt.>
{grunt when hit}Eh!
{grunt when hit}Eh!
{grunt when hit}Eh!
{grunt when hit}Eh!
{grunt when hit}Eh!
{grunt when hit}Eh!
Flee
I'm out of here!
This is hopeless!
Help!
{Don't kill me!}{no mah-TAH-na may}No matanna me!
{I don't want to die!}{may no KAH-day moo-WEAR-nah!}Me no kaade muerna!
translation: {I don't want to die!}{may no KAH-day moo-WEAR-nah!}窝还不想史！

original: {I'm out of here!}{may no KAH-day AH-kee}Me no kaade akee!
translation: {I'm out of here!}{may no KAH-day AH-kee}我要离开哲里！

original: This is too intense!
We are outmatched!
They're too strong for us!
Time to get lost!
This is a battle we cannot win!
Steal
That doesn't belong to you!
You can't just take that!
Thief!
We're a tolerant community, but don't overstep the limits of our generosity.
translation: 我们本来很宽容，可你简直就是在挑战我们的底线！

original: This isn't a New Vegas back alley. Watch what you grab.
{No! Thieving raccoon.}No! Shtay len tahbah mah ee.
{It's not allowed!}Bey haz oh neekt!
{Rotten thief!}{poh-NEE-do la-WAHT-ba!}Ponedo lawatba!
{"You, put that back!"}{KAH-too! PONE-gwaa day noo-AY-bu}Katu! Pongwa de nuevu!
translation: {"You, put that back!"}{KAH-too! PONE-gwaa day noo-AY-bu}尼！把那各放回去！

original: {misfortune comes to a thief}{Wah day-sa-for-TOO-ba YAY-gwee ah la-WAHT-ba!}Wa desafortuba yegwi a lawatba.
translation: {misfortune comes to a thief}{Wah day-sa-for-TOO-ba YAY-gwee ah la-WAHT-ba!}做贼妹有好下厂的。

original: {Awkward, the player just stole from him}Um... you know I'll share if you ask, right?
translation: {Awkward, the player just stole from him}呃...你不说我怎么知道你想要？你说了我肯定给你。

original: Is... is this some kind of civilized ritual I just don't get?
translation: 这...这难道是某种我没见过的文明礼仪？

original: Is thievery not considered wrong where you come from?
translation: 偷窃这种行为，难道在你来的地方一点也不可耻吗？

original: Is your need for possessions truly so great?
Better not try that again.
That sort of thing might be seen as a dumb prank in the Mojave, but it will get you killed out here.
translation: 这点小计俩也就在莫哈维可以胡闹，但这来纯粹是送死。

original: {Okay.}{MY-koo}Maiku.
{Fine.}Lah.
{in peace, go}{PAHZ pah-tah-soo-ba}Paz patasooba.
Assault
What the hell?!
What was that for?
You dirty coward!
{low growl, deep-seated anger}<Low growl>
Ye have sown death and so shall ye reap it!
{Why?! Stop!}Varoom? Stahp!
{cry of alarm}Ah!
{help me!}{AY-ood may}Ayud me!
{I've been hit!}{Wah GOAL-peh may}Wa golpe me!
translation: {I've been hit!}{Wah GOAL-peh may}窝被打中叻！

original: {I've been attacked!}{Wah ah-tah-CO may!}Wa ataco me!
translation: {I've been attacked!}{Wah ah-tah-CO may!}窝被袭鸡叻！

original: Murder
No!
Murderer!
What have you done?
That's enough!
{Roar of anger}<Roar of anger.>
{Killer!}{Bye-KAH kur}Baika-ker!
Devil!
{Get away!}Geh bits ah!
{Devil!}Chin dee!
{You killed him!}{KAH-too mah-TAH-na OOHD[rhymes with "dude"}Katu matanna ud!
translation: {You killed him!}{KAH-too mah-TAH-na OOHD[rhymes with "dude"}尼把他撒了！

original: {Murderer!}{ah-seh-KEY-nay!}Asekene!
{Oh no! A murder!}{NO-nah! Ah-seh-KEY-noo-na!}Nona! Asekenoo-na!
translation: {Oh no! A murder!}{NO-nah! Ah-seh-KEY-noo-na!}喔不！一个撒人犯！

original: Whoa! Was that necessary?
Are you sick in the head or something?
What demon would possess you to do such a thing?
Are you suffering a brain fever? I have herbs that can curb such... violent tendencies.
translation: 你是不是头脑发热？我有些药膏...可以帮你治一下。

original: Grrrraah!
Yaargh!
Rrrraaahhh!
Huurrraghh!
<Strenuous grunt.>
<Strenuous grunt.>
<Strenuous grunt.>
<Strenuous grunt.>
{strenuous grunt}Ehrr!
{strenuous grunt}Ehrr!
{strenuous grunt}Ehrr!
A pointless death.
That should have been avoided.
{That was bad.}Dahs wur bahd.
{Ouch!}Ow wah!
{such misfortune}{poe-ee day-sa-for-TOO-ba}Powee desafortuba...
{It's not good for them.}{Wah no BWAY-noo por KAH-toos}Wa no beunu por katus.
translation: {It's not good for them.}{Wah no BWAY-noo por KAH-toos}哲对塔们不好。

original: {Death comes when it wants.}{Wah moo-WEAR-nah YAY-gwee QUA-do wa KAH-day}Wa muerna yegwi cuado wa kaade.
translation: {Death comes when it wants.}{Wah moo-WEAR-nah YAY-gwee QUA-do wa KAH-day}史亡想来就来。

original: Remind me not to get you mad at me.
Guess that was just bound to happen, huh?
I don't much like your way of solving problems.
translation: 我不喜欢你处理问题的方式。

original: I regret that necessity.
Get down!
Incoming!
Get down!
Duck!
{Take this!}{tech theese}Tek thees!
{fire bomb!}{COO-nah boomb!}Kuna-boomb!
{Take this!}Naymst dees!
{fire bomb!}Koh bahm buh!
{"Fire in the hole!"}{en-fee-AIR-noo AH-kee!}Infiernoo akee!
translation: {Fire in the hole!}{en-fee-AIR-noo AH-kee!}小心守雷！

original: {"Take this grenade!"}{TOO-noo grah-NAH-hoo}Tunno granahoo!
translation: {Take this grenade!}{TOO-noo grah-NAH-hoo}试试哲个手榴蛋！

original: Bombs away!
Boom coming!
Grenade!
Watch out!
Holy shit!
Look out!
Taking cover!
Watch out!
{"Look out!"}{bye thaah!}Bai-thah!
Shits!
{"Shit!"}Shaiss!
{"Look out!"}Eh hahj!
{"Look out!"}{kwee-DAH-loo!}Cuidaloo!
{"Watch out!"}{KAH-too meer-AH-nah}Katu mirana!
Eyes!
Heads up!
Beware!
Danger!
Look sharp!

Over here!
That's it!
Enough!
Forward!
{You're dead!}{yore day-YIGH-pay}Your deyaipe!
{kill them!}{BYE-ka dems}Baika-dems!
{attack!}{nee-KUM-pah}Nikkumpa!
{You're dead!}Ni ar toht!
{White Legs!}Jahd thli gai!
{attack!}Ahl tah jeh jey!
{aggressive}{"Go to sleep now!"}{oo-WAY-ka doo-WEAR-may}Uweka duerme!
translation: {aggressive}{"Go to sleep now!"}{oo-WAY-ka doo-WEAR-may}快点碎觉吧！

original: {aggressive}{"Death comes for you!"}{moo-WEAR-nah YAY-gwee ah KAH-tu}Muerna yegwi a katu!
translation: {aggressive}{"Death comes for you!"}{moo-WEAR-nah YAY-gwee ah KAH-tu}史神为尼而来！

original: {aggressive}{"I am your killer!"}{may kah ah-seh-KEY-nay!}Me ka asekene!
translation: {aggressive}{"I am your killer!"}{may kah ah-seh-KEY-nay!}窝是尼的终结者！

original: Whoa! Here we go!
Fighting time!
You leave me no choice!
I'll fight you if I must!
Death
Aaaah!
Urgh!
Gaaah!
<Death sound.>
<Death sound.>
<Death sound.>
{death sound}Ahhgh!
{death sound}Ahhgh!
{death sound}Ahhgh!
You'd better get out of here if you know what's good for you.
translation: 你自己心里清楚我找到你的后果！

original: Keep moving.
You'd better get out of here.
{"You aren't wanted here."}{KAH-too no KAH-day AH-kee}Katu no kaade akee.
translation: {"You aren't wanted here."}{KAH-too no KAH-day AH-kee}哲里不需要尼！

original: {"Move along, outsider."}{moo-AY-bah, Sah-GAH-see}Mueba, Tsagasee.
I've got you now.
Got 'em!
Found them!

{"Come here!")Hah go!

{"I knew it!"}{may sa-BA-loo ES-tee}Me sabaloo estee!
translation: {"I knew it!"}{may sa-BA-loo ES-tee}窝就知道！

original: {"Hello!" - finds person, starts attacking}{ho-LAH-doo}Holadu!
What was that?
{I'm taking a look.}{ahm MAH-nay look}Ahm mane look.
translation: {I'm taking a look.}{ahm MAH-nay look}窝来看看。

original: {I hear something}{Ah heer SUM-ning}Ah heer sumning.
translation: {I hear something}{Ah heer SUM-ning}窝挺到什么生音了。

original: {What?}{Hah-GAI}Hagai?
Shh! Did you hear something?
I think I saw something....
Eyes wide.
Ears open.
Huh?
What?
Hmm.
{I hear something}Yideets oh etvass.
{What?}Vass?
{I'm taking a look.}Nish eh.
{slight concern}Hmm?
{slight concern}{"Is someone there?"}{wa AHL-gays ay-YEE}Wa algues ayee?
translation: {slight concern}{"Is someone there?"}{wa AHL-gays ay-YEE}油人在吗？

original: {slight concern}{"What was that?"}{Kay ES-tee nah?}Ke estee-na?
translation: {slight concern}{"What was that?"}{Kay ES-tee nah?}辣是甚么？

original: Guess it was nothing.
Guess I'm just jumpy.
Nothing after all.
We seem to be safe for the moment.
Never mind. I was wrong.
Must have left.
Hmm. Nothing.
Huh. Maybe I need some sleep.
{"Huh, nothing."}{nuh guy-HIN-nim}Huh. Ne gaihinnim.
{"gone"}{guy-HIGH-why}Gaihaiwai.
Hmm.
{"Huh, nothing."}Huh. Neekts.
{"gone"}Gey gonen.
Hmm.
{confused}{"Did I imagine that?"}{may soo-WAY-noo-na}Me suenoo-na?
translation: {confused}{"Did I imagine that?"}{may soo-WAY-noo-na}是窝想象出来的？

original: {confused}{"I guess it was nothing."}{wah NAH-na, may su-PON-goo.}Wa nana, me supongoo.
translation: {confused}{"I guess it was nothing."}{wah NAH-na, may su-PON-goo.}窝想应该啥也妹有。

original: {confused}{"I guess I'm hearing things."}{es-COO-choo NAH-na, may su-PON-goo.}Escuchu nana, me supongoo.
translation: {confused}{"I guess I'm hearing things."}{es-COO-choo NAH-na, may su-PON-goo.}窝感觉挺到了什么。

original: Phew. I'm glad that's over.
Work well done.
All in a day's labor serving the good Lord.
translation: 所有的劳碌都是为了服侍仁慈的主。

original: Finished.
{Good kill, my friend}{BYE-kah-GOOD, frehn!}Baika-good, fren!
translation: {Good kill, my friend}{BYE-kah-GOOD, frehn!}漂亮的一击，盆友！

original: {I'm lucky today!}{ahm SUN-high WITH-dah}Ahm sunhai tihda!
translation: {I'm lucky today!}{ahm SUN-high WITH-dah}窝今天奏运叻！

original: {Good work}{SAHN-day-job!}Tsaande-job!
{Good kill, my friend}Goot keel, ahk iss.
translation: {Good kill, my friend}打得嚎啊，朋油。

original: {I'm lucky today!}Shih zhah neh hoyta!
{Good work}Goot nah nish.
{satisfied}{"That's right, run away."}{see, cor-ee-EN-doo!}Si, coriendoo!
translation: {satisfied}{"That's right, run away."}{see, cor-ee-EN-doo!}妹错，快刨！

original: {satisfied}{"Coward. Lucky I didn't kill you."}{ko-BAR-ee. Wah for-TOO-ba may no ma-TAH-na KAH-tu}Cobar'e. Wa fortuba me no matanna katu.
translation: {satisfied}{"Coward. Lucky I didn't kill you."}{ko-BAR-ee. Wah for-TOO-ba may no ma-TAH-na KAH-tu}胆小龟，幸好窝没杀尼。

original: {satisfied}{"Yes, I'm better than you."}{see, may MAY-ja kay KAH-tu}Si, me meja ke katu.
translation: {satisfied}{"Yes, I'm better than you."}{see, may MAY-ja kay KAH-tu}对，窝比尼强多了。

original: Well, that's that then.
Never stood a chance, did they?
translation: 他们根本就没机会，对吧？

original: Messy business - I am glad it's over.
translation: 真是一团糟，很高兴都结束了。

original: Let's move on - I don't like to linger in this place.
translation: 我们走吧，我不想再呆在这了。

original: Where'd you go?
Yes, hide. Run and hide in fear.
translation: 对，藏起来，在恐惧中逃跑和躲藏。

original: Slink away. Squeeze between the rocks if you can.
translation: 偷偷溜走是吧，最好挤在岩缝里。

original: Hiding, are you? Well, I'm coming to find you.
translation: 躲起来了是吧？好啊，我会找到你的。

original: {Where'd you go?}{Whar deh-yoo go?}Whar d'yoo go?
translation: {Where'd you go?}{Whar deh-yoo go?}尼去哪叻？

original: {Just disappeared!}{guy-HIGH-why}Gaihaiwai!
{I don't see him}{ah DOAN-seh hem}Ah doan'se hem!
translation: {I don't see him}{ah DOAN-seh hem}窝妹看到他！

original: {Skinwalker!}Yee nad loo shee!
{Just disappeared!}Guhst fair schvoond!
{Damned!}Fair flick!
{irritated}{"Where did you go?"}{ah-DOE-nay pa-ta-SOO-ba}Adone patasooba?
translation: {irritated}{"Where did you go?"}{ah-DOE-nay pa-ta-SOO-ba}尼去哪叻？

original: {irritated}{"Show yourself and fight!"}{KAH-too BAY-oh ee LOO-choo}Katu veo e luchoo!
translation: {irritated}{"Show yourself and fight!"}{KAH-too BAY-oh ee LOO-choo}除来战斗啊！

original: {irritated}{"Coward! Stop running!"}{ko-BAR-ee! DAY-hah cor-ee-EN-doo!}Cobar'e! Deha coriendoo!
translation: {irritated}{"Coward! Stop running!"}{ko-BAR-ee! DAY-hah cor-ee-EN-doo!}懦弗！憋跑了！

original: Hey! Where'd they go?
Lost 'em!
I cannot find them!
Where are they?
Guess she's gone.
Guess he's gone.
Huh. Looks like they left.
Only a matter of time.
Time will run out on you yet.
Hide while you can.
{enough}{EE-no}Eno.
{I don't see anything}{Ah no see guy-HIN-neem}Ah no see gaihinnim.
translation: {I don't see anything}{Ah no see guy-HIN-neem}窝啥都妹看到。

original: {I am done searching}{ahm ma-TANE-ka look}Ahm matenka look.
translation: {I am done searching}{ahm ma-TANE-ka look}俺搜完叻。

original: Yo eechay.
Sha shin neekt.
{I am done searching}Shih ahm fair tig es zookuh.
{giving up}{"Enough looking. They're gone."}{BAH-stay BAY-oo. oods pa-SAH-nay}Baste veoo. Uds pasane.
translation: {giving up}{"Enough looking. They're gone."}{BAH-stay BAY-oo. oods pa-SAH-nay}搜得插不多了，塔们走了。

original: {giving up}{"I lost them."}{may per-DEE-lo ah oods}Me perdilo a uds.
translation: {giving up}{"I lost them."}{may per-DEE-lo ah oods}窝跟丢叻。

original: {giving up}{"Who cares? They're gone."}{wa ah-TEN-doo? oods pa-SAH-nay}Wa atendu? Uds pasane.
translation: {giving up}{"Who cares? They're gone."}{wa ah-TEN-doo? oods pa-SAH-nay}不管了，塔们走了。

original: They must've run off. Scared of us, huh?
translation: 他们已经走了。吓死我们了。

original: I don't think they're coming back.
They're gone. Perhaps that means we don't have to kill them.
translation: 他们走了。或许我们不必杀死他们了。

original: I think our enemy has fled.
translation: 我想我们的敌人已经跑了。

original: There you are!
Let's end this.
Judgment's coming.
Time's up.
{No, you can't run!}{NO-kihn run, you}Nokihn run, yoo!
translation: {No, you can't run!}{NO-kihn run, you}不，尼刨不掉的！

original: {That's it!}{Thaah no!}Thah no!
{You die now}{deh-YAI, you MAY-koo!}Deyai-yoo, maikku!
translation: {You die now}{deh-YAI, you MAY-koo!}你该史了！

original: {No, you can't run!}No, ni kahn neekt ruhn!
{That's it!}Dahs eet!
{You're dead!}Ni ar toht!
{satisfied}{"Found you!"}{dis-COO-bay KAH-tu}Discube katu!
{satisfied}{"Here it comes!"}{AH-kee YAY-gwee!}Akee yegwi!
{satisfied}{"This will hurt you!"}{ES-tee bahl ah doo-WAY-la ah KAH-tu}Estee val a duela a katu!
translation: {satisfied}{"This will hurt you!"}{ES-tee bahl ah doo-WAY-la ah KAH-tu}这会桑害尼的！

original: Gotcha!
Thought you could get away from Follows-Chalk?
translation: 你觉得你能甩掉我追踪印记吗？

original: There you are!
I found them!
{Wary}Who's there?
{Looking for someone}Hmm....
I am not giving up the search yet.
Stay cautious.
I'm still looking, don't worry.
Someone there?
Don't try to hide from me.
translation: 别以为藏起来了我就找不到你。

original: You can't stay hidden forever.
translation: 躲得了一时，躲不了一世。

original: {I'm still searching...}{ahm stih bwee-NEE-keen}Ahm stih bui-neeking.
translation: {I'm still searching...}{ahm stih bwee-NEE-keen}窝还在找...

original: {Where are you?}{hah-GAH-nie yoo}Haganai yoo?
{Are you heres still?}{ahn yoo heer stih}Ahn yoo here stih?
translation: {Are you heres still?}{ahn yoo heer stih}你害在这吗？

original: {I'm still searching...}Shih zookuh ta tee...
{Where are you?}Voh ni ar?
{Are you here?}Ni ar heer?
{"What was that?"}{Kay ES-tee nah?}Ke estee-na?
translation: {"What was that?"}{Kay ES-tee nah?}那是甚么？

original: {"Did I hear something?"}{may es-COO-choo AHL-gay-na}Me escuchu algue-na?
translation: {"Did I hear something?"}{may es-COO-choo AHL-gay-na}窝是不是挺到啥叻？

original: {"What's that noise?"}{kay roo-WE-do ES-tee-na}Ke ruido estee-na?
translation: {"What's that noise?"}{kay roo-WE-do ES-tee-na}那是甚么声儿？

original: I'll find you.
You'll be back. I can still {emph}smell you.
translation: 你会回来的，我还能{emph}闻到你的味道。

original: Gave up? Wise choice.
Gone. No matter. I'll find you.
translation: 跑了。没关系，我会找到你的。

original: {sinister, "I am listening for you..."}{ahm na-NAN-ga yoo}Ahm nananga yoo.
translation: {sinister, "I am listening for you..."}{ahm na-NAN-ga yoo}窝能听到尼...

original: {maybe you're gone}{MAY-buh yoo guy-HIGH-why}Mabe yoo gaihaiwa?
translation: {maybe you're gone}{MAY-buh yoo guy-HIGH-why}也许尼已经奏了？

original: {threatening: Where are you?}{hah-GAH-nie yoo}Haganai yoo?
translation: {threatening: Where are you?}{hah-GAH-nie yoo}尼踏马在哪儿？

original: {sinister, "I am listening..."}Ee sists ah.
{maybe you're gone}Dah tse ni ar gey gonen.
{Where are you?}Voh ni ar?
{frustrated}{"You can't hide from me."}{KAH-tu no nih-BAY-oh day may}Katu no n'veo de me!
translation: {frustrated}{"You can't hide from me."}{KAH-tu no nih-BAY-oh day may}尼躲不凯窝的！

original: {searching}{"I can smell you..."}{may ol-FA-lay KAH-tu}Me olfale katu!
translation: {searching}{"I can smell you..."}{may ol-FA-lay KAH-tu}窝能闻到尼！

original: {threatening}{"I will find you."}{may BAHL ah dis-COO-bay KAH-tu}Me val a discube katu.
translation: {threatening}{"I will find you."}{may BAHL ah dis-COO-bay KAH-tu}窝会找着尼的。

original: Still looking, but I got nothing.
translation: 还在找，但什么也没找到。

original: Still nothing here.
Do you see them?
Where are they?
{That's not my fight}{ES-tee no LOO-choo MAY-la}Estee no luchoo mela!
translation: {That's not my fight}{ES-tee no LOO-choo MAY-la}那布关窝的战斗！

original: {I want no part of that.}{may no KAH-day PAR-too ES-tee}Me no kaade partu estee.
translation: {I want no part of that.}{may no KAH-day PAR-too ES-tee}窝不想掺合。

original: Howdy. My name is Jed Masterson, and I'm a caravan boss for the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 你好。我的名字叫杰德·马斯特森，我是“欢乐小径”商队公司的老板。

original: If you're hearing this, I have a job offer for you. Happy Trails is organizing an expedition north into Utah, off the Long 15, and we need people.
translation: 如果你正在听这条广播，我可以告诉你，我们向你提出一份工作邀请。“欢乐小径”商队正在组织一次前往犹他的远征，我们将沿着15号国道前进，现在正在征集人手。

original: We're looking for caravan guards, prospectors, couriers - if you're used to humping it across the Wastes straight toward trouble, we want you.
translation: 我们正在寻找商队守卫、登山老手，以及向导。如果你有任何一方面的才能，请及时和我们联系，我们需要你这样的人才。

original: If you've got a Pip-Boy, we definitely want you.
translation: 如果你有哔哔小子，那再好不过了。

original: On the other hand, if you're a greenhorn or a city-slicker spinning tales about your skills, you can kindly go hang.
translation: 相反，如果你只是个涉世未深的毛头小子或街头混混，那就找个墙角自己撞上去吧。

original: If we like your gumption, we'll pay you square and treat you fair. Find me, Jed Masterson, at the Northern Passage if you're interested. Luck to you.
translation: 如果你的进取心能让我们满意，那么我们将给予你丰富的报酬和奖励。好了，如果你感兴趣的话，请到北部通道来找我。祝你好运。

original: They killed him!
They killed her!
Look out!
We'll get 'em.
Flank 'em!
There will be time to grieve later.
Let this death mean something.
{You killed my friend!}{yoo MUR-dah my HAIN-gee}Yoo murdah my hainji!
translation: {You killed my friend!}{yoo MUR-dah my HAIN-gee}你撒了我的盆友！

original: {No! Not you!}No! Net yoo!
{Rest tonight, my friend!}Roo too nait, ahk iss.
translation: {Rest tonight, my friend!}今晚休习，我的盆友！

original: {No! Not you!}No! Neekt ni!
{Oh no! He's dead!}{NO-na! OOHD[rhymes with "dude"] moo-WEAR-nah!}Nona! Ud muerna!
translation: {Oh no! He's dead!}{NO-na! OOHD[rhymes with "dude"] moo-WEAR-nah!}喔不！他史了！

original: {He's killing us!}{OOHD[rhymes with "dude"] mah-TAH-na mays!}Ud matanna mes!
translation: {He's killing us!}{OOHD[rhymes with "dude"] mah-TAH-na mays!}塔要杀了窝们！

original: Joshua isn't going to like this....
Hey! Don't die on me now!
{Sadly}This is how violence always ends....
I wish I could have saved you.
translation: 我希望我能有机会救你。

original: Wait here.
Sure, okay. I'll wait behind. Not like I'm not used to that.
translation: 当然，好的。在后面待着可不是我的作风。

original: As you wish. I will wait, but please do not be gone long.
translation: 如你所愿。我会等你的，但请别让我等太久。

original: Sorry. That's not going to happen.
Let's trade equipment.
Well then, let's get to trading.
If something of mine will help you, take it. I hope you would do the same for me.
translation: 如果我有什么东西能给你帮助，请随便拿。我希望你也这么对我。

original: No thanks.
Enough about tactics.
translation: 战术方面就聊到这儿吧。

original: What can I do?
I will do my best to follow your requests.
translation: 我会尽我所能满足你的要求。

original: Anything else?
Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
translation: 保持距离。设法从侧翼包抄他们。

original: Sure... you are going to leave me some chalk marks to follow though, right?
translation: 当然...你会给我留一些白灰标记，是吧？

original: I'll give you room to work, then.
translation: 我会给你留出充足的空间。

original: As you like.
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
Lead on, I'll follow.
Off we go, then.
After you.
Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离把控得不错。我们来谈点别的。

original: What can I do?
What else is there to talk about?
Anything else?
Stay close to me.
Fine by me - get too far back and it's easy to lose your partner in this maze.
translation: 好极了，距离太远的话小心把我丢了。

original: I will do my best to stay close.
I'm at your side.
Stick close to me.
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

original: Just tell me where to be, and I'll be there.
translation: 告诉我该去什么地方就行。

original: How close do you prefer me to follow?
Whatever you'd like. It makes no difference to me.
I want you to use ranged weapons.
translation: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

original: Keeping my distance sounds more my speed anyways.
translation: 不管怎么说，保持距离不会太坏。

original: My skills lie elsewhere, but I will do as you bid.
translation: 这有点浪费我的能力，不过我还是会照你说的做。

original: Naturally.
Switch to a melee weapon.
Up close and personal? Well, as long as they don't have guns.
translation: 近战？好吧，希望他们没枪。

original: I will fight with my fists as best I can.
translation: 我想他们一定会好好享受我的铁拳的。

original: Fine. If that's your style, I can adapt.
translation: 好的。你怎么说我怎么做。

original: Let's talk about something else.
What can I do?
That's it for your tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 这样的战术就可以了。我们来谈点别的吧。

original: What did you have in mind?
That's it for your tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 这样的战术就可以了。我们来谈点别的吧。

original: Anything else?
That's it for your tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 这样的战术就可以了。我们来谈点别的吧。

original: That's all. Let's get going.
Lead on, I'll follow.
I will try to follow your example.
All right.
I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

original: Change it to...?
How shall I fight?
Oh?
Let's talk about your tactics.
Tactics? You know I'm not much of a fighter, right?
translation: 战术？你知道这我可不是特别擅长。

original: Battle is not my strongest skill, but I am eager to learn from you.
translation: 战斗不是我的强项，但我非常渴望学习。

original: What have you to teach me of tactics?
Let's get going.
Right behind you.
I walk in your footsteps.
It's time for us to part ways.
You sure? It's easy to get lost out here without a guide.
translation: 你确定？没有向导的话你会很容易迷路的。

original: Go back to your people's camp.
Daniel was firm about my staying with you. Are you certain?
translation: 丹尼尔希望我跟着你。你确定？

original: Go back to your people's camp.
{quietly}Ha ha ha. I don't think so.
I think we should travel together.
Joshua said I might be going with you. Let's go then!
translation: 约书亚说我该跟你一起。我们走吧！

original: I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: I am happy to offer you what guidance I can. Let's go.
translation: 我很高兴能做你的向导。我们走吧。

original: I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: The path lies before us. Let's not waste any time.
translation: 道路就在不远的前方。我们抓紧时间吧。

original: God protect me!
Lord, make me thy instrument!
God and liberty!
{Die, devil!}{deh-YA- you}Deyai-yoo, devil!
{Let's run!}{Wez run!}Wes run!
{fight me!}{ni-KUM-pah mee}Nikumpa me!
{starting combat}{"Time to fight!"}{mo-MAY-we day LOO-choo}Momewi de luchoo!
translation: {starting combat}{"Time to fight!"}{mo-MAY-we day LOO-choo}战斗的时后到叻！

original: {starting combat}{"We fight now!"}{mays LOO-choo ah-OR-la}Mes luchoo ahorla!
translation: {starting combat}{"We fight now!"}{mays LOO-choo ah-OR-la}窝们现在战斗吧！

original: {starting combat}{"I will defeat you!"}{may duh-ROW-tay KAH-tu}Me derote katu!
translation: {starting combat}{"I will defeat you!"}{may duh-ROW-tay KAH-tu}窝要打拜尼！

original: {Die, devil!}Shtairb, chin dee!
{Let's go!}Sohl tyeh!
{Fight me!}Dah ah hi meer!
Let's take them!
This one's mine!
I'm with you.
Let's go!
For the Sorrows!
Hyah!
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
translation: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

original: Glad to hear it. I wouldn't want to go back to Joshua alone.
translation: 很高兴听到你这么说。我可不想一个人回到约书亚那里去。

original: Good. Daniel's decisions are wise. You are wise for respecting them.
translation: 好的。丹尼尔的决定很聪明。你也不赖，至少还知道尊重他们。

original: Good, because I wasn't going to leave.
translation: 好极了，因为我本来就没打算走。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
All right. Joshua won't be too happy, but all right.
translation: 好。不过我恐怕约书亚会不高兴的。

original: If that is your wish, I cannot change your mind. I will wait for you at the Sorrows' camp until you return.
translation: 如果你这么希望，那好，我尊重你的想法。我会在悲恸部落等你回来的。

original: I'm not going anywhere. Get the idea out of your head and get moving.
translation: 我哪儿也不去。赶快把你那个鬼想法从脑子里赶出去。

original: Got it.
As you say.
Yes, of course.
I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: Now you're thinking like a hunter! I like this plan.
translation: 现在你越来越像个猎手了！我很欣赏你的计划。

original: That seems sensible. I'd prefer to let you choose the targets.
translation: 听起来不错。你先挑目标好了。

original: {a bit irritated}What's the point?
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: You're starting to sound like the old Joshua. Okay, got it.
translation: 你的口气听起来就像以前的约书亚。好的，明白。

original: Isn't a more diplomatic approach preferable? {Slight sigh}Very well, but I'm not comfortable with this.
translation: 还有更好的选择吗？{Slight sigh}唉，总感觉不是很舒服。

original: {"of course"}It's the only way I know.
translation: {"of course"}这正是我所喜欢的方式。

original: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down, yea, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
translation: 我们曾坐在巴比伦的河畔，在那里我们一想起锡安就哭了。

original: Remember, O Lord, the children of Edom in the day of Jerusalem who said, "Raze it, raze it, even to the foundation."
translation: 耶和华啊！求你记念以东人在耶路撒冷遭难的日子所行的，他们说：“拆毁它，拆毁它，直拆到根基。”

original: O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed. Happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us.
translation: 注定灭亡的巴比伦城啊！照着你待我们的行为报复你的，那人有福了。

original: Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.
translation: 抓住你的婴孩摔在磐石上的，那人有福了。

original: Do you know what it means?
translation: 你知道这是什么意思吗？

original: {Quarter health, near death}If I don't make it... tell Joshua... I tried.
translation: {Quarter health, near death}如果我倒下了...请告诉约书亚...我尽力了。

original: {Quarter health, near death}Looks like I'm headed for the big dark....
translation: {Quarter health, near death}看来我要拥抱无尽的黑暗了...

original: {Quarter health, near death}Sorry... I let you down....
translation: {Quarter health, near death}对不起...我让你失望了...

original: {Quarter health, near death}Even my best herbs won't work if I'm dead... I need help!
translation: {Quarter health, near death}如果我死了，最好的药物都不起作用了...请帮助我！

original: {Quarter health, near death}I will not leave my children orphans!
translation: {Quarter health, near death}我不会让我的孩子成为孤儿！

original: {Quarter health, near death}If I fall... save the Sorrows... please.
translation: {Quarter health, near death}如果我倒下了...请拯救悲恸部落...

original: {Half health, in pain}I could use some help here!
translation: {Half health, in pain}请给我点帮助！

original: {Half health, in pain}I won't last long at this rate!
translation: {Half health, in pain}这样下去我支撑不了多久！

original: {Half health, in pain}Can I get some backup? Healing? Something?
translation: {Half health, in pain}我可以用点备用品吗？治疗针或其他什么的？

original: {Half health, in pain}My wounds are getting worse!
translation: {Half health, in pain}我的伤口正在恶化！

original: {Half health, in pain}I can't keep up this pace much longer!
translation: {Half health, in pain}再这样下去我坚持不了多久了！

original: {Half health, in pain}I need healing powder!
translation: {Half health, in pain}我需要医疗粉！

original: Wake
{Waking up from being knocked out}This is not the most pleasant place I've woken up.
translation: {Waking up from being knocked out}虽然我醒了，但一点儿也不开心。

original: {Waking up from being knocked out}My head feels about to burst. At least that means I'm still alive.
translation: {Waking up from being knocked out}我的头好疼。至少我还活着。

original: {Waking up from being knocked out}Is it normal to hurt all over after a battle?
translation: {Waking up from being knocked out}一场大战之后现在感觉浑身无力。

original: {Waking up from being knocked out}Oh, look, I'm not dead.
translation: {Waking up from being knocked out}嘿，看，我还活着！

original: {Waking up from being knocked out}Okay, okay, I'm up. What's next?
translation: {Waking up from being knocked out}好的，好的，我起来了。下一步怎么办？

original: They're cutting through me like paper!
This armor is useless!
I cannot defend myself against this!
translation: 我已经保护不了我自己了！

original: I need better armor!
I don't think I'm hurting them at all!
Are you sure this weapon actually works?
translation: 你确定这个武器还能用？

original: My attacks are doing nothing!
Might as well tickle them with a feather!
translation: 拳头打在他们身上就跟弹了一根羽毛似的！

original: Got anything bigger I can fight with?
No more bullets!
I'm shooting dry here!
I have no more bullets!
I need a reload!
My guns are empty!
{Healing a crippled limb}There... hopefully it won't fall off now.
translation: {Healing a crippled limb}那儿...好了，感觉好点了。

original: {Healing a crippled limb}Now that's good medicine!
translation: {Healing a crippled limb}这药太有效了！

original: {Healing a crippled limb, a little surprised}This is much more effective than I expected!
translation: {Healing a crippled limb}效果比我预期的还好！

original: {Healing a crippled limb}If only I had more of this medicine to share with the tribe.
translation: {Healing a crippled limb}要是这玩意再多点我一定会分享给我的部落的。

original: Crippled
{Limb crippled, in pain}Ahh! I'm going to need a healer!
translation: {Limb crippled, in pain}啊！我需要治疗！

original: {Limb crippled, in pain}Hope you've got medicine better than some sticky herbs!
translation: {Limb crippled, in pain}赶快来帮帮我！

original: {Limb crippled, in pain}I fear I will need more than my herbs to fix this....
translation: {Limb crippled, in pain}我恐怕快不行了...

original: {Limb crippled, in pain}This wound is grievous! I need help!
translation: {Limb crippled, in pain}好疼啊！我需要帮助！

original: Regenerating
{Rush of health}Good as new!
{Rush of health}Just what the medicine man ordered!
{Rush of health}That should keep me going a while longer.
translation: {Rush of health}估计还能再撑一会了。

original: {Rush of health}Much improved.
{Rush of health}I feel better already.
Poison
{Poisoned, woozy}Feeling the poison here!
{Poisoned, woozy}I'm not feeling so good....
{Poisoned, woozy}I've been poisoned!
{Poisoned, woozy}This wound needs to be sucked out, quickly!
{Poisoned, woozy}I need some Radscorpion glands and Nightstalker blood to treat this poison.
translation: {Poisoned, woozy}我得弄点辐射蝎毒囊或者夜行兽血来以毒攻毒。

original: I look like a pack Brahmin to you? Come on, we travel light!
translation: 你觉得我是个驮运婆罗门吗？来吧，我们轻装上阵！

original: I will be more useful to you traveling light.
translation: 我们还是慢慢地走比较好。

original: Like the shadow of a ghost.
translation: 我们就像阴影下的幽灵。

original: We pass like moonlight on still water.
translation: 我们就像洒在寂静水面上的月光。

original: {a li'l sinister, drawn out, quiet}Yes.
I need to think about this.
Even our Lord had doubts. Think it over, but listen to your heart. And do it quickly. We don't have much time.
translation: 即使我们仁慈的主也有存疑的时候。仔细考虑一下，听听你内心的想法，然后快速采取行动。我们剩下的时间不多了。

original: Don't worry. I think leaving Zion is for the best.
translation: 别担心，我想离开锡安是现在最好的选择。

original: It may be. I hope it is. To tell the truth, if something goes wrong, more Sorrows could die in the escape than in Joshua's proposed attack.
translation: 也许是吧。希望如此。但跟你实话实说，万一我们在撤离的路上出了什么差错，受难的族人可能会比加入约书亚作战的计划要死得更多。

original: Even knowing that, it's a risk I have to take. With your help, and Joshua's, even if we're attacked, we can defend the Sorrows and escape.
translation: 不过即使心里清楚后果，我也要冒这个风险。有你和约书亚的帮助，即使我们遭到攻击，我们也有余力保护好悲恸部落并顺利撤离。

original: We'll be traveling at night, in small groups, across the valley. With luck, the White Legs won't know what's happened until the next morning.
translation: 我们将在夜晚出发，分成小组行动，直穿山谷。运气好的话，白腿部落直到第二天早上才会知道到底发生了什么事。

original: But if the White Legs realize what's happening... Joshua and I will need {emph}you to help us escape. Don't hold back. I promise you, the White Legs won't.
translation: 但如果白腿部落立即意识到事态的进展...约书亚和我就需要你的帮助了。不过别担心，我向你保证他们绝对没那么聪明。

original: Once our path is clear, I'll give you everything you need to get back to the Mojave, but the Pine Creek tunnel must be collapsed behind us.
translation: 一旦计划顺利，我就会给你所有可以帮助你回到莫哈维的东西，但是在此之前，我们身后的松溪涵洞必须完全坍塌。

original: It's the only way to delay the White Legs' pursuit long enough for us to get a head start. Good luck, and may God be with us.
translation: 这是唯一可以延缓白腿部落追击我们的方法。好了，祝你好运，愿上帝与你同在。

original: I think Joshua's right. We should fight the White Legs.
translation: 我认为约书亚说得没错，我们应该和白腿部落开战。

original: {sigh}No. Why? {beat}Why? Haven't you seen enough of what's going on here to see that the Sorrows don't need to butcher the White Legs for a piece of land?
translation: 不，为什么？为什么？你还没看清楚这里发生了什么吗？悲恸部落没有必要为了一块土地屠杀白腿部落。

original: What Joshua wants is more than an attack. He wants a slaughter. And he needs more than you and the Dead Horses to do it.
translation: 约书亚想要的不仅仅只是发起进攻，他还想要大规模杀戮。除了你和死马部落外他还需要更多人参与到他的计划中。

original: The Sorrows can't be pushed into this. You and Joshua don't have the right to force them into it. Please, consider what I'm saying.
translation: 悲恸部落不能参与到其中来。你和约书亚没有权利强迫他们参与。请仔细掂量一下我对你说的这些吧。

original: I checked on everything in the valley and got you the map of Grand Staircase.
translation: 我检查了山谷的每一处地点，找到了你要的大阶梯地图。

original: I appreciate it. Well, that's it. This is all we need. Now all that's left is to quietly pack up and try to get out of here without being noticed.
translation: 我很感激。就是它了。这就是我们急需的。现在剩下的安排就是收拾我们的行李，然后不动声色地尽快离开。

original: That's assuming that Joshua won't try to stop me. {beat}And that he hasn't talked you into fighting the White Legs despite what I've said.
translation: 当然，前提是约书亚不会来阻止我。现在看来除了我说的这些外，他还没有告诉你他想与白腿部落开战的计划。

original: Don't worry. I don't hold it against you. You're a - {stops himself from saying Gentile} an outsider. Fighting seems like the practical solution. But there's more than that at stake.
translation: 别担心，我并不是想防范你。你只是个...外来者。尽管战争似乎是很实际的解决办法，但要冒的风险太多了。

original: Joshua told me you needed a few things. I think this is everything.
translation: 约书亚告诉我说你需要某些东西，我想这就是了。

original: Well I'll be. I was starting to lose hope we'd be able to get any of this, much less all of it. Tribals are smart but... well, they're ignorant.
translation: 确实。我已经开始失去信心，我很怀疑我们是否能渡过当前的难关。部落的族人很聪明，但...某种程度上来说，他们还很无知。

original: Letting go of a taboo is difficult for them, so I knew it would have to be one of us. Turns out all it took was a Gentile. Or, uh... no offense.
translation: 更不用说某些禁忌对他们的影响，除非我们当中必须有人站出来。结果现在，一个异教徒出现在我眼前。哦...对不起，我并没有冒犯之意。

original: These supplies are a godsend, but if we're going to evacuate Zion without drawing more White Leg attention, I need you to go back into the valley.
translation: 锡安对他们来说是上帝的恩赐，但我们现在须要偷偷撤离锡安，并躲开白腿部落的监视。现在，请回到山谷去。

original: Specifically, I need you to scout out some locations for White Legs and try to recover a map of Grand Staircase, a wilderness area to the east.
translation: 确切地说，我需要你侦查白腿部落的几处区域，找到一张“大阶梯”地图。那是在锡安东面的一处广袤区域。

original: There's also the matter of the roads. We're going to be heading out of the east side of the park, but I'm not sure the way is clear.
translation: 然后就是路线的问题。我们打算走公园东路出去，但我不确定这条路线是否可行。

original: <White Bird stares at you wordlessly.>
What? I don't know what "visions of truth" means.
translation: 什么？“真理神示”是什么意思？

original: {Mystical chanty-type stuff}Take drugs! Kill a bear!
{Mystical chanty-type stuff}Seek medicine plant! Return with Sacred Datura Root! Receive visions of truth, they guide you!
translation: {Mystical chanty-type stuff}寻找药用植物！带神圣曼陀罗根回来！接受真理神示，它会带引你！

original: Umm... Goodbye.
Not yet. I had some questions first.
translation: 还没，我想先问几个问题。

original: It's done.
Then visions of truth are at an end. Will you learn from truth? Maybe yes. Maybe no. Only for you to decide.
translation: 那么真理神示结束了。但至于你能否得到真理？或许可以，或许不可以。只有你能决定。

original: Here, take. Gift, to remind you of visions. Use well. Or sell to curio trader. Either way, says much about you.
translation: 给，这是给你的礼物，可以时刻警醒你。恰当使用，或者扔掉，都可以。因为这都是你的选择。

original: Not yet. I need a moment.
Tea will wait. Me? Maybe not.
translation: 茶会等你的。我？或许没那么多耐心。

original: All right, let's do this.
Drink. Tea is strong. Tea is bitter. Wisdom is strong. Wisdom is bitter. You see?
translation: 喝吧。这个茶很浓，但也很苦。智慧也是如此，你明白吗？

original: Not yet. I had some questions first.
translation: 还没，我想先问几个问题。

original: I have the sacred datura here.
translation: 我已经拿到神圣曼陀罗根了。

original: These roots make sacred vision tea. You drink, you see path before you. Ready?
translation: 这些根用来制作“真理神示”茶。把它喝了，你就能看见前方的路。准备好了么？

original: I'm ready to go to Zion.
Just like that, huh? You got guts, I'll give you that. You sure you want to jump in blind? Ain't got no questions about where we're going or why?
translation: 这么有劲，哈！小子有种，我看好你。不过我看你现在还一无所知，你对我们要去哪里，为什么要去没有疑问吗？

original: Okay, let's do it! Zion here we come!
translation: 好了，我们出发吧！锡安，我们来了！

original: {Player isn't alone - 2 companions}I bet you are, but we only got room for one more on this expedition. You'll have to leave your friends behind.
translation: 好的，但我们这趟旅行带不了那么多人。你最好把你的朋友都留下。

original: We're all ready to get going.
{Player isn't alone - 1 companion}I bet you are, but we only got room for one more on this expedition. You'll have to leave your friend behind.
translation: 好的，但我们这趟旅行带不了那么多人。你最好把你的朋友都留下。

original: We're both set. Let's go.
{Player is carrying more than 50 lbs}I bet you are, but you ain't going nowhere loaded down like a pack brahmin.
translation: {Player is carrying more than 50 lbs}我说，你把自己的背包装得那么大，你以为你是头牛吗？

original: {Player is carrying more than 50 lbs}I bet you are, but you ain't going nowhere loaded down like a pack brahmin.
translation: {Player is carrying more than 50 lbs}我说，你把自己的背包装得那么大，你以为你是头牛吗？

original: {Player is alone and carrying less than the weight limit}Are you now? You know we ain't coming back this way for a good long while now, right? And you know about the weight limit?
translation: {Player is alone and carrying less than the weight limit}你就这么走？你要知道，这趟路途可是相当遥远的，而且短时间内是不会回来的。你也知道自己能背多少东西吧？

original: I don't want no whining about "Oh, Mr. Masterson, I left my one-of-a-kind plasma cannon back at base, can we go back for it?"
translation: 我可不想听你走到半路时跟我发牢骚，“哦，马斯特森先生，我有一把重要的等离子炮落家里了，能不能先回去一趟？”

original: You sure you're ready now?
All right, let's go. I'm ready.
translation: 好了，我们出发吧，我准备好了。

original: You sure about that this time? We ain't coming back for a while.
translation: 你确定吗？一旦出发，短时间内我们可是不会回来的。

original: No, not yet.
Hurry! There isn't any time to waste! We have to get out of here and collapse the tunnel behind us!
translation: 快点！别再浪费时间了！我们必须整个隧道塌陷之前离开这里！

original: Yes, go!
You've done more than I could have ever hoped for. Thank you. And may God protect you for all of your days. Goodbye.
translation: 你的贡献远远超出我对你的预期。衷心地谢谢你，愿上帝无时不刻保佑你。再见。

original: You let them die! They needed you! Why didn't you help them?!
translation: 你置他们的死于不顾！他们需要你！你为什么不帮助他们？！

original: Nevermind. I don't have time for this. Take the map. Just take it and go!
translation: 算了，我已经没时间和你吵了。拿着这张地图。拿着它快走！

original: Your power is broken. You cannot hope to prevail here. Leave this valley in peace.
translation: 你的政权已经倒塌了，你没有资格继续呆在这里。安静的离开这个山谷吧。

original: We leave, but always fight, White Legs! We strong warriors for Caesar!
translation: 我们会走的，但我们还是会战斗。为了白腿部落！我们是凯撒最强的战士！

original: Time to die, General Gobbledegook!
You mock White Legs! You die now!
translation: 你侮辱了我们白腿部落！是你死！

original: Wait! There's no reason this has to end in bloodshed!
translation: 等等！没必要以流血收场！

original: [SUCCEEDED] You speak. I listen. Kill you, maybe I not. Maybe.
translation: [成功] 你说吧，我听着。或许我不该杀你，或许吧。

original: [FAILED] Weak words you talk! Now you see strong spears better than weak words!
translation: [失败] 你说的都是空话！现在你会看到有力的矛胜过软弱的言语！

original: Can't we just, you know, be friends?
translation: 我们能不能，你知道的，做朋友？

original: That's all. Let's get going.
Enough about tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 战术啥的就说这么多吧。我们来谈点别的。

original: You're good. Let's get going.
