Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离把控得不错。我们来谈点别的。

original: Spread out and keep your distance from me.
translation: 离我远点，保持一定的距离。

original: Stay close to me.
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论一下我们之间应该保持多远的距离。

original: Wait here.
I want to trade equipment.
I want you to use ranged weapons.
I don't want you to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 我不希望你主动出击，除非我先开始战斗。

original: Switch to a melee weapon.
That's all. Let's get going.
Lead on, I'll follow.
I will try to follow your example.
That's it for your tactics. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你就保持这样的战术。我们来谈点别的吧。

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我希望当你看见敌人时，就立刻向他们发起攻击。

original: I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你能改变你的战斗方式。

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们来讨论一下你的战术。

original: Let's go.
I want you to travel with me.
translation: 我希望你能跟我一起旅行。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
No, I've changed my mind.
Go back to your people's camp.
[SUCCEEDED] Hmm... all right, I reckon you know your limits.
translation: [成功] 恩...好，我看出来你心里有数。

original: You keel over on me out there, though, and I'll leave your ass. After we take everything useful you crammed in your pack.
translation: 就算跪下来给我磕头，我也不会睬你。等我们收拾好以后，你就赶快把你的背包塞满。

original: Relax, I've humped this load across the Mojave on my own two feet long enough. I can handle it.
translation: 别紧张，我就靠着这两只脚，在莫哈维已经摸爬滚打了很长的时间了。没问题的。

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a virgin on her wedding night up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新婚之夜的处女还要紧。

original: Last thing I need is some greenhorn getting stuck on a rock, slowing the whole caravan down.
translation: 我最不愿看到的，就是一些毛毛躁躁的小伙子把自己卡在石头里，然后就因为他们拖慢了整个商队的速度。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: [FAILED] That's exactly what I'm worried about. We got us some passes tighter than a- {beat - was about to say something crude, but he's talking to a lady} well, tighter than a Chairman's fist up there.
translation: [失败] 我担心的就是这个。我们要经过的几条小道，比新... {beat - was about to say something crude, but he's talking to a lady} 嗯，比会长帮的拳头握得还紧。

original: You get stuck in there, you'll slow the whole caravan down while we pry you loose. Begging your pardon, ma'am.
translation: 你要是把自己卡住了，整个商队的速度就会因为你被拖累。上帝啊，快来救救我们吧。

original: Hey, man, I'm cool. I got a big backpack and everything!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我很酷。你瞧，我有一个大大的背包，里面装满了各种东西！

original: Why the weight limit?
You ain't never been to Zion, have you? We'll be passing through a whole mess of narrow slot canyons and high, rough passes.
translation: 你是不是从来没去过锡安？我们这一路要翻越数不尽的峡谷与山脉，所有的道路都坎坷荆棘，泥泞不堪。

original: A big pack'll get you wedged in like a Super Mutant crawling through a storm drain, and too much weight will kill you in the thin air.
translation: 一个巨大的背包会令你像一个卡在下水道里的超级变种人，而且太多的重量会令微薄的空气直接威胁你的生命。

original: Actually, let me take care of some more things first.
translation: 实际上，我还有些别的事要办。

original: Fair enough. Come on back when you're ready.
translation: 没问题。等你准备好了就回来。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
Well, all right then. Let's get moving. We've got a long road ahead of us...
translation: 那么，好吧。我们出发。接下来，可有一段相当长的路在等待我们...

original: Hang on - ain't you the one that wiped out the Crimson Caravan's Vegas branch not too long ago?
translation: 等等，你就是那个不久前干掉了赤红商队维加斯分部的家伙？

original: Ought to thank you for that - knocking McLafferty out of the running gives Happy Trails a market to expand into.
translation: 我真要为此感谢你，把麦克拉弗蒂踢出局让我们“欢乐小径”又多了一块可以开辟的市场。

original: Wait a minute, I recognize you. Yeah... you're Alice McLafferty's rising star, ain't you?
translation: 等一下，我认得你。呃...你就是爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂的明日之星，对吧？

original: You sure you want to be here? McLafferty's non-competes are pretty rigid.
translation: 你确定你要跟我们走？麦克拉弗蒂的竞业禁止条款可是相当严格。

original: Damn good thing you came along, too. We had another prospect with a Pip-Boy, but he done skedaddled. Something must've spooked the boy.
translation: 你能从大老远赶来真是太棒了。我们本来有一个拥有哔哔小子的队友，但他跑了。不知是不是有什么东西把他吓到了。

original: Why are you called Follows-Chalk?
Our advance scouts leave chalk signs to mark places rich with game. I'm not a full scout yet, so I follow the marks and guide the hunters.
translation: 我们的高级侦察兵会在有猎物的地方用白垩粉做上标记。我还不是一个高级侦察兵，所以我的任务是跟随着这些标记，引导我们的猎人。

original: I don't have any more questions. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我没有什么问题了。我们谈点别的吧。

original: Ask away.
I want to know more about you.
What can I tell you?
I had some other questions.
Shoot.
Warlords? How dangerous are they?
translation: 军阀？他们怎么个危险法？

original: Dangerous enough we won't be going near them if we can help it. I got no desire for my head to decorate some little gas station fort's walls, thanks.
translation: 他们非常危险，对我们来说，只要能不靠近他们就不靠近。我可不希望自己的头被插在什么小城堡的墙上当成他们的装饰品。谢谢。

original: Degenerate tribes?
That's right. The folks that lived in Zion before the war, they didn't just get a little savage, they're downright feral.
translation: 对的，战前居住在锡安的人们，他们不仅仅是变得野蛮，他们已经是彻头彻尾的野蛮人了。

original: Most of them don't even speak English any more - you got to get yourself a New Canaanite translator to talk to them.
translation: 他们大部分人都已经不再说英文了，你需要找一个新迦南人帮你做翻译。

original: The ones you really got to watch out for are the White Legs, from the Great Salt Lake. They'll attack just about anyone that ain't one of theirs.
translation: 你需要真正注意的是白腿部落，他们来自大盐湖。他们会向每一个非自己同族的人发起攻击。

original: Tell me about the raiders.
translation: 跟我说说有关掠夺者的事。

original: They're about what you'd expect - crazy, jacked up on chems, violent as hell, and not too bright.
translation: 他们和你预期的没什么两样——愚蠢、滥用药剂、崇尚暴力，而且脑子不行。

original: The worst are the {eighties}80s, but we won't be passing through their turf on this run.
translation: 最糟糕的是那些80号公路帮的人，但好在这次我们不会经过他们的地盘。

original: You don't know what happened to their mission?
translation: 你不知道他们的传教后来结果如何？

original: Nope - hence this caravan. If we don't make contact with the New Canaanites, Happy Trails might as well just shrivel up and die.
translation: 不知道，因为我们只是支商队。如果我们因此和新迦南人中断相互之间的联系，那么“欢乐小径”的生意也会枯萎死去。

original: Do you know anything about their religion?
translation: 你对他们的宗教了解多少？

original: I ain't a prayin' man myself. They paid for their goods and dealt square with us, that's all I ever cared about.
translation: 我自己是不信教的。对我来说，只要他们愿意为物资和食品和我们做交易就足够了。

original: But don't think that just because they're religious that they're pacifists. They take care of their own, and they're damn fine marksmen too.
translation: 不过可千万不要天真地以为他们信教他们就是和平主义者。他们自己会管好他们自己的事，而且他们个个都像天生的神枪手。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You ain't wrong. Losing the Salt Lake City run really stung us. If we can't re-establish contact with this run, we'll be in real trouble.
translation: [成功] 你说的没错，失去盐湖城这条生意线对我们打击很大。如果不能早日重建这条贸易路线，我们就有大麻烦了。

original: It sounds like Happy Trails isn't in the best financial shape.
translation: 听起来现在“欢乐小径”的财务状况并不是很好。

original: [FAILED] We do all right, don't you worry about us. Got enough in the kitty to pay you, anyways.
translation: [失败] 我们干得还不错，别替我们瞎操心。总之我有足够的钱付给你就是了。

original: So, you guys are totally rich, right?
translation: 所以，你们这些人都富得流油，对吧？

original: Why can't you get to Salt Lake City?
translation: 你们为什么不去盐湖城？

original: Without New Canaan's mission in Zion, the only ways to Salt Lake City are down the old I-80 or up through Ogden.
translation: 失去了新迦南人在锡安的布教，我们只有沿着I-80这条老高速路才能到盐湖城，或者穿过北方的奥格登。

original: The highway's too risky - NCR's rangers are so busy here in the Mojave they don't have the manpower to keep the raiders off.
translation: 但这条高速路太危险了。NCR的游骑兵们在莫哈维事情太多，他们没有足够的人手可以腾出来清理那些四处游曳的掠夺者。

original: Ogden's just too far - we'd lose more in travel expenses than we'd ever earn.
translation: 奥格登又太远了...走奥格登的话我们的成本远远高于我们的收益。

original: All right, I'll come back when I'm carrying less than 75 pounds.
translation: 好吧，等我把负重减到75磅以下再来。

original: There's a chest over yonder, you can store your extra in that. It'll be safe as can be until you get back.
translation: 那边有一个箱子，你可以把你多余的物品放在里面。别担心，不会有问题，等你回来时你会发现里面什么东西也不会少。

original: There's a chest over yonder, you can store your extra in that. It'll be safe as can be until you get back.
translation: 那边有一个箱子，你可以把你多余的物品放在里面。别担心，不会有问题，等你回来时你会发现里面什么东西也不会少。

original: All right, I'll come back when I'm carrying less than 100 pounds.
translation: 好吧，等我把负重减到100磅以下就回来。

original: Who is Joshua Graham, and why shouldn't I talk about him?
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆是谁？为什么我不能谈论他？

original: Just don't. It makes the New Canaanites powerful uncomfortable, and it scares the britches off the tribals.
translation: 千万别。这个名字会让新迦南人浑身不舒服，而且会吓到当地的部落。

original: Don't talk about the Burned Man either, while you're at it. Trust me on this one, it's for your own good.
translation: 而且等你到了那儿，也不要谈起“火烧人”。相信我，这都是为你好。

original: Tell me more about the job.
The job is simple - help us get this caravan into Zion and find New Canaan. The pay is 25 caps per day, half up front, half on return.
translation: 这份工作很简单，帮我们把这支商队带入锡安，然后找到新迦南人。报酬每天25个瓶盖，先行支付一半，另一半回来之后给。

original: You'll get a bonus if we make it into Zion, plus another bonus if we reach New Canaan.
translation: 如果到达锡安，你会额外得到一笔奖金。如果到达新迦南，再加一笔奖金。

original: Oh, one more thing - don't mention the name Joshua Graham to anyone. {Repeat for emphasis}Anyone.
translation: 哦，还有一件事，不要向任何人提起约书亚·格兰汉姆这个名字。{Repeat for emphasis}任何人。

original: How about a game of Caravan to kill some time?
translation: 来一盘大篷车扑克怎么样？

original: Should have figured you for a player. All right, let's play.
translation: 看不出来你也会玩这个。好，陪你玩一盘。

original: Another one, huh? Sure, why not?
translation: 再来一盘？哈，为什么不呢？

original: How about another game of Caravan?
I haven't been through Utah recently - what's the situation like?
translation: 我最近没有去过犹他州，那里情况怎么样？

original: Well, it ain't good, I'll tell you that. It's not like the Mojave or the NCR - hell, even Arizona under Caesar is safer.
translation: 呃，我得说，不是很好。那里一点也不像莫哈维或NCR这样安全，对，甚至凯撒占领的亚利桑那州都更安全。

original: You got raiders all over the damn place, tribes of degenerates that'll eat you as soon as look at you, regional warlords... the works.
translation: 那个受诅咒的地方到处都是贪婪的掠夺者，野蛮的部落，还有区域性质的军阀。简直就是一团糟。

original: Not too many decent places to stop and trade. New Canaan's one of the only ones left I know about.
translation: 没有什么合适的地方可以落脚做生意，新迦南是我知道的唯一一个地方。

original: I understand this caravan is headed to Zion. What can you tell me about the area?
translation: 我听说这支商队要前往锡安，你能跟我说说那个地方的情况吗？

original: Well, I ain't never been inside, myself. Did some trading with the New Canaanites from their mission there, but that was all on the outskirts.
translation: 好吧，实际上我也从来没进去过。我们之前只是在锡安近郊一带与在那里传教的新迦南人做些贸易。

original: All the old ways in and out were destroyed after the War, but we got ourselves the location of a pass the New Canaanites use - that's our way in.
translation: 所有可以进出的路线在战后都被摧毁，但我们现在还是找到一条新迦南人用过的小道，可以走他们的路进去。

original: That's why I wanted someone with a Pip-Boy on the caravan - the map'll be helpful for checking the topography, keeping us on the trail.
translation: 这就是我为什么要找一个有哔哔小子的家伙。那上面的地图可以让我们在茂密的森林和广袤的群山中不会迷路。

original: What can you tell me about New Canaan?
translation: 你能不能跟我讲讲新迦南？

original: Don't know much about the place, but I can tell you about the people. The New Canaanites were some kind of religious group from before the War.
translation: 我对这个地方了解不多，但我对那里的人算是知道一点。新迦南人在战前即是有某种宗教性质的团体。

original: They control the old city of Ogden, a ways north of Zion, and they got themselves a nice defensible mission in the canyon itself - or they did.
translation: 他们控制着一座老城奥格登，一条从北面通往锡安的路。他们在山谷里成功实施了布教，锡安成了他们防御性的一道屏障。

original: They trade a fair bit with the tribes in Zion - well, the ones that don't try and kill them, anyways.
translation: 他们与锡安的部落做了很多贸易，嗯，是与那些不会试图杀死他们的部落。

original: Tell me about Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: 跟我谈谈关于“欢乐小径”商队公司的事儿。

original: We're a smaller company out of Sac-Town, up in the northern part of the NCR. We run some business through New Reno, there on the "Little Loop."
translation: 我们是位于NCR北面的萨克城外的一家小公司。我们在新里诺做点小生意，“小环路”上。

original: Had a nice run to Salt Lake City, too - but then we lost contact with New Canaan, and that went all to hell.
translation: 去盐湖城也很顺利。但自从我们失去了和新迦南的联系，我们的生意就一落千丈。

original: Heh. All right, I'll believe you - Lord knows I ain't going to pat you down to find out for myself.
translation: 呵呵，那好，我相信你。上帝知道我不会亲自去搜你的身的。

original: Don't worry about me. I'm used to finding out-of-the-way places to stuff my gear.
translation: 别担心我，我总是会想方设法地合理利用我的背包空间的。

original: Heh. I do believe you could.
Not only could I carry my own gear, I could carry yours, his, and one of your brahmins'.
translation: 我不仅可以背自己的行李，你的、他的、婆罗门的我一起背都没问题。

original: Who were those tribals who attacked me?
translation: 那些攻击我们的部落是什么人？

original: White Legs - nasty bunch. They been raiding deeper into Zion ever since New Canaan was wiped out.
translation: 白腿部落，这帮畜生。自从新迦南被消灭以后，他们一直在渗入锡安。

original: Tell me more about Joshua Graham.
translation: 跟我说说约书亚·格拉汉姆。

original: He's been the chief of our tribe since he came back to the Valley. He went off to the civilized world years ago, to fight a war. That didn't go well.
translation: 自从他回到这片山谷以来，他就一直是我们部落的酋长。他多年前去了文明世界，去打仗了。据说结果不怎么样。

original: Why do you need a map of Grand Staircase?
translation: 你为什么需要大阶梯的地图？

original: Grand Staircase is farther east, deeper into the Colorado Plateau.
translation: 大阶梯在更远的东面，直接深入科罗拉多高原。

original: The White Legs were able to reach us here, but it's only because Zion is close to the Long 15. They can't pursue us east of here. It's too wild.
translation: 白腿部落能在这里找到我们，是因为锡安靠近15号高速公路。但往东他们就来不了了，那里完全是荒蛮之地。

original: Throughout our history, we have called many places Zion. This valley is full of God's beauty, but it's just a place. Zion is more than this.
translation: 纵观我们的历史，我们把很多地方都称为锡安。这片峡谷充满了上帝的赞誉，但它只是一个地方而已，锡安不止于此。

original: We cannot use any and all means available just to protect stone and water and a piece of sky. We have to hold on to our faith. Far more enduring.
translation: 我们不能仅仅为了保护石头、水和一片天空而使用任何可能的手段。我们只能坚守我们的信仰，并持之以恒。

original: If we sacrifice grace for a piece of land, we may live in this valley, but we will no longer dwell in Zion. It's better for us to leave now.
translation: 如果我们为了一小片土地牺牲我们的荣誉，我们可以住在这个山谷，但我们永远也无法在扎根于锡安。离开这里，对我们或许会更好。

original: Take all I have.
Your generosity is... {sighs, not sure what to say} well, I just can't thank you enough.
translation: 你的慷慨...{sighs, not sure what to say}好吧，我的任何言辞也表达不了我对你的感激之情。

original: Here's one healing powder.
Thanks. Even one dose can make a difference.
translation: 谢谢。即使只有一份也是莫大的帮助。

original: Is there any other way I can help the Sorrows?
translation: 还有什么别的办法可以帮助悲恸部落吗？

original: If you could part with it, healing powder would be welcome. We have enough Stimpaks for now, but we can't rely on that small supply.
translation: 如果可以的话，我们欢迎多来些医疗粉。我们现在已经有了足够的治疗针，但我们依赖那少量的补给。

original: Broc and Xander plants can be found throughout the valley and you might even find some on White Legs you come across.
translation: 布洛克花和山德根在这片峡谷里到处都是，而且你会经常“偶遇”些白腿部落的人。

original: You mentioned you need healing powder. I have some, if you're still interested.
translation: 我记得你说过需要些治疗粉。如果你还感兴趣的话，我这里有一些。

original: {sighs, relieved}That's great news. We can use anything you can offer.
translation: {sighs, relieved}这可真是好消息！你提供的任何东西我们都能用。

original: Come on, down this path. We're almost there.
translation: 沿着这条小道，继续走。我们马上就到了。

original: Holy hell, it's the White Legs! What are they doing this far south?
translation: 操，是白腿！他们跑到这么南边干什么？

original: Let's end this, then.
Ha! Yes, end!
Then see how strong my spears are, warrior.
translation: 那我就让你好好见识见识我的长矛有多锐利，勇士。

original: This good fight will be!
Daniel and the Sorrows are weak prey, not fit for such mighty warriors.
translation: 丹尼尔和悲恸部落根本就是软弱的猎物，比你的这些强悍的战士要差得远。

original: Sorrows {emphasis for agreement}are weak. We go, find true warriors to test us!
translation: 悲恸部落{emphasis for agreement}太软弱了。我们走，去找些真正的勇士来考验我们！

original: I've already crushed your warriors. Retreat now and rebuild your tribe, or die in obscurity.
translation: 我已经击溃了你的部队。要么滚回去，要么就死在这里。

original: ...I go. But rebuild my tribe, and come we back stronger than before!
translation: ...我走。但我回去后一定会重建我的部落，等我们再回来时会比以前更强大！

original: Well, all of the Bighorners are dead. Problem solved!
translation: 好了，所有的大角羊都死了。问题解决了！

original: That's... not really what I was hoping for. I guess... I guess at least we don't have to worry about the Bighorners attacking the camp now. Hoy....
translation: 这...完全不是我希望的。我猜...我至少不用担心这些动物会再攻击我的部落了。唉...

original: Well, I returned the calf to its herd. Had to kill a few Bighorners to do it, though.
translation: 好了，我已经把小羊带回到它的群落了。但途中不得已杀了几只大角羊。

original: Sure, hey, I understand. I wish it could have been done different, but at least the calf is back with its herd.
translation: 好的，嘿，我可以理解。虽然我希望你能做的更好，但至少现在小羊已经安全了。

original: Well, I returned the calf to its mother, and didn't even kill any of the Bighorners.
translation: 好了，我把小羊带回到它妈妈身边了。而且我一只大角羊也没杀。

original: Hoo! Glad to hear it! That'll be some happy mama, huh? Thank you - really. It means a lot to me.
translation: 哦！太好了！！它妈妈一定会很高兴的，对吧？谢谢你...真的。我高兴得真不知道说什么好了。

original: That sounds like way too much work. Maybe later.
translation: 听起来好像很麻烦，晚点再说吧。

original: Oh sure, that's just what the hunters said. Well... I guess let me know if you change your mind.
translation: 噢当然，那只是猎人说的。嗯...如果你改变主意了就告诉我。

original: All right, I'll look into it.
That's great! I'll help any way I can.
translation: 好极了！如果需要帮助尽管说。

original: Maybe I can help with that.
Yeah? Hey, thanks - most of the hunters don't listen when I tell them the problem.
translation: 是吗？嘿，谢谢，大部分猎人听不进我说的问题。

original: Just one thing - try not to kill any Bighorners if you can, yeah? You'll drive the herd off, and we'll have to range farther on our hunts.
translation: 只有一点：尽量不要伤害任何大角羊，好吗？否则兽群会被你吓跑，这样我们就得往更远的地方打猎了。

original: Tell me a little about this area - any interesting wildlife?
translation: 给我介绍一下这个地区，有什么有趣的野生动物吗？

original: Mostly it's the mountain Bighorners - whole herd of them up on the cliffs there. Usually they're not too aggressive, but lately... hoo!
translation: 这里大部分动物是山地大角羊，他们生活在山上和悬崖边。通常他们并没有攻击性，但最近...唉。

original: My guess is one of the calves got lost somewhere along the way. Bighorners are communal - one missing calf, and the whole herd gets ornery.
translation: 我猜，它们有一头小羊在山里迷路了。大角羊是群居的，一只小羊不见了，整个羊群都会变得暴躁。

original: If that calf doesn't turn up soon, they might very well come down into the valley and attack the camp.
translation: 如果那只小羊再不出现的话，它们可能会冲下山谷，进攻我们的营地。

original: You change your mind about helping out?
translation: 你改变主意要帮忙了吗？

original: So, about those Bighorners....
Mostly it's the mountain Bighorners - whole herd of them up on the cliffs there. Usually they're not too aggressive, but lately... hoo!
translation: 这里大部分动物是山地大角羊，他们生活在山上和悬崖边。通常他们并没有攻击性，但最近...唉。

original: My guess is one of the calves got lost somewhere along the way. Bighorners are communal - one missing calf, and the whole herd gets ornery.
translation: 我猜，它们有一头小羊在山里迷路了。大角羊是群居的，一只小羊不见了，整个羊群都会变得暴躁。

original: If that calf doesn't turn up soon, they might very well come down into the valley and attack the camp.
translation: 如果那只小羊再不出现的话，它们可能会冲下山谷，进攻我们的营地。

original: You might try luring the baby out with some banana yucca. These Bighorners go crazy for the stuff.
translation: 你可以试试用一些香蕉丝兰把小羊羔引出来，那些大角羊对这种植物非常着迷。

original: Tell me about the Bighorner problem again.
translation: 把大角羊的问题再跟我说一遍。

original: I'll do what I can, but I need to defend myself if I'm attacked.
translation: 我会尽我所能，但如果我受到攻击，我需要保护自己。

original: Of course you do - I understand. You know, I heard stories about rangers from Back When - they carried lightning sticks that stunned the animals.
translation: 你当然可以，我理解的。我听说过不少“原初时代”的护林员的故事，他们拿着带电的棍子，可以击昏动物。

original: I've never been to any of the Back When places, but they might have left one when they died.
translation: 我从来没有去过“原初时代”的那些地方，但他们死了以后可能还会留下一个。

original: You might also try luring the baby out with some banana yucca - the mountain Bighorners love the stuff.
translation: 你可以试试用一些香蕉丝兰把小羊羔引出来，山地大角羊喜欢这种东西。

original: What can I do to help?
I don't have time for this. Go away.
{Fine}Lah, I meant no offense - if you won't talk to me, talk to Joshua Graham - he's at our camp on the Eastern Virgin.
translation: 啊，我无意冒犯，如果你不想跟我说话，请找约书亚·格拉汉姆，他就在我们位于东维琴河的营地那里。

original: Civilized lands? What do you mean?
I mean the Lands Beyond the Valley - the place where the cities never fell. Where people don't live in tribes and forage just to survive.
translation: 我意思是这片山谷之外的土地，城市没有沦陷的地方。那里的人们不再以部落的形式生活，也不再仅仅为了生存而觅食。

original: Joshua keeps saying it isn't paradise out there, but how can it not be, compared to this?
translation: 约书亚一直说外面不是天堂，但和这里比起来，怎么可能不是呢？

original: Sorry, I'm getting distracted - Joshua will want to know about you - please, go to our camp on the Eastern Virgin. Tell him how you came to be here.
translation: 对不起，我有点分心了，约书亚会想知道你的事的，请到我们位于东维琴河的营地去。然后请告诉他你是怎么来的。

original: Who is this Joshua?
Joshua Graham - he leads our tribe. Thanks to him, the Dead Horses are strong, and safe from our enemies.
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆，他是我们部落的酋长。正因为他，我们死马部落才变得强大，才不会受到敌人的伤害。

original: He'll want to talk to anyone coming up from south-ways. Guess that means just you, now. Come, I can take you to him.
translation: 他会想和任何从南方来的人谈谈。我猜现在只剩你了，来吧，我带你去见他。

original: Wait, what about Caesar?
When Joshua first came to us, he was servant to a man he called Caesar. He led his master's armies, and we were ready to follow him into war.
translation: 我们第一次见到约书亚的时候，他还是一名叫凯撒的人的手下。他带领着他主人的军队，同时我们也准备好跟随他参加战争。

original: Then he lost his master's army to a tribe called Enseeyar, the Sunset People. When he returned, he was as you saw him - burned, broken, but changed.
translation: 然后他被一个叫“恩西阿“的日落人部落打败了。当他回来的时候，正如你所见...他被烧得面目全非。

original: He led us away from Caesar, led us to our own destiny in Zion.
translation: 他带着我们远离了凯撒军团，带领我们在锡安找到了自己的命运。

original: Why is it so important that we fight the White Legs?
translation: 为什么要和白腿部落对抗？

original: {Bewildered - doesn't really understand how this is a question, like "Why is it important to breathe?"}Well... because they're our enemies. What else would we do? They take our land, they kill our scouts, they poach our hunting grounds.
translation: {Bewildered - doesn't really understand how this is a question, like "Why is it important to breathe?"}呃...因为他们是我们的敌人。我们还能做什么？他们抢了我们的土地，杀了我们的侦察兵，还入侵我们的狩猎区。

original: What's with the shell casings in your club?
translation: 你战棍上的弹壳是什么？

original: We decorate our clubs with them to honor Joshua Graham. They were the weapons of his old tribe, so now they are ours.
translation: 我们用这些装饰表达我们对约书亚·格拉汉姆的尊敬。它们本来是他以前所在部落的武器，现在我们继承了下来。

original: Can't say they seem that dangerous to me, but Joshua says they "won the West."
translation: 我不敢说这有多危险，但约书亚说它们可以“称雄西部”。

original: What do you know about the New Canaanites?
translation: 你对新迦南人了解多少？

original: Little bit. I met some of their missionaries a few times, but I've never been to their city. Joshua could tell you more - or Daniel, I imagine.
translation: 只了解一点儿。我曾见过几次他们的传教士，但我从来没去过他们所在的城市。约书亚会告诉你更多信息的，丹尼尔或许也可以。

original: Do you remember anything about Joshua from before he became your leader?
translation: 你还记得约书亚成为你们酋长之前的事吗？

original: Only a little - I was very young. He was... different. Prouder, yes, but harder, crueler, more driven. Really, I was terrified of him. We all were.
translation: 只记得一点点...那时我还小。他...与现在差别很大，更骄傲，没错，但更强硬，更残忍，更有行动力。说实话，那时的我对他非常害怕，我们都是。

original: When he came back, I almost didn't believe he was the same man. He was humbler. He wanted to protect, not destroy.
translation: 当他回来的时候，我几乎不相信他还是原来的那个人。他更谦逊了，所有行为的出发点都是出于保护，而不再是破坏。

original: What did Joshua do for you?
translation: 约书亚为你做了什么吗？

original: If it wasn't for Joshua, the Dead Horses would still be the whipping boys of the Zion Valley.
translation: 如果不是约书亚，死马部落还会是锡安山谷的出气筒。

original: He taught us how to hold our territory, to protect ourselves. He guided us away from Caesar, and showed us how Caesar would have destroyed us.
translation: 他教会我们怎样坚守自己的土地，怎样保护自己。他引导我们远离凯撒，告诉我们凯撒会如何毁灭我们。

original: Tell me about your tribe.
We came up in the Land of the Dead Horse, though why the Back When folks called it that I got no hint.
translation: 我们来到了“死马之地”，不过我不知道为什么人们叫它“原初时代”。

original: We raided, we fought... we lost. Our enemies drove us back into Zion, and we would have died if it hadn't been for Joshua. Joshua, and his Caesar.
translation: 我们突袭，我们战斗...但我们失败了。我们的敌人把我们驱赶到锡安，要不是约书亚，我们早就死光了。约书亚，还有他的凯撒。

original: What are all those tattoos?
Dead Horses mark ourselves to commemorate our hunts. When a hunter takes a great beast, or when a youth goes on his first hunt, he gets a tattoo.
translation: 我们死马部落用来纹身来纪念我们的狩猎果实。当一个猎人捕获一头巨兽，或者当一个年轻人第一次打猎时，就会得到一个纹身。

original: I see. That's fascinating.
translation: 我知道了，真是太令人着迷了。

original: I'm sure Daniel could tell you more. His knowledge of the Father is greater than my own.
translation: 我想丹尼尔肯定能告诉你更多，他对先父的了解比我要多得多。

original: That doesn't sound like what I've heard about the New Canaanites....
translation: 这听起来和我所知道的关于新迦南人的信息好像不太一样...

original: Perhaps you do not fully understand the New Canaanites. I have seen the Father's images.
translation: 也许其实你并不了解新迦南人，我见过先父的形象。

original: His holy bride and holy son were given unto the world to save it. They dwelt in the caverns of the mountains, caverns which can still be seen today.
translation: 他圣洁的新娘和神圣的儿子被派来拯救这个世界。他们住在山上的洞穴里，这些洞穴至今仍可见。

original: The people sinned against Him, and were punished with the End That Came in Fire and the loss of the holy tongue. Only the New Canaanites were spared.
translation: 人们得罪了他，就遭受了惩罚，结局就是被烈火焚烧，圣言也归于无有。只有新迦南人得以幸免。

original: Wait, you think the survivalist is... God?
translation: 等等，你认为那个生存狂...是上帝？

original: I do not know this "survivalist," but the Father in the Caves is the god of the New Canaanites.
translation: 我不认识这个什么“生存狂”，但洞中的先父就是新迦南人的神。

original: I have seen the holy books, and once I even saw an image of the holy child and his mother.
translation: 我看过圣书，有一次我甚至看到了圣婴和他母亲的图像。

original: Do not the New Canaanites' books say the Father gave the world his child?
translation: 新迦南人的书不是说先父将他的孩子赐给世人吗?

original: Do you have any family?
{Fond reminiscing}I do. A fine husband and three children. I miss them each day, but I take comfort in knowing they are safe.
translation: {Fond reminiscing}有，一个亲切的丈夫和三个可爱的孩子。我每天都会思念他们，只要一想到他们现在很安全，我就会很欣慰。

original: Tell me more about your tribe.
We have dwelt in the Narrows since the End That Came In Fire, when the Father in the Caves punished the world and made us forget the holy tongue.
translation: 自末日之火降临以来，我们就一直住在狭路地带，当时洞中的先父惩罚了世界，让我们忘记了圣语。

original: We have had good relations with the other tribes in the valley. At least, before Salt-Upon-Wounds brought his White Legs here.
translation: 在山谷里，我们和其他几个部落都保持着良好的关系。但在伤口撒盐带着白腿部落来后，一切都改变了。

original: We have Daniel to thank for our continued existence. His advice and help has kept the White Legs from overrunning us so far.
translation: 由于丹尼尔，我们才能活到今天。在他的建议和帮助下，白腿部落至今还没有把我们打倒。

original: I do not know how long even he can protect us, though.
translation: 但我不知道他还能保护我们多久。

original: Who or what is the Father in the Cave?
translation: 那个住在洞里的“先父”是谁？

original: Have you not heard of the god of the New Canaanites? He is our protector and our judge. He helped our ancestors find their place here in Zion.
translation: 你难道没听说过新迦南人的上帝吗？他是我们的保护者和审判者，他帮助我们的祖先在锡安找到了立足之地。

original: He gave us many gifts, but we are not to seek him out. His caves are forbidden to us. Those who seek them out are taken from us.
translation: 他给了我们很多礼物，但我们不会去打扰他。他住的洞穴对我们来说就是禁地，那些想寻找他的人早已被我们赶走。

original: Give me some info on this Daniel. Who is he?
translation: 跟我说说那个丹尼尔是谁？

original: Daniel is a wise man, and a great friend to the Sorrows. He taught me to speak the language of New Canaan - the {maybe slightly mispronounce this}English from the holy books.
translation: 丹尼尔是一个智者，也是悲恸部落伟大的朋友。他教我说新迦南的语言，就是圣书中的英语。

original: What's your deal?
Waking Cloud is my name. I am midwife to the Sorrows. It sounds ill-omened, no? "Midwife to sorrows."
translation: 我的名字叫唤醒白云，我是悲恸部落的接生婆。听起来是不是有点不吉利？“接生悲恸。”

original: Nothing else. Talk to you later.
Go with fortune, friend.
That's all I wanted to know for now.
Then I will look forward to our next speaking.
translation: 好，我们下次可以谈点别的了。

original: I had other questions.
Certainly. I am happy to share my knowledge.
translation: 好啊，我很愿意分享我的知识。

original: About your husband... I'm afraid he was killed by White Legs during the evacuation.
translation: 关于你的丈夫...恐怕，他在撤离的时候已经被白腿部落杀害了。

original: {Shocked, disbelieving}What? No... you must be mistaken. Daniel would have told me!
translation: 什么？不...你一定是弄错了，丹尼尔会告诉我的！

original: Safe? Where are they?
When we learned that Salt-Upon-Wounds had defiled Zion with his presence, Daniel ordered the children, the old, and the sick evacuated from the camp.
translation: 当我们得知伤口撒盐的人已经用他们的存在玷污了锡安之后，丹尼尔命令所有的小孩、老人和病人优先撤离营地。

original: My husband volunteered to lead the hunters that went with them for protection.
translation: 我的丈夫志愿带领着一队猎手，一路保护他们。

original: I try not to worry about them, but we have had no news for so long, and Daniel seems sad when I ask him about it. Sad... and a little frightened.
translation: 我试着不去担心他们，但我们和他们失去联系已经有很长时间了。当我问起丹尼尔时，他似乎很伤心，悲伤...而且有一丝惊恐。

original: What do you do when you're not delivering babies?
translation: 你不接生孩子的时候都做些什么？

original: I tend to other hurts and sicknesses that afflict our tribe. I also scout the valley for the herbs I use in my medicines.
translation: 我关心其他折磨我们部落的伤痛和疾病，有时我也会到山谷里采集些药草。

original: Midwife? I haven't seen any children around.
translation: 接生婆？那附近怎么一个孩子也没有？

original: The children and the old have already been evacuated from the camp. They are safe enough, unless the White Legs come for us in force.
translation: 孩子和老人都已经撤走了。他们很安全，除非白腿大军来找我们。

original: Have you known him long?
Six years. He attended the birth of my third child. {Fond reminiscence}It was a hard birth. The River nearly carried my water to the Father, and my child's with it.
translation: 我们认识6年了，他见证了我第三个孩子的出生。那一次很艰难，湍急的河流差一点就带着我和我的孩子去见“先父”了。

original: Daniel knew the ways of New Canaan's medicine. He stepped in and saved both of our lives.
translation: 丹尼尔懂些新迦南的医术。他倾尽全力，救下了我和孩子的生命。

original: After the birth, I asked Daniel if he would teach me what he knew of childbirth. He agreed, and so here I am.
translation: 孩子出生后，我问丹尼尔是否愿意教我他所知道的分娩知识。他同意了，于是我就是现在这个样子了。

original: Holy books?
Yes - the language of the New Canaanites is the holy tongue, for it is the language their sacred books are written in.
translation: 是的，新迦南人的语言是圣语，因为他们的圣书是用这种语言写成的。

original: The Father in the Caves brought it to them after the Judgment, but the ancestors of the Sorrows sinned against Him. They were denied the true tongue.
translation: “先父”在审判日后把这些带给我们，但悲恸部落的先祖违背了他。他们被剥夺了说圣语的权利。

original: You're right. Now, what are you going to do about it?
translation: 你说得对。现在，你打算怎么办？

original: About Daniel... I don't yet know. But I am a woman of the Sorrows, and I will have restitution for my husband.
translation: 关于丹尼尔...我还不知道。但我是悲恸部落的女人，我必须为我的丈夫报仇。

original: I agree. It was arrogant and cruel - not exactly the kind of thing a friend would do.
translation: 我很赞同。这件事他做得实在是太傲慢和无情了，一点也不像一个朋友的样子。

original: Arrogant... yes. I thought Daniel respected me, saw the Sorrows as his equals... but he manipulates us for his own ends.
translation: 傲慢...对！我原来一直以为丹尼尔很尊重我，视整个悲恸部落为他的兄弟手足...但他却为了自己的目的操纵我们牺牲我们。

original: He was only doing what he thought was best for the tribe. It wasn't an easy choice for him.
translation: 他只是做了他认为对整个部落最正确的事。对他来说做出这样的选择其实很不轻松。

original: Perhaps... I will have to have a {emphasis}very long talk with Daniel when all of this is over. Thank you for telling me this truth.
translation: 也许吧...但等到一切结束后，我必须跟他好好谈一谈。谢谢你告诉我真相。

original: I'm afraid so. Daniel kept it from you because he thought the grief would distract you.
translation: 恐怕的确是这样的。丹尼尔不告诉你，是因为他怕你因为悲伤而分心。

original: How... how {emphasis}dare he? What gives him the right? I thought Daniel was my friend, but he cares nothing for the Sorrows!
translation: 什么？他居然...谁给他的这个权利？我一直把丹尼尔当朋友，但他一点也不关心我们！

original: Let's talk more later.
Until then.
That's all for now, but I'll be back.
translation: 那先这样吧，我之后会回来的。

original: Yeah, reckon you will.
I understand. I'll respect your beliefs, then, but we need to search the cave.
translation: 我知道了。我会尊重你们的信仰，但我们必须要搜查这个洞穴。

original: I understand. I would prefer to leave as soon as possible, though.
translation: 我明白了。不过，我还是想尽快离开。

original: The Father in the Caves was just a man who lived a long time ago.
translation: 在这洞里的先父只不过是一个生活在很久以前的人。

original: You speak as one who has not heard the tales, who has not seen the sacred images. If you knew, you would not mock.
translation: 你说的话就像一个没有听过传说，没有见过圣像的人。你什么都不懂，请不要乱说话。

original: Holy wrath. Right. I'll keep an eye out for that. Bet it looks a lot like a bear trap.
translation: 够了够了，好，我会多留个心眼的。这看起来倒挺像个捕熊陷阱的。

original: Do not mock that which you do not know! Such talk can only anger the Father.
translation: 不要嘲笑那些你不了解的东西！这只会激起先父的愤怒。

original: I don't have time for your religious superstitions. It's just a cave, that's all.
translation: 我没时间听你的宗教迷信。这只是个洞，就这样。

original: It is a holy place! If we go any deeper, we will suffer for it!
translation: 这是神圣之地！如果我们继续深入，我们会为此付出代价的！

original: What are you talking about?
The Father in the Caves! The Holy Father who gave the Sorrows His succor and gave the New Canaanites His son!
translation: 洞穴里的先父！神圣的先父拯救了悲恸部落，把他的孩子赐给了新迦南人！

original: Many of the caves around the valley are sacred to him, and those who would trespass are punished by holy wrath!
translation: 这片峡谷的大部分洞穴都是属于他的，任何胆敢入侵的人都会受到神圣之怒的惩罚！

original: {Fearful, but more awe - this is a sacred place}We should not be here! This place... it belongs to the Father in the Caves! We must not profane it with our touch!
translation: 我们不该来这个地方！这里...属于洞中的先父！我们不能玷污亵渎这个圣地！

original: How would we do that?
Did Daniel not give you some of the New Canaanites' fire clay? That could easily collapse a cave and trap the beasts inside.
translation: 难道丹尼尔没有给你一些“新迦南的火粘土”？那些玩意可以很轻松地塌陷一个洞穴，把野兽困在里面。

original: Look around and see if you can find a cave nearby. It may prove easier than slaying the beasts.
translation: 附近找找，看我们能不能找到洞穴。我得说，这比单纯的屠杀要容易多了。

original: I'll be sure to tell Daniel to bring some bear-monster-thing snacks, then.
translation: 我要告诉丹尼尔，让他多准备些“熊怪小餐点”。

original: We'd better get to work then.
translation: 我们最好现在就开始行动。

original: I stand with you.
Big deal, I've killed worse.
translation: 没什么大不了的，我杀过更狠的。

original: I hope that is truth, and not a boast. But I will respect your leadership.
translation: 希望你没吹牛。但我还是会尊重你的指挥。

original: What do you propose?
Fighting so many at once is a dangerous prospect, unless you are a truly mighty warrior.
translation: 一次挑战多只妖怪确实有些风险，除非你是名真正的勇士。

original: This many so close together suggests a nest nearby - if we find it and destroy it, we might have better luck.
translation: 这里聚集着这么多，附近一定有个巢穴。如果我们能找到巢穴并及时将它摧毁，幸运的天平或许还会站在我们这一边。

original: Let's take care of it then.
As you say.
These traps must have come from somewhere - I bet the White Legs who placed them are still around.
translation: 这些陷阱一定是最近才布置的，我觉得白腿部落的人应该还在附近。

original: I would suspect you are right. Perhaps we should try to find them before they lay more traps?
translation: 我估计差不多。或许我们应该在他们布置更多陷阱前先找到他们？

original: What should we do about it?
Disarm the traps if you can - or find the White Legs who placed them and drive them off.
translation: 尽可能地解除这些陷阱，或找到设置它们的白腿部落。

original: Our advance scouts should be able to deal with them if they don't have to fight off raiders at the same time.
translation: 我们的高级侦察兵因为要对付掠夺者而无法分身。

original: Okay then, let's get down there and take care of business.
translation: 好，我们出发，争取早点干净利落地把他们解决掉。

original: I will follow your command - but I advise caution if it is possible.
translation: 我会听从你的指挥，但我建议请随时保持谨慎。

original: So the totems are sacred to them somehow? Good to know.
translation: 所以利用图腾可以对他们产生奇效。好极了。

original: Yes. If their war totems were to... "disappear," they would likely lose the will to fight.
translation: 是的。如果他们的战争图腾...“消失”，他们可能会失去战斗的意志。

original: Any advice on how to deal with the situation?
translation: 你对于应付现在这个局面有什么建议？

original: You might rush them and take them by surprise. We would be badly outnumbered then, though, and these will be strong fighters.
translation: 你可以对他们发动突然袭击，给他们一个惊喜。尽管我们初期火力占优，但随后我们人数上的劣势会成为严重的短板。

original: We might also use their superstition against them. White Leg warriors believe that to lose their totems on the eve of battle is a terrible omen.
translation: 我们也可以利用他们的迷信来对付他们。白腿部落的战士们相信，在战斗前夕失去图腾是一个可怕的预兆。

original: Yao Guai - even our strongest hunters could not hope to kill so many. There must be a nest nearby.
translation: 妖怪...即使我们最强悍的猎人也不可能杀死这么多，在这附近一定有个巢穴。

original: This is the only sure path from the Narrows to Pine Creek! They will be cut to ribbons by these traps!
translation: 这是通往松溪的唯一通道，这些陷阱可以让任何试图闯入的生命有来无回。

original: Those tents down there - that is a White Leg war camp. Do you see the war totems they've erected around the tents?
translation: 那些帐篷，就是白腿部落的战争营地。你看到他们在帐篷周围竖起的战争图腾了吗？

original: White Leg warriors pray to them for strength and savagery before battle. This is no raiding band.
translation: 白腿战士在战斗前会向它们祈祷以获得力量和野性。这不是突击小队。

original: All right, let's go.
{Glad to hear it}Goot sists. We head east, then. Joshua is at our tribe's camp in the Eastern Virgin.
translation: 很好。接下来我们要向东走，约书亚在我们位于东维琴河的部落营地那里。

original: You'd be surprised what "civilized" tribes will fight over.
translation: 你要是了解这些“文明部落”的好战本性，你一定会很惊讶。

original: Now you sound like Joshua. He always tells me the tribal life is better, that I should stay here and forget the outside world.
translation: 你现在说的话听起来像约书亚。他总是跟我说，部落的原始生活才是最好的，我应该呆在这里，忘掉外面的世界。

original: Small? Have you ever seen Hoover Dam? It's bigger than some of these mountains.
translation: 小？你有没有见过胡佛大坝啊？它比这些群山还要大得多。

original: Hah! {Suddenly realizing the player isn't lying}...Really? That's... my gods. Must be some mighty civilized folks who built that.
translation: 哈哈！...真的？哦，这...我的天啊。一定是强大的文明人建造的。

original: The only recent war I know of is when Caesar's Legion attacked Hoover Dam. Is that where he fought?
translation: 我所知道的最近一场战争，是凯撒军团进攻胡佛大坝。莫非他也参加了？

original: I don't know, he doesn't talk about it much. Maybe - but how can two civilized tribes fight over something as small as a dam?
translation: 我不知道，他不怎么说这事。也许...但是我不明白，为什么两个文明部落会围绕一个小水坝打得不可开交？

original: What happened to him?
Well, before he left, he didn't have those bandages all over his face. That tell you something?
translation: 嗯，在他走前，他脸上还没有那些绷带。你明白了吗？

original: You see his face, you'll understand.
translation: 你看看他那张脸，你就明白了。

original: Typical. Just when I get a useful minion....
translation: 不出所料，刚得到个有用的奴才...

original: Hey, it's not my fault! And what's this "minion" stuff? {That's it}Dahs eet - see you around, "civilized" man.
translation: 嘿，这不是我的过错！还有，“奴才”是什么意思？就这样了，再见，你这个“有教养”的家伙。

original: Hey, it's not my fault! And what's this "minion" stuff? {That's it}Dahs eet - see you around, "civilized" woman.
translation: 嘿，这不是我的过错！还有，“奴才”是什么意思？就这样了，再见，你这个“有教养”的女人。

original: Give my regards to Joshua, then.
translation: 那么替我向约书亚传达我的问候。

original: I will. {Goodbye my friend}Goot gonen, ahk iss.
translation: 我会的。再见了，我的朋友。

original: Are you sure? You've been a useful companion so far.
translation: 你确定？到现在为止，对我来说你一直都是个尽职尽责的好同伴。

original: Sorry - Joshua was pretty clear. Get you to Daniel, then come on home. You can take it up with him if you'd like.
translation: 不好意思，约书亚的态度相当明确：带你去见丹尼尔，然后回家。不过如果你高兴的话，以后你有机会可以和他一起迎接挑战。

original: No way, pal. I'm not traipsing around the desert with a barbarian who doesn't wear pants.
translation: 没门，伙计。我才不会和一个连裤子都不穿的原始人一起在沙漠里游荡。

original: I don't think he'll like that answer much. You change your mind, I'll be around the Dead Horses camp. {Goodbye}Goot gonen.
translation: 我觉得他不会喜欢这个回答的。如果你改变主意，你可以随时在死马部落营地附近找到我。再见。

original: I could use a guide. Let's go.
translation: 你可以做我的向导。我们走吧。

original: {Good}Goot! I really wasn't looking forward to talking to Joshua if you turned me down.
translation: 好的！如果你拒绝我，我真不知道该怎么面对约书亚。

original: Hey... as long as we're traveling together, think you could help me out with a little wildlife problem?
translation: 嘿，正好我们一起走着，你能不能帮我解决一个与野生动物有关的问题？

original: Let's move then.
Who is this Joshua?
Joshua Graham - he leads our tribe. Thanks to him, the Dead Horses are strong, and safe from our enemies.
translation: 约书亚·格拉汉姆，他是我们部落的酋长。正因为他，我们死马部落才变得强大，才不会受到敌人的伤害。

original: I'm sure he will want to talk to you. You can find him just south of here, in the Angel Cave.
translation: 我肯定他急切地想见你，你可以在南面的天使洞穴找到他。

original: White Legs? Who are they?
Nasty bunch of raiders from up by Great Salt Lake. White Legs killed your friends at the Southern Passage.
translation: 从大盐湖来的一帮掠夺者。是他们杀了和你一起同行的伙伴。

original: Not many survive White Leg raids - {slightly aside, to himself}not even by running. {Normal again}Joshua will want to hear about what happened to you.
translation: 没有多少人能从白腿部落的袭击下幸存下来。甚至逃跑都没有。约书亚或许会对你的事感兴趣。

original: I had no reason to stay for that fight.
translation: 我没理由留下来打这场仗。

original: But... {confused, stating something that seems blindingly obvious}they were White Legs! The enemy! You are a very strange outsider, but I think Joshua will want to speak to you anyways.
translation: 但...他们是白腿部落的人！他们是敌人！你真是个非常奇怪的外来者，我想约书亚会跟你说的。

original: Okay, I'll go talk to him.
I won't keep you. Maybe we talk again after.
translation: 我不耽误你时间了，也许之后我们可以再谈。

original: Hang on, I want to know more about what's going on.
translation: 等等，我想搞清楚究竟发生了什么？

original: Joshua will answer all your questions. He doesn't like being kept waiting, though - go talk to him as soon as you can.
translation: 约书亚会回答你所有的问题。但他不喜欢花太多时间等待别人，我们快点走吧。

original: Who are you?
I'm called Follows-Chalk. Joshua sent me to scout for any outsiders coming up from the Southern Passage.
translation: 我叫追踪印记。约书亚派我来监视每一个从南部通道进入锡安的外来者。

original: We can talk more about that later, though - it's not smart to keep Joshua waiting.
translation: 我们可以晚会儿再详谈，让约书亚等着是不明智的。

original: What is this place?
This is the eastern fork of the Virgin River, and it's the place we Dead Horses call home. Joshua says it is a temple to God's glory on earth.
translation: 这是维琴河的东支流，是我们死马部落称为家的地方。约书亚说这是上帝在地上荣耀的圣殿。

original: We can talk more about it later, though - it's not smart to keep Joshua waiting.
translation: 我们可以晚会儿再详谈，让约书亚等着是不明智的。

original: Glad you made it. Joshua's just to the south, inside the Angel Cave. You'll want to talk to him straight away.
translation: 很高兴你做到了。约书亚在南面的天使洞穴里。你可以直接过去跟他交谈。

original: All right, people. Been a long couple weeks, but here we are. {a big deal - Wha-la!}Zion.
translation: 好的，伙计们，经过了漫长的几周，我们终于到了。这就是，锡安！

original: I know your feet hurt, I know you're tired. But I need everyone's mind on the trail ahead.
translation: 我知道你已经腰酸腿疼，我知道你已经身心俱疲，但我要你们把头抬起来继续前进。

original: {anxious}Ain't the trail ahead worries me, Jed. Those descents we made, through that slot canyon back up there.
translation: 前方的道路令我有点担心，杰德。那些悬崖和溪谷看起来很危险。

original: Ain't no way we're getting back out the way we come. And then what?
translation: 我们不可能回到来的路上。然后怎么样？

original: {exasperated}Goddammit, Stella, heard you the first time, and the fifteenth, too
translation: 上帝啊，史黛拉，我已经听你牢骚了不知道多少次了。

original: The New Canaanites will know a way. And if they don't, we got the maps on our friend's Pip-Boy over there.
translation: 新迦南人一定知道路的。即使不知道，我们这儿有位朋友还有哔哔小子呢。

original: {raising voice, giving orders}Enough lollygagging! Get moving and keep an eye out for tribals!
translation: 好了，不许再废话了！行动起来，对那些神出鬼没的部落民时刻保持警惕！

original: Like I care. Let's just go. I'm ready.
translation: 我们走吧，我已经准备好了。

original: No objections.
{flat}God's will.
Let him keep his dignity. Give him a fighting chance.
translation: 让他保留尊严吧。给他一个战斗的机会。

original: He never had any dignity to begin with. None of them did.
translation: 他本来就没有什么尊严，他们都没有。

original: But for your sake... for the Sorrows' sake, I'll let him die on his feet.
translation: 但看在你的份上...看在悲恸部落的份上，我会让他站着死。

original: Stand up and look at what's come for you!
Joshua, you've already won. Look around you. There's no need to kill him.
translation: 约书亚，你已经赢了。看看你周围，你已经没有必要杀他了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] He has a debt to pay for what he's done and I've come to collect. And so he's chosen to cower in the water like a dumb animal.
translation: [成功] 他要为他之前所做的一切付出代价。他只配像只狗一样蜷缩在水里。

original: Don't listen to this... thing! His cries are those of a mad beast caught in a thicket! He gave no mercy to my family, and I will give none to his.
translation: 别听...这个家伙的话！野兽，只有当困在囚笼里才会嘶吼！他对我的家人丧尽天良，今天，我要以牙还牙！

original: We warned you at Syracuse, and you persisted.
translation: 我们在锡拉丘兹警告过你，但你依旧偏执。

original: You took advantage of us at New Canaan to drive us out, and like the dogs of Caesar you are, you followed us to Zion.
translation: 你把我们从新迦南赶了出来，又像凯撒的狗一样追踪我们到锡安。

original: And now you stand on holy ground, a temple to God's glory on Earth. But the only use for an animal in our temple is sacrifice!
translation: 你现在站的地方，就是上帝在地上的圣殿，但在我们的圣殿里，畜生的唯一用途就是献祭！

original: Kale watcha nei conserva oh! You understand me, don't you? Don't you?!
translation: “上帝作证，你们将无人幸免！”你明白我的意思吧，不是吗？！

original: Whatever. Joshua, put a cap in General Gobbledigook here.
translation: 无所谓了，约书亚，给这个天书将军戴上帽子。

original: {Killer!}{Bye-KAH kur}Baika-ker! You devil!
You're right. We're going to kill you, but not like this. Defend yourself!
translation: 你说得对，我们会杀掉你的，但不是以这种方式。起来，自卫！

original: {You can't fight me!}{YOO-can no ni-KUM-pah mee}Yoocan no nikumpa me! {Die, you!}{deh-YAI, you!}Deyai-yoo!
translation: {You can't fight me!}{YOO-can no ni-KUM-pah mee}你打不过我的！{Die, you!}{deh-YAI, you!}死吧！你！

original: Whoa. This isn't what I signed up for. Let me talk to Joshua about this.
translation: 哇哦，这可不是我期望的，让我和约书亚先谈谈。

original: Him hear you. You talk!
Let's do it.
God be with you.
Thank you for this. I know Daniel doesn't approve, but destroying the White Legs is the only way to ensure the Sorrows can remain in Zion.
translation: 感谢你这么做。我知道丹尼尔不会同意，但彻底摧毁白腿部落是悲恸部落留在锡安的唯一方法。

original: You and I will lead a group of Dead Horse warriors and Sorrows hunters into Three Marys from this position.
translation: 你和我率领一队死马部落战士和悲恸部落猎手从这里进入三玛丽岩。

original: Our objective is to find the White Legs' leader, Salt-Upon-Wounds, and prevent him from fleeing.
translation: 我们的目标就是找到白腿部落酋长，伤口撒盐，并且阻止他伺机逃跑。

original: Show no quarter to the White Legs we come across. Make no mistake about why we are here. This is an extermination.
translation: 对你路上遇到的白腿部落的人不要有任何怜悯之心，别搞错我们来这里的目的，这是一场种族灭绝。

original: I prefer to travel alone, thanks.
translation: 我还是更喜欢一个人行动，谢谢。

original: The lone Bighorner is the most vulnerable to its enemies. In the herd lies strength - if you reconsider your choice, I will be here. {in peace, go}{PAHZ pah-tah-soo-ba}Paz patasooba.
translation: 落单的大角羊在敌人面前最脆弱，力量在于群体。如果你重新考虑你的选择，我就在这里。安静的走吧。

original: Sounds good. Let's go.
Before we depart, our shaman, White Bird, asked me to convey his desire to speak with you.
translation: 在我们动身之前，我们的萨满，白鸟，让我转达他想和你谈谈的愿望。

original: Certainly. We should make haste, then.
Hold up, see that log over there? Take a closer look. There might be some good stuff tucked in there.
translation: 等等，你看到那边的圆木了吗？你走近点看，那里面说不定藏着好东西。

original: What would you suggest I do instead?
Hmm... you might try luring the baby out with some banana yucca. These Bighorners go crazy for the stuff.
translation: 嗯...你可以试着用香蕉丝兰作为诱饵，吸引那个小家伙。这些羊对那玩意儿非常着迷。

original: What do you know about the White Legs?
translation: 你有没有听说过“白腿部落”？

original: Used to be they raided northeast of Caliente, time to time. But then the Desert Rangers fell apart ten years ago, absorbed into the NCR.
translation: 他们以前会时不时地从东北部袭击卡连特。但10年前，沙漠游骑兵被NCR兼并了。

original: Soon enough the White Legs were swarming all over that stretch of I-15. Folks learned not to head north if they wanted to keep their scalps.
translation: 没多久，白腿部落席卷15号公路。人们都说，如果想保住头皮的话，千万不要往北走。

original: Eventually the White Legs destroyed the bridges across the Virgin River, over in Arizona. End of discussion.
translation: 后来，白腿部落摧毁了架在维琴河上的桥，亚利桑那州被彻底隔离。好了，讨论到此结束。

original: Were the 80s a gang, or a tribe?
translation: 这个“80号公路”是一个帮派，还是一个部落？

original: What's the difference? Raiders is raiders.
translation: 有什么区别？掠夺者就是掠夺者。

original: Bunch of them swept in to town and dragged off two working girls. Deputies and me gave pursuit, straight into 80s territory.
translation: 有一次，他们有一伙人闯进小镇，拖走了两个妓女。我带着我的副手们一直追赶到他们的领地。

original: By the time we caught up with the girls, there wasn't much left of them. So we turned for home.
translation: 当我们终于追上那几个女孩时，他们已经跑得无影无踪了。于是我们踏上返途之旅。

original: Made it back to Caliente without further losses, but we was watched the whole way. Never seen so few people cover so much land. Goddamn creepy.
translation: 我们安全无恙地返回卡连特，但一路上一直受到监视。我从没见过就这么几个人能占据这么大片土地，真令人毛骨悚然。

original: If the 80s had wanted to kill us, we would've been dead. Guess they figured we weren't worth the trouble.
translation: 如果他们想杀死我们，那我们早就死了。我猜，我们对他们来说就像大象眼中的蚂蚁一样，连踩一踩的价值都没有。

original: Tell me about Caliente.
translation: 跟我谈谈卡连特这个地方。

original: Place lived up to its name, that's for sure.
translation: 这地方名副其实，这是肯定的。（译者注：卡连特英文有“火热”的意思）

original: When you got fresh water and a trickle of geothermic power, always be some gang of assholes wants to kill you for it.
translation: 只要你有淡水和一点地热能，总有一帮混蛋想杀了你。

original: Spent more years and took more bullets than I care to admit protecting that hellhole from dangers, within and without.
translation: 我在那儿呆了好几年，为了保护自己，吃了很多长眼和不长眼的子弹。

original: If it wasn't the 80s or the White Legs raiding, it was someone from town drunk off his ass trying to win an argument with a shotgun.
translation: 要不是那些“80号”和“白腿”的入侵，我还在和那些醉鬼玩一枪决胜的游戏。

original: Got tired of shooting the folks I was supposed to protect. So... now I do this.
translation: 我已经厌倦了射杀那些我本该保护的人。所以...现在我干这行。

original: What was that like to grow up in New Reno?
translation: 你在新里诺时的生活怎么样？

original: Imagine New Vegas if there was no Mr. House-type fella keeping the peace, then give everybody a gun and a Jet addiction.
translation: 你就想象，如果新维加斯没有一个豪斯似的铁腕维持和平那会怎样？呵呵，很简单，每个人都是瘾君子，每个人手里都一把枪。

original: Town's run by a bunch of crime families, no law to speak of. Make trouble, and you wind up buried in Golgotha, outside town.
translation: 镇子被一群犯罪家族统治着，根本没有法律可言。一旦惹了事，你就会被埋进城外的髑髅地。

original: The scuzz factor's off the charts. Non-stop whoring and drugs. Couldn't walk down the street without getting asked to star in a porn movie.
translation: 人渣的数量已经爆表了。不间断的卖淫和吸毒，走在大街上就会被邀请出演色情电影。

original: So I got my ass out of there while I still owned it. Guess I figured the answer to every problem was rule of law. Naive, huh?
translation: 所以，我趁自己还没被糟蹋前，赶快逃离了那个地方。我以前一直以为，解决所有问题的终极答案就是法治。很天真，是吧？

original: What are you doing here?
Earning my keep. Jed hired me on as a caravan guard for this expedition of his.
translation: 赚我的生活费。杰德雇我做他的商队护卫。

original: The work suits me. I've tried staying put in one place, but it never works out.
translation: 这份工作很适合我。我曾试着呆在一个地方，但每次都持续不了多长时间。

original: Grew up in New Reno, and I couldn't put that snakepit behind me fast enough.
translation: 我在新里诺长大，我一直想尽快摆脱那个蛇窝。

original: Then I wound up wasting the prime of my life playing Sheriff in Caliente, little town north on the 93. Talk about a pain in the ass.
translation: 之后我把黄金年华都浪费在卡连特，在那里当一名警长。卡连特是靠近93号公路的一个小镇，那里连个屁都没有。

original: You ask me, best to keep moving. At least the scenery changes.
translation: 要我说，最好的生活方式还是四处走动。至少风景会变。

original: Fine. What do you need?
Sorry, but I'm not going on a scavenger hunt for you.
translation: 抱歉，但我不会为你去玩寻宝游戏。

original: The choice is yours, of course, but you're not going to find a way back to the Mojave without our help.
translation: 当然，选择权在你，但没有我们的帮助，你是回不去莫哈维的。

original: I'll see what I can do.
Thank you. Follows-Chalk can help you find your way around the valley.
translation: 谢谢你。追踪印记可以帮助你避免在这山谷中迷路。

original: He's inexperienced, but he knows enough of our language to ignore the taboos about Pre-War buildings.
translation: 他没有经验，但他对我们的语言有足够的了解，可以忽略战前建筑的禁忌。

original: Thank you. Now obviously, taboos against Pre-War buildings won't be a matter for you - but take caution when you go rooting around in them.
translation: 谢谢你！很显然，战前建筑的禁忌对你来说不是什么问题，但你在里面翻找的时候还是要小心。

original: Taboo?
The Sorrows believe in a spirit that lives in the caves, say the spirit punished them once for trespassing.
translation: 悲恸部落相信在山洞里住着一位灵魂，他们说他们曾经因为贸然侵入而受到灵魂的惩戒。

original: They put special marks around the cave entrances to keep people out. It doesn't work on the White Legs, of course, but the Dead Horses are spooked.
translation: 他们在那些洞穴入口处抹上白色标记，以防同族人进入。尽管这对白腿部落不管用，但死马部落的人却能在远处就被吓住。

original: Why don't you or Daniel do it?
translation: 为什么你和丹尼尔不去呢？

original: We are responsible for leading and protecting the Sorrows and Dead Horses. They are smart people, but not as worldly as you or I.
translation: 我们有责任带领和保护悲恸部落和死马部落。他们都是聪明人，但不像你我那么世故。

original: I am preparing the Dead Horses for war and Daniel is preparing the Sorrows for... other things.
translation: 我正在为死马部落做战争的准备，而丹尼尔...他有别的打算。

original: How about I go find dear Daniel and shake the information out of him?
translation: 不如我去找亲爱的丹尼尔，从他嘴里把消息套出来？

original: There are many reasons why that would be a bad idea. I will illuminate three.
translation: 这不是一个好主意，原因有很多。我帮你点明三点。

original: First, do not believe that because Daniel is a missionary he is incapable of or unwilling to defend himself.
translation: 首先，不要因为丹尼尔是个传教士就认为他没有能力保护自己。

original: Second, if you harm Daniel or any of the Sorrows or Dead Horses, I will find you. Make no mistake. God willing, you will not leave this valley.
translation: 其次，如果你敢伤害丹尼尔或任何悲恸或死马的部落民，我会找到你，毫无疑问。一切顺利的话，你别想离开这个山谷。

original: Lastly, waging war against good people is bad for the soul. This may not seem important to you now, but it's the most important thing I've said.
translation: 最后，对善良的人们发动袭击会玷污你的灵魂。这对你来说可能不重要，但这是我说过的最重要的话。

original: Don't try to get me to help you. I'm not interested.
translation: 别以为我会帮你，我一点儿也不感兴趣。

original: There are only so many ways you could have entered Zion from the south. You descended by routes that you cannot safely ascend to return to the Mojave.
translation: 从南部进入锡安的路就那么多，你走了一条无法安全返回莫哈维的。

original: I'm not telling you this as a trick. Whether you want to help us or not, you can't get back without Daniel's assistance.
translation: 我这不是在跟你开玩笑。不管你愿不愿意帮我们，没有丹尼尔的帮助你是回不去的。

original: I'm sure he'll be willing to assist you, but we have other responsibilities at the moment.
translation: 我肯定他会愿意帮助你的，但我们现在还有很多其他重要的事情要做。

original: I'm not going to leave without offering to help. What can I do?
translation: 我不会不帮忙就走的，我能做什么？

original: {referring to the parable of the good samaritan}You're a good neighbor to us. We all go through periods of darkness. In such times, we can turn to the Lord, but it's good to have friends.
translation: {referring to the parable of the good samaritan}你是个好人，谢谢你。我们会经历黑暗的时期，在这种时候，我们通常都会向主祈祷，但有朋友也是好事。

original: Daniel and I need Pre-War tools to help us navigate beyond Zion. Should we need to evacuate, these instruments will be vital to us.
translation: 丹尼尔和我需要一些战前工具来帮我们在锡安导航。一旦我们需要撤离，这些工具将会非常重要。

original: Normally, we would have some of the Dead Horses or Sorrows look for them, but many Pre-War buildings in the valley are taboo. They won't go inside.
translation: 正常情况下，我们会派一些死马部落或悲恸部落的人去收集，但这山谷里大部分的战前建筑对他们来说都是禁区，他们绝对不会进去的。

original: Nice guns.
In the Great Basin and Colorado Plateau, all tribes are known for a specific weapon.
translation: 在大盆地和科罗拉多高原，所有的部落都以一种特定的武器而闻名。

original: White Legs are known for their big submachine guns, "storm drums." They broke into an armory near Spanish Fork and have been using them for years.
translation: 白腿部落以擅长的大型冲锋枪“风暴之鼓”而闻名。他们闯入了西班牙福克附近的一个军械库并使用了好多年。

original: Of course, the Dead Horses have their wooden war clubs and even the Sorrows have their Yao Guai gauntlets.
translation: 当然，死马部落拥有自己最拿手的木制战棍，悲恸部落拥有攻击力惊人的妖怪拳套。

original: This type of .45 Automatic pistol was designed by one of my tribe almost four hundred years ago. Learning its use is a New Canaanite rite of passage.
translation: 这种.45自动式手枪，由我的部落祖先在约400年前设计发明。学习熟练掌握它，是我们新迦南人成人典礼的一部分。

original: Pray? God? What are you talking about?
translation: 祈祷？上帝？你到底在说什么？

original: I am a New Canaanite. We believe we are the heirs of a spiritual tradition given to our ancestors thousands of years ago.
translation: 我是一名新迦南人。我们相信，我们继承了在数千年前我们的祖先已就积淀的精神价值传统。

original: We have made and kept covenants with our Lord, God, to honor his laws. In exchange, we are promised eternal salvation after this life.
translation: 我们与我们的主、上帝签订了盟约，我们尊重他的一切法律。作为交换，我们将得到今生之后永恒的救赎。

original: A day will come when our Lord returns to judge us all. Until then, we must honor his laws and start others along the path of salvation if we can.
translation: 总有一天，我们的主会回来审判我们所有人。直到那一天来到之前，我们都必须遵守他的律法，如果可以的话，带领其他人走上救赎之路。

original: That's why we trade with others and work the tribes. We have more than food and medicine to offer. Good news is our most valuable commodity.
translation: 这就是为什么我们和其他部落贸易与合作的原因。我们不仅仅能提供食物和医药。福音是我们最有价值的商品。

original: How do I get out of here?
translation: 我怎么才能离开这个地方？

original: Even though you made your way in, there's no easy way back. Without a map, you'll die in the wilderness.
translation: 尽管你历尽千辛来到了这个地方，但回头路并不轻松。如果没有地图的帮助，你很快会曝尸荒野。

original: Daniel, one of our missionaries, can help you, but you've caught us at an... inconvenient time. We're under continual threat from the White Legs.
translation: 丹尼尔，我们的传教士之一，他能够帮助你。但你来得...很不是时候。我们现在正在遭受白腿部落的威胁。

original: I came here with the Happy Trails Caravan Company to make contact with the New Canaanites.
translation: 我跟随欢乐小径商队来到这个地方，我们本来是希望能和新迦南人取得联系。

original: Happy Trails. {quietly remembering}I remember. {small smile}They were good friends.
translation: 欢乐小径。我记得。他们是我们的好朋友。

original: {darker}I have bad news for your employers. New Canaan was destroyed, its citizens scattered. All because of the White Legs. And Caesar, of course.
translation: {darker}但我有个坏消息要告诉你的雇主。新迦南已经被摧毁了，居民四散而逃。这一切都是白腿部落造成的，当然，还有凯撒。

original: The White Legs want to join the Legion. Caesar's rite of passage is the destruction of the New Canaanites, almost assuredly because of me.
translation: 白腿部落想要加入军团。凯撒称，消灭新迦南人将是他们的通过仪式。可以肯定是因为我。

original: The good news is that we can help you find your way back. Daniel, one of the other New Canaanites, has made many maps of the region.
translation: 好消息是，我们可以帮助你找到回家的路。另一个新迦南人，丹尼尔，他为这个地区绘制了很多详细的地图。

original: The bad news is that we can't help you right now. Not with everything that's going on.
translation: 坏消息是，我们现在没法帮助你。我们现在还有很多棘手的事情。

original: PER check.
{laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
You're lying. You've never been to Vault 22.
translation: 你撒谎。你从来没去过22号避难所。

original: Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: PER check.
{laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.
You're lying. You have no idea where Vault 22 is.
translation: 你撒谎。你根本就不知道22号避难所在哪里。

original: Yeah, so don't bring it up again!
Sorry - didn't mean to be pushy.
translation: 抱歉，我不是有意顶撞你。

original: Carry some of my gear, and I'll keep my mouth shut.
translation: 带上我的装备，我会闭嘴的。

original: {pissed off}I travel light on purpose, okay? But fine, I'll tell Jed I'm carrying less so you can carry more. What an asshole.
translation: {pissed off}我轻装上阵是有目的的，好吗？算了，我去和杰德说我少带点，算你碰上个好人。你个混账东西。

original: What I want is for you to scram. This expedition doesn't need you.
translation: 我想要你赶快滚蛋，这趟旅行不需要你。

original: I'm convincing, you're not. He'll believe me.
translation: 我比你有说服力，他会相信我的。

original: Hey hey hey, why you got to go and be like that! Fuck!
translation: 嘿嘿嘿，你为什么要这么说？操！

original: Science
[SUCCEEDED] Bullshit! Ain't nothing wrong with my Pit-Boy! {correcting yourself}I mean Pip-Boy!
translation: [成功] 胡说！我的比比小子根本没坏！哦，我是说哔哔小子！

original: Your Pip-Boy isn't working. The screen's locked up, and the reboot button is missing.
translation: 你的哔哔小子根本就没在运行。屏幕都已被锁定，就连重启按钮也无影无踪。

original: [FAILED] {sarcastic}{pretending you actually know something}Fat chance! Like I got time to bring you up to speed. Fuck that.
translation: [失败] {sarcastic}{pretending you actually know something}开什么玩笑！我可不会在你身上浪费我宝贵的时间！快滚开。

original: Any chance you could show me some new ways to use my Pip-Boy?
translation: 你能帮我解释解释如何使用哔哔小子么？

original: {keeping voice down}Look, this is a sweet gig for me! Don't go fucking it up! What are you after, anyways?
translation: {keeping voice down}看，这玩意儿有有趣！喂，别弄坏了！说你呢。

original: Speech
[SUCCEEDED] Go ahead! Your word against mine, fucko! See what happens!
translation: [成功] 去吧！你已经冒犯我了！等着瞧！

original: I don't think your Pip-Boy works. I'd better go tell Jed.
translation: 我认为你的哔哔小子已经坏了。我最好去告诉杰德。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, too bad one of them is worn by a total fucking idiot!{chuckle - doesn't occur to you that you might be the one who's an idiot}
translation: [失败] 那是，只可惜其中一个被一个2B带着！

original: I guess two Pip-Boys is better than one, anyway.
translation: 我猜，不管怎样，有两个哔哔小子总比只有一个好。

original: Did you notice I'm wearing a Pip-Boy, too?
translation: 你有没有注意，我也有一个哔哔小子？

original: {you totally didn't notice, but pretend you did}Huh? {beat}...Of course I noticed! First thing I noticed about you!
translation: 哈？...我当然注意到了！我第一个注意到的人就是你！

original: Me, I'm so used to wearing mine, it's just normal. Don't think you're someone special just because you got one.
translation: 我，我只习惯带我自己的，它很平常。不过不要以为自己也有一个就有多了不起。

original: You're lying. I've been to Vault 22. No one's lived there in 150 years.
translation: 你在撒谎。我去过22号避难所，那里已经有150年没人住过了。

original: {laughs uncomfortably}You been to Vault two-two, huh?
translation: 你去过...二...二号避难所，啊？

original: I've heard of some strange goings-on at Vault 22. Know any details?
translation: 我听说22号避难所里发生了些奇怪的事，你知道细节吗？

original: I know everything! I know all about it! But I ain't about to tell the likes of you!
translation: 我什么都知道！我全知道！但我不会告诉你这种人的！

original: I have a sworn vow of secrecy, or something like that, to the people I left behind!
translation: 我已经发过誓要保密，绝对不向任何人提起。

original: Where is Vault 22 located?
I can't tell you that! I have a sworn vow of secrecy, or something like that, to all the people I left behind.
translation: 我凭什么告诉你？！我发过誓要保密，绝对不向任何人提起。

original: What do you use your Pip-Boy for?
Sorry, the shit I do with it is so far over your head, be wasting my time to put it in words you could understand!
translation: 对不起，我能用它做的事已经超出了你的理解范围，你是在浪费我的时间来用你能理解的语言来表达!

original: Basically, it makes me badass. {correcting yourself}More badass, I mean. It's totally mind-blowing shit. {until yesterday, you thought it was just a bracelet, but you don't want the player to know that}It ain't just some bracelet, know what I mean?
translation: 基本上，它让我变得很厉害，我的意思是更厉害了。这太令人兴奋了，它不仅仅是一个手镯，明白我的意思吗？

original: Jed says it's got maps and shit like that, so that's how I'm gonna guide this caravan where it needs to go!{realizing you accidentally admitted you didn't know what the Pip-Boy did before Jed told you} Not that I didn't know all that already!
translation: 杰德说它上面可以显示地图，所以我就要靠这个东西为整支商队导航。不是说我之前不知道这些！

original: Where'd you get the Vault suit?
translation: 你从哪弄到的这套避难所连身衣？

original: Where the fuck you think? Vault two-two! That's where I grew up!
translation: 你他妈以为呢？二二号避难所！我是在那儿长大的！

original: Never mind, I don't want to spend caps on that right now.
translation: 别在意，我现在不想就此花任何一分钱。

original: {angry}No sweat off my tits, asshole. Guess you better start deciding what gear you're going to leave behind.
translation: 送上门的机会都不要，蠢货。我猜你可以开始好好考虑该把什么东西扔掉了。

original: I'll give you 50 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你50个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: I'll give you 75 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你75个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: I'll give you 100 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
translation: 如果你能说服杰德同意让我能再背点东西，我就给你100个瓶盖。

original: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.
translation: 一言为定。你运气真好，他对我很信任。

original: Never mind. It's your problem, not mine.
translation: 没关系。反正是你的问题，不是我的。

original: Why'd you bring it up, then? When the withdrawal hits and I feel like killing something, I'll know where to start!
translation: 你干嘛要挑明？如果毒瘾来了，我想杀人的时候，我知道从谁开始了！

original: 80 caps.
That much for a dose? Fucking robbery!
{angry}All right, here's your money! Don't spend it all one place!
Ten hits for 300 caps.
Ten hits'll last me a good while. Worth every cap. Now fuck off.
translation: 10针，哈，能维持很长时间了。值！现在滚开。

original: Five hits for 150 caps.
That'll last me a while! Nice. Now take your caps and fuck off.
translation: 太好了！给，拿上我的瓶盖，然后滚开。

original: Three hits for 90 caps.
Three hits? Like that's gonna hold me? Fine, I'll take them.
Two hits for 60 caps.
Two hits? Ain't gonna last long. Fine, hand it over.
translation: 2针？根本持续不了多久。好吧，快拿出来。

original: One hit for 30 caps.
One lousy hit? That'll cover me for an hour! Hand it over.
translation: 一大针？哈，可以轻松一小时了！快拿出来。

original: Yeah, leave now. Before the withdrawal hits you out on the trail, no Psycho for miles.
translation: 现在就滚蛋吧你。等到了半路时毒瘾发作，到时几公里范围内都不会有疯狂药。

original: {pissed off}Fine! You win, asshole! Enjoy leading the expedition into a fucking ambush! Hope you all die!
translation: 好！你赢了，我混！好好享受踏入陷阱的快乐吧！希望你们都早点死！

original: I can sell you a dose of Fixer, but it won't be cheap.
translation: 我可以卖你一些瘾头解，但它们可不便宜。

original: Fixer? Never said I wanted to kick the habit!
translation: 瘾头解？我可不想碰那玩意儿！

original: {disappointed}Guess I can use it when I run out of the good stuff. How much?
translation: 但，如果实在走投无路了，也只能靠它了。你卖多少钱？

original: I've got Psycho to sell, but it won't come cheap.
translation: 我这可有一堆疯狂药，但它们可不便宜。

original: {greedy, keeping voice down}All right, all right - I am a little light. How many hits you holding?
translation: 好吧好吧，我确实带得不多。你一共有多少针？

original: How much Psycho you got stashed away? If you run out on the trail... the withdrawal's not pleasant.
translation: 你究竟藏了多少疯狂药？如果你中途用完了...你自己心里清楚毒瘾发作的后果。

original: Goddammit, I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!
translation: 上帝，我可从没说过什么疯狂药！

original: But, uh... {sobering}Just talking {mispronouncing "hypothetically"}hypno-theoretically here... Got any suggestions?
translation: 但是，呃...理论上，这...你，你有什么建议？

original: {Barter Check} for extra gear.
[FAILED] Ricky travels light on purpose, asshole! If you're looking for a slave, ask someone else!
translation: [失败] 我轻装上阵是有目的的，蠢货！如果你在物色奴隶，找别人去！

original: Looks like you're traveling light. What would you say to carrying some of my stuff?
translation: 看起来你准备轻装上阵。那你能不能帮我背点的东西？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I travel light on purpose, okay? But if the price is right, I'll tell Jed I'm carrying less - so you can carry more. What's your offer?
translation: [成功] 我轻装上阵是有目的的，ok？...但，如果价钱合理的话，我可以和杰德说说，帮你多拿点东西。要不你开个价吧。

original: Looks like you're traveling light. Carry some items for me, and I'll make it worth your while.
translation: 看起来你准备轻装上阵。如果你愿意帮我驮点东西，我会补偿你的。

original: Medicine check.
[SUCCEEDED] {defensive}Hey hey hey! Fuck you! I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!
translation: [成功] {defensive}我靠！操你丫的！我可从没提到过什么疯狂药！

original: Unwarranted hostility and general agitation. How long have you been a Psycho addict?
translation: 无来由的暴躁和综合性的兴奋。你疯狂药上瘾已经多久了？

original: [FAILED] Yeah, Doc, I'm feeling great, fuck you very much. Asshole.
translation: [失败] 是的，医生，我感觉很好。操你丫的，蠢货。

original: Are you feeling all right?
I see you're wearing a Pip-boy and Vault suit.
translation: 我看到你戴着一个哔哔小子，穿着一身避难所服。

original: {pissed off}Nice job, Eagle Eye! Of course I got a Pit-Boy and a Vault suit! So what?
translation: {pissed off}好眼光！我当然有哔哔小子和避难所外套了！那又怎样？

original: Ewww. I think I'll pass.
I don't think so, honey! You won't be able to resist!
translation: 我可不这么认为，亲爱的！你到时绝对不会有抵抗力的！

original: Guns
[SUCCEEDED] Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!
translation: [成功] 嘿！你个婊子！我只是想表示一下友好！

original: Great, I'll see what I'm shooting at.
translation: 好极了，我想看看我的枪法有多准。

original: Black Widow
Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!
translation: 嘿！你个婊子！我只是想表示一下友好！

original: I'll bring my tweezers and a microscope.
translation: 我会同时带上我的镊子和显微镜。

original: Do you have any other special skills or abilities?
translation: 你还有什么其他的能力或特技？

original: {hostile}Well, I grew up near Dayglow out west, so yeah, I grew a third nut that glows in the dark!{chuckle}
translation: {hostile}啊，我在西部的日辉城长大，所以对，我长了第三个可以在黑暗中发光的“蛋蛋”！

original: I'll drop trou for you out on the trail after dark, sis. Let you see what you're working with, know what I mean?
translation: 等天黑了我会在小路上脱裤子给你看的，姐姐。让你看看你在做什么，懂我的意思吗？

original: What a load of crap. The eyeslits of T-series power armor are bullet-proof!
translation: 满口胡言。T系列的动力甲是防弹的！

original: {startled, no idea what you're talking about}Then I guess this dumb fucker's armor musta been... D-series or something!
translation: 那，我猜那个白痴的装甲...大概是D系列的，或者别的什么系列！

original: All I know is, he died up real dead when I killed him, okay?
translation: 我只知道，他死了，我杀的，ok？

original: Guns Check
[SUCCEEDED] There so is! Or it was a 9mm{millimeter} or a 10, I don't know! Don't care!
translation: [成功] 啊，对了！是9mm，或者是10mm！总之我才不在乎呢！

original: {flustered}Said I was good at killing shit up! Never said I was good with numbers!
translation: {flustered}说我擅长杀人！从没说过我擅长数学！

original: Too bad there's no such thing as an 11mm submachinegun.
translation: 很遗憾，没有所谓的11毫米冲锋枪这种东西。

original: [FAILED] Whatever. When you're me - a Deadeye - shots like that ain't nothing special. It's just what I do.
translation: [失败] 无论如何，这一枪算是打出去了。没什么特别的，仅此而已。

original: What a shot!
Please go on. This promises to be entertaining.
translation: 请继续，我怎么觉得越来越好玩了。

original: I was walking along, minding my own, and up pops one of them Brotherhoods. He yells {imitate authoritarian voice}"Hand over that laser rifle, asshole!"
translation: 我当时一个人走在路上，正思考着一些问题，这时迎面走过来一个兄弟会的家伙，朝我吼：“把你的激光步枪交出来，蠢货！”

original: So I hand it over, just to make him think I'm scared! But really I'm not! I never am!
translation: 于是我交出来了，因为我想让他误以为我害怕！但事实上我没有！我也从不会！

original: Before he knows what hit him, I draw my 11mm{millimeter} machinegun and BAM! BAM! Right through the eyeslit in his helmet! D.O.A.!
translation: 在他还没明白过来怎么回事前，我抄起11mm冲锋枪朝他飞快地倾泻子弹！哈，只见他的眼珠飞溅，脑袋开花！

original: You're saying that you killed a Brotherhood of Steel Paladin?
translation: 你是说，你杀了一个钢铁兄弟会的圣骑士？

original: {you don't know what a "Paladin" is}What's it sound like I'm saying? If I was saying what you said I was saying, then yeah, I said it!
translation: 你觉得我在说什么？如果我说的和你说的一样，那是，我说了！

original: [SUCCEEDED] {making it up as you go}No, no, you heard me right. "Deathjaws!" They're like Deathclaws - but bigger teeth!
translation: [成功] {making it up as you go}不，不，你没听错。“死亡咬！”，它们只是长得像死亡爪而已，而且牙齿要更大！

original: "Deathjaws," huh? Did you mean to say "Deathclaws?"
translation: “死亡咬”，嗯？你是不是想说“死亡爪”？

original: [FAILED] Just how green are you? Everybody heard of Deathjaws. You better hope I'm around if you run into one.
translation: [失败] 你也太小白了吧？死亡咬之名无人不晓。你最好天天祈祷着，万一你碰到它的时候我就在你身旁。

original: "Deathjaws?" I've never heard of those...
translation: “死亡咬”？我从没听说过这种生物...

original: That's quite a story.
Hell yeah it's quite a story! But I'm quite a man, so stories like that follow me everywhere!
translation: 那是当然！我是个真正的男人，在我身后像这样的小故事数不胜数！

original: Or there was the time one of them Steel Brotherhood assholes made the mistake of messing with me! Last mistake he {emphasize "ever"}ever made!
translation: 哦，有一次一个钢铁兄弟会的家伙惹恼了我！哼，结果那成了他平生中犯的最后一次错误！

original: "Deadeye," huh? How did you get that nickname?
translation: “神枪手”，哈？你这个绰号怎么来的？

original: {you stupid?}Uh, how you think? I shoot things in the eye, that's how good I am! Yeah, I'm that good!
translation: 啊，那你以为怎么来的？跟你说，只要进入我视线范围内的，没有一个不会倒下的！操，我真他妈牛逼！

original: Why, uh, once I got jumped by three... {trying to remember "Deathclaws," but you get it wrong}Deathjaws! Except actually it was four of them! Imagine that!
translation: 至于为什么，哦，我有一次碰到...3只死亡咬！哦，不，是4只！你猜怎么着？

original: But I didn't panic, because... {beat}because I never panic! What I did was become a storm of death! Shot every one of them monsters "pop" in the eye!
translation: 我他妈才不怕呢，因为...因为我毫无畏惧！因为我是死亡风暴！一枪打爆所有怪物的眼睛！

original: You do anything around here, besides talk too much?
translation: 你在这除了废话连篇还能做什么吗？

original: You want to know what I do, Bud? Anything I fucking want!
translation: 你想知道我还能做什么，伙计？我他妈的想要什么就有什么！

original: You want to know what I do, Toots? Anything I fucking want!
translation: 你想知道我能干什么，哥们？我他妈的想要什么就有什么！

original: You do anything around here, besides make women sick?
translation: 除了让女人生病，你还做过别的事吗？

original: I'm one of a kind! I been places, see? And done things - lots of them!
translation: 我是独一无二的！我去过很多地方，明白吗？并且做了很多事情！

original: And when it's time to kill shit up? Hell yeah, I'm a fucking storm of death!
translation: 知道什么时候是开枪的最佳时机？哈，倒在我枪下的冤魂数也数不过来，因为我是死亡风暴！

original: Something or someone make the mistake of crossing Ricky? I'll fucking deadeye him, her, or it!
translation: 如果有谁或什么东西惹恼了我？哼，我就弄死他，干死她，搞死它！

original: {making it up on the fly}In fact... yeah, in fact, that's my nickname! "Deadeye" Ricky - that's my name!
translation: 事实上...对，事实上，这才是我的绰号！“神枪手”里基！这才是我的名字！

original: Umm... tell me about this vision quest again?
translation: 嗯...关于这个任务能否再帮我讲述一遍？

original: You go to cave. Find Ghost of She. Lay ghost to rest. This your quest. Bring peace where was strife. Go!
translation: 进入洞穴。找到“她的幽灵”。让她安息。这就是任务。为有纷争的地方带来和平，快去！

original: Okay then... I guess... I guess I don't have any questions after all.
translation: 那好吧...我想...我想我也没什么问题了。

original: Crazy old man. I'm not doing anything for you.
translation: 疯老头子。我不会帮你做任何事情。

original: Spirits guide you whether you listen or not. Smarter to listen, hmm?
translation: 灵魂引导你来此，不管你愿意与否。聪明点，听我说。

original: Okay then. I guess I'll just... go then.
translation: 那好吧，我想我就...马上就去。

original: Go! Return maybe yes, return maybe no. But go.
Wait a minute, what if I don't want to do any of that?
translation: 等一下，如果我什么都不想做的话会怎样？

original: <White Bird stares at you wordlessly.>
Let's talk about something else.
What would you speak of?
What's with this obsession you seem to have with "civilization?"
translation: 你说的这个令你迷上“文明”的东西是什么？

original: Let me tell you a story. When I was a boy, a man came through the valley with one of the caravans. Tall man, big mustache, carried a guitar.
translation: 我来给你讲个故事。当我还是个小孩子的时候，有个男人跟随着一队商队来到这个山谷。他个子很高，胡子很浓，背着一把吉他。

original: I asked what he did for his living, and the interpreter told me he was a singer.
translation: 我问他是做什么的，翻译告诉我他是个歌手。

original: "What is that?" I asked. The man explained that he went from place to place and sang for people, who gave him food and shelter and care in return.
translation: “歌手是什么？”我问。那人解释说，就是居无定所，在不同的地方辗转，通过为人们唱歌换取食物、庇护与关心。

original: I couldn't believe that there was a place in this world where a man could do that. I promised myself then that one day I'd explore that world myself.
translation: 我实在不敢相信在这个世界上居然还有人以此为生。我向自己承诺，将来有一天一定要自己亲自去探索这个世界。

original: Ya? What did he say?
I talked to Joshua about your thoughts on civilization.
translation: 我和约书亚就你对文明的观点交换了意见。

original: For as long as I remember, the Dead Horses have thought that places of the old world were taboo. Doesn't look so spooky to me.
translation: 从我记事起，死马的人们就认为旧世界的地方是禁忌之地。在我看来并不可怕。

original: The Narrows up ahead, that's the Sorrows' territory. They're peaceful enough, but you don't want to make them mad.
translation: 前面的狭路，就是悲恸部落的领地。他们很友好，希望你不要惹他们生气。

original: Heads up, this is the Three Marys. White Legs territory. You sure you want to head in there?
translation: 抬头看，这就是三玛丽岩，白腿部落的领地。你确定还想继续往前？

original: Where do they come from?
That's the weird part - normally the White Legs keep to the Great Salt Lake. I don't know what brought them down this far south.
translation: 这就是最奇怪的地方，正常情况下，白腿部落是聚居在大盐湖那里。我不知道是什么风把他们吹到这么远的南方。

original: Wait, what? New Canaan was wiped out? How?
translation: 等等，什么？新迦南被摧毁了？怎么会？

original: That's what Joshua said. White Legs came down from Great Salt Lake in force - fell on New Canaan before they could mount a defense.
translation: 约书亚就是这么说的。白腿部落从大盐湖下来，在新迦南人还没建立起有效防御前，摧毁了整个新迦南。

original: Joshua found some of the survivors led by a man named Daniel. Most of them have fled the valley, but Daniel stayed on with the Sorrows tribe.
translation: 约书亚找到了几名幸存者，带领他们的是一个叫丹尼尔的人。他们中大部分都已经离开山谷了，但丹尼尔在悲恸部落留了下来。

original: He and Joshua have been arguing over whether to stand and fight the White Legs or take the Sorrows and the Dead Horses out of the valley.
translation: 他和约书亚一直在争论，到底应该带着两个部落一起对付白腿，还是带着他们也一起离开这个山谷。

original: You've got a funny idea about what the Mojave's like, but I'll go with you and see your boss.
translation: 你对莫哈维的描述真有趣，但现在我要跟你一起去见你的老大。

original: {Glad to hear it}Goot sists. Maybe while you're there you can tell me about where you came from, yeah?
translation: 太好了。或许等我们到了营地，你可以再跟我详细聊聊你来的那个地方。

original: Tell me about Waking Cloud's family.
translation: 跟我说说唤醒白云的家人吧。

original: {a bit of apprehension}What uh... what do you want to know, exactly? I'm sure she could tell you much better than I.
translation: 什么呃...你到底想知道什么？我相信她会比我更清楚地告诉你。

original: {going through withdrawal}I ain't feeling good, man. I feel like shit! I got the shakes, got the sweats. This fucking sucks!
translation: 我浑身不舒服，伙计。我快撑不住了！我浑身颤抖背上布满汗水。真是糟糕透顶！

original: {high on Psycho}Oh man, yeah! Trigger finger is feeling {emphasis}itch-ay! {yelling out to the canyon}Come on, assholes! Show yourselves and Deadeye Ricky'll blow your fucking heads off!
translation: 哦，伙计们！扣动扳机的手指感觉很痒！来吧，你们这帮混蛋！快出来，“神枪手”里基会把你们的脑袋打爆的！哈哈哈！

original: Ah, the Eastern Virgin. What's the phrase? "House sweet house?"
translation: 啊，东维琴河。这什么意思？“甜美的房子”？

original: That's Pine Creek up there. Supposedly it's one of only two ways out of Zion Valley. Of course, without a map, good luck surviving.
translation: 那边就是松溪，据说这是离开锡安山谷仅有的两条路之一。当然，没有地图的话，只能祝你好运了。

original: I like your bear glove. Where can I get one?
translation: 我喜欢你的熊爪拳套，我在哪里能弄到？

original: A Sorrow's Yao Guai Fist is a sacred symbol. It shows that we belong to the tribe and have willingly undertaken a dangerous quest to aid the tribe.
translation: 悲恸部落的每一个妖怪拳套都是神圣的象征。它表示我们属于这个部落，并且愿意承担一项危险的任务来帮助这个部落。

original: Each Sorrow makes his own - and only after hunting and slaying a Yao Guai that threatened our people.
translation: 每一个族人都是自己制作，当然，是在亲手杀掉一个威胁我们的妖怪之后。

original: Our shaman, White Bird, oversees the rites. Perhaps if you spoke to him, he would allow you to undertake such a quest.
translation: 我们的萨满，白鸟，监管着这项仪式。如果你去找他谈，他或许会允许你执行这样一件任务。

original: Maybe later, if there's time.
I do hope you will reconsider. I will point out his cave on your map, should you wish to speak to him later.
translation: 我希望你能重新考虑一下。我会在你的地图上指出他所在的洞穴，希望你晚会儿去找他谈一谈。

original: Okay, I'll talk to him.
Excellent. His cave overlooks the camp - I will show you where.
translation: 好极了。他的洞穴所在位置可以俯瞰整个营地，我来只给你看。

original: Any idea what he wants?
translation: 你知道他找我想干什么吗？

original: He did not say. White Bird is notoriously close-lipped. But he is wise, and you would do well to speak to him.
translation: 他没有说，白鸟是出了名的沉默寡言。但他很聪明，你最好和他谈谈。

original: Wildlife problem? What kind of wildlife?
translation: 野生动物的问题？哪一种野生动物？

original: All right, let's go.
Right.
I'll see you on the other side.
Go with God, brother.
Go with God, sister.
This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
