translation: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: Maybe later, if there's time.
As you wish. I will point out his cave on your map, should you wish to speak to him later.
translation: 如你所愿。我会在你的地图上指出他所在的洞穴，希望你晚会儿去找他谈一谈。

original: Okay, I'll talk to him.
Excellent. His cave overlooks the camp - I will show you where.
translation: 好极了。他的洞穴所在位置可以俯瞰整个营地，我来只给你看。

original: Any idea what he wants?
translation: 你知道他找我想干什么吗？

original: He did not say. White Bird is notoriously close-lipped. But he is wise, and you would do well to speak to him.
translation: 他没有说，白鸟是出了名的沉默寡言。但他很聪明，你最好和他谈谈。

original: Wildlife problem? What kind of wildlife?
translation: 野生动物的问题？哪一种野生动物？

original: I'll see you on the other side.
This is taking too long. We can't let Salt-Upon-Wounds escape. I'm going to find a way around. God willing, we will finish this together.
translation: 我们浪费的时间太多了，绝不能让伤口撒盐逃跑。我去寻找另一条路。上帝保佑我们尽快结束这一切。

original: I could talk to him, maybe he'll open up more to me.
translation: 我可以跟他谈谈，他或许愿意对我讲。

original: Perhaps he will. I sometimes feel he thinks he must protect me. If he has news, I would know of it.
translation: 也许他会的。有时我觉得他认为他必须保护我。如果他有消息，我会知道的。

original: <Lie> Daniel isn't avoiding talking about your family. He's just preoccupied with all of this.
translation: <撒谎> 丹尼尔不是不愿意和你讨论你的家庭，他只是太全神贯注于周遭所有事情。

original: This is true? You spoke to him? Oh, that is a relief. {Thank you, friend.}{GRAH-sahs nah-NAY}Grasas, na'ne.
translation: 真的吗？你跟他说过了？哦，那我心里的石头就放下了。谢谢你，我的朋友。

original: Follows-Chalk seems like he's interested in seeing more of the world.
translation: 追踪印记似乎对亲眼见识外面的世界很感兴趣。

original: I thought he might. It's been some time since I've visited... {emph}civilized places. I don't have fond memories of them.
translation: 我就知道他会。自从我上次访问那些...文明之地，已经过去很久了。我对他们没什么美好的回忆。

original: But I have always seen these places from the outside. I'd rather not influence him more than I already do. Why don't you talk to him?
translation: 但我心里非常清楚这些“文明之地”的本质，我不想对他施加更多的影响了。为什么你不去跟他谈一谈？

original: <Lie> That a man must follow his heart no matter where it leads him.
translation: <撒谎> 是男人，就要相信自己的直觉，坚信自己的信念。

original: Really? He said that? Hoo! I'm going to do it. After all this is over, I'm going to go explore civilization!
translation: 真的？他这么说了？呼！！我明白了。等到这一切结束了，我要去亲身探险外面的文明！

original: {Thank you, my friend}Dank ni, ahk iss - I never would have had the {guts}growans to ask him myself.
translation: {Thank you, my friend}谢谢你，要不是你，我绝对不会鼓起{guts}勇气去问他的。

original: <Lie> That it's a den of corruption and vice, and the Dead Horses' way of living is better.
translation: <撒谎> 外面其实是个腐朽和堕落的“天堂”，相比之下死马部落的生活方式更适合你。

original: Oh. Well, I guess that's about what I could expect from him. I'd like a minute alone to think about this. {Thanks}Dank ni.
translation: 哦，那好吧，我猜他也会这么跟我说。我想一个人单独呆会儿，好好想想。谢谢。

original: Really? Maybe I could talk to him about it for you. Be a neutral party.
translation: 真的？那我帮你跟他讲。反正我是个中立方。

original: You'd do that? Sure, sounds smart to me. He might not get so mad at you.
translation: 你愿意帮我说？哦，谢谢你，他对你似乎不会特别生气。

original: What does Joshua think of this?
I, umm, I haven't told him yet. Never had the {guts}growans.
translation: 我，呃，我还没跟他说，还没鼓起勇气。

original: Enough with the drama. I just want to get home.
translation: 我受够了，我只是想回家。

original: I understand. The safest way for you to resolve this is to help me and the Dead Horses defeat the White Legs.
translation: 我明白。对你来说最安全的方式就是帮助我和死马部落击溃白腿部落。

original: Daniel wants to evacuate the Sorrows from the valley. I think this will be much more difficult for everyone, you included.
translation: 丹尼尔想要撤离这个山谷。我想这对任何人来说都是艰难和痛苦的，包括你。

original: You can rationalize, if you'd like. A lucky coincidence of my faith and your pragmatism leading to different goals by the same means.
translation: 如果你愿意，你也可以给自己找个理由。巧合的是，我的信仰和你的实用主义可以通过同一种方式同时实现。

original: But you'll have to help convince Daniel, because I can't do it alone. The good Lord knows I've tried.
translation: 但你首先必须帮我说服丹尼尔，因为我一个人办不到。仁慈的主知道我试过了。

original: Fair enough. What do you want me to do about it?
translation: 说得通，你想让我干什么？

original: Talk to Daniel about fighting the White Legs. He wants to evacuate the valley, believes it is best for the Sorrows, physically and spiritually.
translation: 请和丹尼尔谈谈与白腿部落作战的问题。他想要撤离这个峡谷，他相信这是对悲恸部落最有利的决定。

original: He knows I disagree, but believes my desire to fight is the result of my... history of violence.
translation: 他知道我不同意，但他认为我求战的欲望...只是我过去暴力历史的延续。

original: Perhaps if he heard an argument from you, he could be convinced. In any case, it's important enough to try.
translation: 或许他应该听听你看法，才有可能被说服。不管怎样，这都值得一试。

original: I don't know if you've figured this out yet, but I don't believe what you believe.
translation: 我不知道你到底想说什么，但我完全不相信你所相信的那些东西。

original: Then as a Gentile, you should find this to be even more beneficial. If the Sorrows stay in Zion, you will always have a link to New Canaan.
translation: 那么作为一名异教徒，你应该明白这是对你最有利的途径。如果悲恸部落留在锡安，你才能继续与新迦南建立联系。

original: If the Sorrows leave Zion, so too do the New Canaanites. What's more, you'll have more White Legs coming farther south.
translation: 如果悲恸部落离开锡安，那么新迦南人会紧随其步伐。此外，还会有更多的白腿部落的人从南面而来。

original: You may not be concerned over matters of faith, but this is a case where faith and practicality coincide.
translation: 你可能不关心信仰的问题，但这是一个信仰和实际情况相吻合的情况。

original: No one wants the White Legs here. We just need to convince Daniel that it's our responsibility to ensure that doesn't happen.
translation: 没有人希望白腿部落继续留在这个地方。我们需要能说服丹尼尔，我们有义务和责任确保那些事情永远不会发生。

original: Hmm. Okay.
You're not so certain. Fair enough. We all have doubts.
translation: 你不太确定，说得过去，我们都有疑惑。

original: Blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed. But you can be a Thomas for now. Fight the White Legs enough and you'll see the truth.
translation: 那没有看见就信的，有福了。但你现在可以暂时当托马斯，跟我一起与白腿战斗，你就会看到真相。

original: I just hope that by the time you understand, there will still be time to convince Daniel that we have to fight for Zion to save it, and the Sorrows.
translation: 我只希望那时你能明白，我们还有时间说服丹尼尔与我们一起作战，来拯救锡安，来拯救悲恸部落。

original: Fair enough, I guess.
I and the Dead Horses are prepared to do what must be done to protect Zion from the White Legs.
translation: 我和死马部落已经做好一切必须的准备来保护锡安。

original: And though Daniel won't accept it yet, there are many Sorrows who are also prepared. They may not be warriors, but this is their home.
translation: 尽管丹尼尔现在不接受，但有很多悲恸部落的人也已经准备好了。他们可能不是专门的战士，但这里是他们的家。

original: If you have a chance to speak with Daniel about this, ask him to consider defending Zion instead of abandoning it.
translation: 如果你有机会和丹尼尔谈谈，请让他仔细考虑一下如何保护锡安，而不是抛弃锡安。

original: He has good intentions, but I fear that if we evacuate the Sorrows from this place, it will be lost to them, and us, forever.
translation: 他的初衷很好，但我担心就这样撤离锡安，我们就会永远失去这里。

original: I do. They're little more than raiders, if that.
translation: 我知道，他们其实就是帮掠夺者。

original: Then you must bear witness of this revelation to Daniel. The obviousness of it escapes him.
translation: 那么你最好把你的观点同样表述给丹尼尔，他没有意识到这是显而易见的。

original: We both desire a non-violent solution to this problem. Where we differ is that only one of us believes it is possible.
translation: 我们都希望通过非暴力手段解决问题。我们的观点不同在于，只有一个人相信此路可行。

original: Speak your heart to Daniel when the opportunity presents itself. There may yet be time to save Zion.
translation: 当机会出现时，对丹尼尔说出你的心。也许还有时间拯救锡安。

original: And what kind of tribe is that?
God told Moses that the tribes of Cain would not be welcome in Zion. The White Legs are as close as I have seen, beyond hope, beyond redemption.
translation: 上帝曾告诉摩西，该隐的子民不受锡安的欢迎。白腿部落就是这样一帮人，没有希望，没有救赎。

original: But if the Sorrows die in a state of ignorance, their salvation may be delayed as well, passing from life in this world to a spiritual prison.
translation: 但是，如果悲恸部落在无知的状态中死去，他们的救赎也可能被推迟，从现世的生活进入精神的监狱。

original: We have a responsibilty to protect this place and those who have come to dwell in it. If you feel the same way, speak with Daniel.
translation: 我们有责任保护这里，保护那些以这里赖以生存的人们。如果你也这么想，请与丹尼尔谈谈。

original: There may yet be time to save Zion from those who are too ignorant to understand what they have come to destroy.
translation: 也许还有时间把锡安从那些无知的人手中拯救出来，他们不知道自己要来毁灭什么。

original: Yes, what has to be done is you have to get these tribes out of here.
translation: 对，现在你需要做的就是将他们赶出这里。

original: The Sorrows need help. We brought the White Legs here, the New Canaanites. This is their home, Zion, God's gift to them.
translation: 悲恸部落需要帮助，这里是他们的家。是我们新迦南人把白腿部落带到这里来的，这是他们的家园，锡安，上帝赐给他们的礼物。

original: In abandoning it, we will gain nothing and will lose more than you realize. Please think about this, and look in your heart.
translation: 放弃它，我们将一无所获，失去的将比你意识到的更多。请考虑一下，看看自己的内心。

original: The light of the mind alone cannot burn away all darkness.
translation: 仅凭心灵之光无法驱散所有的黑暗。

original: I need to think about it.
Of course. Think on it, and look in your heart. The light of the mind alone cannot dispel the whole world's darkness.
translation: 当然，好好考虑一下，听听你内心的想法。仅凭心灵之光无法驱散所有的黑暗。

original: I'll talk to him about it. Maybe he can be persuaded.
translation: 我会和他说的。也许我能说服他。

original: Thank you. It will be for the best.
You'll get no argument from me. These White Legs are human garbage.
translation: 我和你意见一致，这些白腿部落简直就是人间败类。

original: They're still God's children, but if they turn against their brothers and sisters, won't listen to reason...
translation: 他们仍然是上帝的孩子，但如果他们背叛自己的兄弟姐妹，不听道理...

original: If they pollute the Lord's temples on Earth, like Zion, who are we to stand by and let them continue?
translation: 如果他们玷污了上帝在地上的圣殿，比如锡安，我们又怎能袖手旁观，让他们继续下去呢？

original: Daniel does not yet see things the way we do. He is the John to our Matthew and Mark. When you have a moment, speak with him.
translation: 丹尼尔看问题的角度和我们不一样，他是我们的马太和马可的约翰。你有空的时候，和他谈谈。

original: There may still be time to save Zion from the White Legs, to keep God's children here, in this living temple.
translation: 我们现在还来得及把白腿部落彻底赶出这片山谷，让上帝的孩子们留在这里，在这座活着的圣殿里。

original: Why are you talking to me about it?
translation: 你为什么要跟我谈这些？

original: Daniel and I don't agree on everything, but in our hearts, we both want what's best for the Sorrows and Dead Horses.
translation: 丹尼尔和我在某事情上不能达成一致意见，但在我们的内心深处，我们都希望能为悲恸部落和死马部落做出最正确的决定。

original: You've seen what the White Legs do, and I think you know what has to be done. If Daniel hears it from someone other than me, well...
translation: 你已经看到了白腿部落的所作所为，我想你应该清楚我们需要采取什么措施。如果丹尼尔听到了除我以外的别人也这么说，那么...

original: Zion may not be lost to us after all.
translation: 我们可能终究不会失去锡安。

original: This conversation just got pretty dark. What was that about happy... dashing the little ones?
translation: 这段对话太阴暗了。有没有...开心一点的？

original: Happy are those who do the work of the Lord. Zion belongs to God and the people of God. It is a natural temple and monument to his glory.
translation: 为上帝作工的人有福了，锡安属于上帝和上帝的子民。这是一座自然的圣殿，也是他荣耀的纪念碑。

original: When our Lord entered the temple and found it polluted by money-changers and beasts, did he {emph.}ask them to leave? Did he cry? Did he simply walk away?
translation: 当我们的主进了圣殿，看见这里被兑换银钱的人和走兽所玷污，他要求他们离开吗？他哭了吗？他就走开了吗？

original: No. He {emph.}drove them out. It is one thing to forgive a slap across my cheek, but an insult to the Lord requires... no, it {emph.}demands correction.
translation: 不，他把他们赶了出去。我可以原谅打在我脸上的一巴掌，但侮辱上帝...不，这一切，必须得到立即修正。

original: You don't want to leave Zion. You'd rather kill every last one of the White Legs.
translation: 如果你不想离开锡安的话，你最好杀死所有的白腿部落。

original: Given those two choices, yes. In the best of all possible worlds, they would just leave us in peace. But they won't.
translation: 鉴于这两个选择，是的。在最好的情况下，他们会离开这里，但他们不会。

original: I don't enjoy killing, but when done righteously, it's just a chore, like any other.
translation: 我不喜欢杀戮，但只要正义地行事，它就只是一件苦差事，就像其他事情一样。

original: Practiced hands make for short work. And the good Lord knows there's much to be done here.
translation: 熟手能够迅速解决工作，而仁慈的主知道还有很多事要做。

original: No, and I don't really care.
Living in willful ignorance is an ugly thing, but God often speaks loudest in the wild places of his creation, like Zion.
translation: 活在故意的无知中是一件丑陋的事情，但上帝经常在他创造的荒野中大声说话，比如锡安。

original: Zion is a place, and a state of being, that has been lost to us several times in the past. Each loss is a new fall of man.
translation: 锡安就是这样一片神圣的领土。我们曾经失去她好几次，每一次失去都是一次新的堕落。

original: And after each fall, we weep in strange new lands and dream of Zion, dream of visiting vengeance upon those who took it from us.
translation: 每次倒下之后，我们在陌生的新土地上哭泣，梦见锡安，梦见向夺走它的人复仇。

original: But this is the waking world in which we live. There is no need to cry, no need to dream. We can act now and stop the White Legs here.
translation: 但这就是我们所生活的现实世界。没必要哭，没必要做梦。我们现在就可以行动，阻止白腿。

original: Well, I'm guessing you're pretty mad about something.
translation: 好吧，我猜你对某些事情非常生气。

original: The White Legs didn't just force my people out of New Canaan. They butchered everyone who wasn't fast enough to get away.
translation: 白腿不仅把我的族人赶出了新迦南，他们屠杀了所有跑得不够快的人。

original: The elderly, the ill, children. Those who stopped to help the wounded. It made no difference to them. They can't be reasoned with, the White Legs.
translation: 老人，病人，孩子，那些停下来帮助伤者的人。这对他们来说没有区别，白腿，他们不讲道理。

original: Daniel believes that if we leave, if the Sorrows leave, the White Legs will stop. He doesn't understand what this kind of tribe is like.
translation: 丹尼尔相信，如果我们离开这里，如果悲恸部落离开这里，那么白腿部落就会停止这一切。但他根本不了解那种部落究竟是什么样的。

original: Are the New Canaanites really a tribe?
translation: 新迦南人真的可以称为一个部落吗？

original: We wear more clothing than them and understand more about technology, but we're still a tribe, a linked family of families.
translation: 我们穿的比他们多，比他们也掌握着更多的科技，但我们依旧是个部落，一个有着相互联系的大家庭。

original: The Boneyard, Phoenix, New Vegas, they're just places, metal and stone. New Canaan dies, but the tribe lives on.
translation: 晒骨场、凤凰城、新维加斯，这些只是地名、金属和石头。即使新迦南人死了，但部落依然活着。

original: When the walls come tumbling down, when you lose everything you have, you always have family. And your family always has tribe.
translation: 即使世界坍塌，一无所有，你总是还会有家的。有家，就有部落。

original: Why haven't I seen any Sorrows in the valley?
translation: 为什么在这个山谷我看不到任何悲恸部落的人？

original: The Sorrows have many skilled hunters among them, but no warriors. They have not had to deal with war or raiders for decades.
translation: 悲恸部落有很多熟练地猎手，但他们不是战士。他们已经有数十年未对付过掠夺者或参与过战争了。

original: Even though they can hunt a full-grown Yao Guai, they don't know how to deal with the White Legs. That's why we're here.
translation: 即便他们能猎杀成年妖怪，他们完全不懂得如何应对白腿部落的威胁。这就是我们来这的原因。

original: Does the valley belong to the Dead Horses?
translation: 这个山谷属于死马部落吗？

original: The valley belongs to God, but no. The Dead Horses live at Dead Horse Point, up the Colorado River. They came here because I asked them to.
translation: 这个山谷属于上帝，但不属于死马部落。死马部落聚居的地方位于科罗拉多河上方，他们之所以定居于此是因为我要求他们来。

original: Before I... returned to the fold, I visited them years earlier. I looked much different then, but I left an impression on them.
translation: 在我...回到他们中间之前，我曾经见过他们。虽然我看起来和那时完全不同，但他们内心中都依然记着我。

original: I taught them how to hunt more efficiently, how to maintain their weapons and Pre-War equipment. When I returned, they showed their appreciation.
translation: 我曾教他们如何更有效率地捕猎，如何维护武器和战前装备。当我回来时，他们向我表示了感激之情。

original: Why did the White Legs attack my caravan?
translation: 为什么白腿部落袭击我们的商队？

original: They attack everyone who isn't a White Leg, especially caravans. They don't know how to survive on their own, so they have to raid.
translation: 他们会攻击任何不是白腿部落的成员，尤其是商队。他们不知道怎么自生自立，所以他们靠抢劫过活。

original: But as for why they are here, they are trying to wipe us out. All of us.
translation: 但至于他们为什么在这里，他们想消灭我们。我们所有人。

original: They want to join Caesar's Legion, and they can only prove their worth by destroying the New Canaanites and everyone we shelter.
translation: 他们想加入凯撒军团，他们只能通过摧毁新迦南人和我们庇护的所有人来证明自己的价值。

original: Do you ever "fall?"
Every day. Some days are... harder than others.
translation: 每一天。而且有些日子会...更艰难。

original: Ha ha ha! Wait... you don't actually believe that, do you?
translation: 哈哈哈！等等...你不会真的相信，对吧？

original: I know it may be hard for you to accept or even to understand. In my heart, I believe that though I am a sinner, I have been saved.
translation: 我知道这对你来说可能很难接受甚至很难理解。在我心里，我相信虽然我是一个罪人，但我已经得救了。

original: And I believe there is something beyond this rock and this air and this water around us, something more that is waiting for us.
translation: 我相信，在我们周围的岩石、空气和水之外，还有别的东西在等着我们。

original: I have been baptized twice, once in water, once in flame. I will carry the fire of the holy spirit inside until I stand before my Lord for judgment.
translation: 我已经接受了两次洗礼，一次在水中，一次在火里。我将在内心里带着圣灵的火焰，直到我站在我的主面前接受审判。

original: Huh. If you say so.
Whether there is a God or not, his existence doesn't depend on what you believe or what I say.
translation: 上帝是否存在，他的存在并不取决于你相信什么或我说什么。

original: There is much to be skeptical of in this world, so it no longer surprises me to learn how many people don't really believe in anything.
translation: 在这个世界上有很多值得怀疑的东西，所以当我知道有多少人真的不相信任何东西时，我不再感到惊讶。

original: But I believe that our Lord was made flesh as Jesus Christ and died to redeem me. And you. And the Sorrows. Even the White Legs. Everyone.
translation: 但我相信，我们的上帝和耶稣一样曾经有血有肉，是个在现实中曾经存在的实体。他的死是为了拯救我、你、悲恸部落、甚至白腿部落，每一个人。

original: Sounds like a good deal.
In a world filled with misery and uncertainty, it is a great comfort to know that, in the end, there is light in the darkness.
translation: 在一个充满痛苦和不确定的世界里，知道黑暗中终有光明，是一种极大的安慰。

original: Every day, we move closer to our judgment. We must do our best to walk in the footsteps of our Lord and teach others how to do the same.
translation: 每天，我们都要自我反省。我们必须尽力跟随主的脚步，并教导别人如何这样做。

original: For many of us, the road is a difficult one, but the path is always there for us to follow, no matter how many times we may fall.
translation: 对于我们很多人来说，这条路是艰难的，但无论我们跌倒多少次，这条路总是在那里等着我们去走。

original: What's going on with all of these... tribes?
translation: 这些部落间究竟发生了什么？

original: A great deal. There are three, make that four, tribes here in Zion. You've already met the White Legs on the way in.
translation: 一件很麻烦的事件。锡安这里共3个，哦，或者说4个部落。你在来的路上已经见过白腿部落了。

original: In this camp, you'll find Dead Horses. In the Narrows, the Sorrows. And finally there's Daniel and myself. We're New Canaanites.
translation: 在这个营地，你能找到死马部落。在狭路，是悲恸部落。最后就是丹尼尔和我，我们是新迦南人。

original: Do you run the show around here?
I wouldn't say that. I am the acting war chief for the Dead Horses. They look up to me for such matters, but I only have the authority they give me.
translation: 我不会这么说。我是死马部落的临时战争酋长。他们在这些事情上仰视我，但我只有他们赋予我的权力。

original: Daniel is the spiritual leader and main link of the New Canaanites to the Sorrows. He's up in the Narrows right now.
translation: 丹尼尔对悲恸部落的人来说是精神领袖，也是新迦南人与悲恸部落的唯一纽带。他现在就在狭路。

original: Let's talk about something else.
Of course.
Do they speak... our language?
translation: 他们也说...我们的语言吗？

original: Most don't. It's been hundreds of years since the war. They've developed their own languages.
translation: 大部分都不会。自从上一次大战后，已经过去了数百年。他们已经发展出了他们自己的语言。

original: Take the Dead Horses. We think they were originally refugees from a place called {"rehz"}"Res," east of the Grand Canyon.
translation: 以死马部落为例。我们认为他们最初是来自大峡谷东面的叫“雷斯”的地方的难民。

original: They speak a combination of Res and a language spoken by travelers who were visiting Res when the bombs fell. Over time, the two languages blended.
translation: 他们说一种雷斯方言与核弹爆炸时当地旅行者所说的语言。时间长了，两种语言就结合在一起了。

original: I was a translator years ago, but it's hard to keep up with all of the tribal variations.
translation: 多年前我是一名翻译，但很难跟上所有的部落变化。

original: Thanks for the offer, but I'll handle it myself.
translation: 谢谢你的邀请，但我自己能够处理。

original: I don't think so.
The Divide blocked all of their northern land routes?
translation: 大裂谷阻挡了所有通往北部的路线？

original: Not all of them. But they couldn't take 127 north to get around the mountains.
translation: 并非所有。但他们已经无法沿着127道从北面通过群山。

original: As if Death Valley weren't enough, they had the Divide and Big Empty to deal with.
translation: 而且除了死亡山谷以外，他们还要应付大裂谷和大空洞。

original: From what the Legion's explorers reported, the Big Empty may as well have been a wall to any living thing approaching it.
translation: 据军团探险家的报告，大空洞可能像一道墙一样，会阻挡任何靠近它的生物。

original: What's at the Divide?
I don't know for certain, and I don't think NCR knows, either. Whatever happened at the Divide was too much for them to handle.
translation: 我不太清楚，而且我觉得NCR可能也不知道。不管大裂谷发生了什么，对他们来说都很棘手。

original: Our {froo-mehn-tah-ree}frumentarii told us what they saw. Only fools and madmen would march into a place like that. All roads wind down to the same spot, the grave.
translation: 我们的特务告诉了我们他们看见的一切。只有傻子和疯子才会前往那么一个地方，所有的道路最终只会通往一个终点 — 坟墓。

original: They said all that's left there is a gaping wound cut into the Earth, cursed and damned. No place for God-fearing folk.
translation: 他们说那里只剩下一个裂开的伤口，在地球上，被诅咒，下地狱。敬畏上帝的人无处可去。

original: I'm guessing you don't like Caesar very much.
Love the sinner, hate the sin. With Caesar, it's often very difficult to see through all of that sin to the person inside.
translation: 爱罪人，恨罪恶。对于凯撒来说，要看穿他内心的罪恶是非常困难的。

original: I can say that we were both lucky that NCR's supply lines and land routes north of Mojave Outpost were destroyed before the Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 可以说，我们开始一直很幸运，因为NCR的补给线和莫哈维前哨战以北的路线在胡佛大坝一战前早已被完全摧毁。

original: Something bad happened near Death Valley, at a place called the Divide. NCR couldn't cut across anymore and it slowed down their reinforcements.
translation: 在靠近死亡山谷的地方发生了很严重的事情，在一个叫大裂谷的地方。NCR因为无法顺利穿越，他们的增援行动被严重减缓。

original: Terrible storms ripped entire companies apart before they even got to Nevada soil. The aftermath of Hoover Dam could have been even worse for Caesar.
translation: 恐怖的风暴在他们到达莫哈维之前就将他们撕得四分五裂。要不是如此，恐怕胡佛大坝一战凯撒军团的遭遇会更糟。

original: Do you know about Mr. House?
I had heard of him, but when we were preparing to enter the Mojave, he didn't seem relevant to what was happening.
translation: 我听说过他，但当我们准备进入莫哈维的时候，他看起来似乎对正在发生的一切漠不关心。

original: From what I've learned since Hoover Dam, he handled the Mojave tribes in a fashion not entirely dissimilar from Caesar. It's too bad.
translation: 据我从胡佛大坝事件中了解到，他处理莫哈韦部落的方式与凯撒并无二致。这太糟糕了。

original: What do you think of NCR?
Better than Caesar, but that's not a high standard. Too much love of money and ownership, not enough love of God and giving.
translation: 总之比凯撒要好，但这标准也不高。过于热衷金钱和贪婪，缺乏虔诚和对上帝的爱。

original: Any society that derives its power and authority from the will of man alone lives apart from God and will crumble in the end.
translation: 任何仅从人的意志中获得权力和权威的社会，都脱离了上帝，最终将会崩溃。

original: What do you know about the war between Caesar and NCR?
translation: 你对凯撒和NCR之间的战争了解多少？

original: I try not to involve myself with matters of the Mojave anymore. All I know is from before the Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 我尽量不再插手莫哈韦的事。我只知道胡佛大坝战役之前的事。

original: Are you in much pain? Is there anything I can do to help?
translation: 你很痛苦吗？我能为你做什么？

original: [SUCCEEDED] You are kind to offer, but no, there's nothing you can do. We don't use chems, but I learned long ago that I'm immune to their effects.
translation: [成功] 谢谢你的好意，但不必了。我们不需要药剂，我很久以前就已经学会了如何免疫那些效果。

original: It never stops burning. My skin. Every day, I have to unwind the bandages and replace them with fresh ones.
translation: 它从不停止燃烧，我的皮肤。每天，我都要解开绷带，换上新的。

original: Exposing my body to the air is like living through it again. But it's better to be clean than comfortable.
translation: 把我的身体暴露在空气中，就像再经历一次。但现在，保持干净和清洁比活得舒适要重要得多。

original: How did you survive?
I survived because the fire inside burned brighter than the fire around me. I fell down into that dark chasm, but the flame burned on and on.
translation: 我能活下来，是因为内心的火焰比周围的烈火更加强烈。我掉进了那个黑暗的深渊，但火焰一直在燃烧。

original: The next morning, I woke up and crawled out of the northern edge of the Grand Canyon, that cursed place. It took me three months to reach New Canaan.
translation: 第二天早上我醒来之后，爬出了大峡谷的北部悬崖，那个被诅咒的地方。我花了3个月才到达新迦南。

original: It was as though the prodigal son had returned. They welcomed me like I had never left, never done anything to shame them.
translation: 我有种在外放浪的游子终于回家一样的感觉。他们欢迎我，就像我从来没有离开过，从来没有做过任何让他们感到羞耻的事情一样。

original: The fire that had kept me alive was love. Their love. God's love. I will never be able to repay the debt I owe to them, but I must try.
translation: 让我活下去的火焰是爱，他们的爱，上帝的爱。我永远无法偿还我欠他们的债，但我必须努力。

original: How did you end up as Caesar's legate?
translation: 是什么导致你作为凯撒的特使这一地位终结的？

original: This way lies the path to hell. Edw- Caesar needed me to translate. Translation became giving orders. Giving orders became leading in battle.
translation: 这条路完全就是通向地狱。爱德...哦凯撒，一开始他需要我为他作翻译。慢慢的，翻译就变成了下达命令。下达命令就变成了指挥战役。

original: Leading in battle became training, punishing, terrorizing. A series of small mistakes before a great fall.
translation: 指挥战役就意味着要训练、惩罚、恐吓。也因此开始了我在迈入深渊前的一系列致命罪恶。

original: And I stayed in that darkness until after Hoover Dam. After I failed Caesar and he had me burned alive, thrown into the Grand Canyon.
translation: 我就这么呆在深渊里，直到胡佛大战之后。因为我令他尝到了失败的苦果，他把我活生生地投到了火里，然后我就被扔进了大峡谷。

original: Was one of those men Caesar?
No, not then. Back then he was just Edward. Smart man. Young, but we all were. We thought we could hike into the Grand Canyon and talk to Blackfoots.
translation: 不，那时还没有。那时他还只是爱德华，他年轻，聪明，但我们都曾经如此。我们当时觉得我们可以徒步走进大峡谷，与黑脚族交谈。

original: We did, and the Blackfoots were friendly enough at first, but eventually... I've thought back to that day so many times. I must have mistranslated.
translation: 我们去了，黑脚族一开始也很友好，但最终...我无数次地回想起那一天。我一定是翻译错了。

original: Something must have been mixed up, because the Blackfoots decided we weren't going to leave. The rest is history, assuming Edward hasn't changed it.
translation: 我们之间一定是发生误会了，因为黑脚族后来甚至决定不许我们离开。剩下的都是历史了，前提是爱德华没改变。

original: What are those bandages for?
[FAILED] {irritated}For injuries I suffered long ago.
translation: [失败] {irritated}因为我很久以前受的伤。

original: Were you always with the New Canaanites?
translation: 你之前一直和新迦南人在一起？

original: I was born in Ogden, what people came to call New Canaan. Things were more peaceful when I was growing up.
translation: 我出生在奥格登，人们通常称那里为新迦南。我小时候，那里充满了和平气息。

original: When I was a young man, I went out into the world to do missionary work as all New Canaanites do.
translation: 当我成长为一个年轻人时，如同其他新迦南人一样，我步入了外面的世界开始我的传教生涯。

original: I traveled along the Long 15 and followed 89 south into Arizona. Along the way, I met two men from a group called the Followers of the Apocalypse.
translation: 我沿着15号公路，顺着89号路往南进入亚利桑那。一路上，我遇到了两个人，他们自称是来自一个叫天启追随者的团体。

original: Edward Sallow and Bill Calhoun. They came to teach the tribes. Calhoun was a good man. Edward was the one who got us into trouble down the road.
translation: 爱德华·萨洛和比尔·卡尔霍恩。他们准备去教导部落。卡尔霍恩是个好人，爱德华则令我们一路麻烦不断。

original: Can I ask you some personal questions?
translation: 我能问你一些私人问题吗？

original: Right now, I'd like you to focus on helping Daniel. Maybe there will be time later.
translation: 现在，我需要你集中注意帮助丹尼尔。或许晚些我们再谈比较好。

original: It's not something I enjoy, but I pray to God that someone may learn from my mistakes. What would you like to know?
translation: 我不喜欢这样，但我祈求上帝有人能从我的错误中吸取教训。你想知道什么？

original: I have a few questions for you.
Goodbye.
God be with you.
Fine, I'll look into getting those supplies for Daniel.
translation: 好吧，我去帮丹尼尔弄些补给。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
We do. Though the White Legs destroyed New Canaan, they didn't destroy all of our supply caches.
translation: 我们有。虽然白腿部落摧毁了新迦南，但他们没摧毁我们的补给。

original: All forms of currency are recognized here. Caps, NCR dollars, even Legion coin. Take a look.
translation: 我们接受任何种类的货币。瓶盖、NCR美元、甚至军团硬币。好了，你看看吧。

original: Yes. Take a look.
{angry that Jed dismissed your concerns}{under your breath}Sorry to bother you with reality, ol' Jed. Who cares if we can't get back out the way we come?  That's not a problem.
translation: 抱歉，老杰德，还是关注一下现在吧。鬼才在乎我们能不能找到回去的路？那不是个问题。

original: {Jed becomes alerted by a sound ahead of the party. Stops dead on his tracks, cautious.} Shhhhh! Hold on, now...{finger to his lips, he shushes the rest of the crew.} Could swear I heard something up ahead.
translation: 嘘！等一下，听...我发誓我听见前面有什么声音。

original: {Takes initiative, and moves forward to explore threat.}I'll take a look, boss! Keep me covered!
translation: 我过去看一下，老大！掩护我！

original: {Notices the player being hit, and falling down, and rushes to aid}On your feet! Keep fighting!{helps player on her/his feet} Come on now, I got ya...
translation: 注意脚下！继续还击！来吧，我抓到...

original: {Blinded by anger, Stella charges forth against the ambushers.}Enough of this! We're sitting ducks here! {pauses to catch her breath}Here I come! I was a sheriff once, goddamn it!
translation: 够了！我们不能坐以待毙！看我的！我他妈以前可是个警长，操！

original: {Ticked off by Ricky, and the ambush, she grinds her teeth}Shut the hell up, Ricky! Might as well be waving at them!
translation: 闭上你的臭嘴，里基！快朝他们射击！

original: {Whimpering, cowardly trying to hide from incoming fire.}I don't deserve this! My Pip-Boy don't even work! Why the fuck you hire me?
translation: 我今天怎么这么倒霉！我的哔哔小子也没响应了！你他妈当初为什么雇我？

original: {High, recklessly shooting in all directions.}You want some, assholes? You just pissed off the wrong guy! And that means Ricky!
translation: {High, recklessly shooting in all directions.}你想尝尝子弹吗，傻逼？你惹恼我了！我是里基！

original: {Alarmed, just recognized that they've been ambushed}Ambush! Tribals, and they mean blood!
translation: 埋伏！是部落，他们意味着鲜血！

original: {Notices Stella falling down}Stella!... Oh no! {as he runs to her fallen body, small pause}Don't you die on me, woman, you hear?
translation: 史黛拉！...噢，不！我不许你死，你听见了没？！

original: {Trying to calm his crew under an onslaught of fire, and flying tomahawks.}Holy hell! Stay low, people, stay low...
translation: 天啊！俯下身子，大家，蹲下...

original: {Alarmed, recognizes that they've been ambushed}Goddammit, ambush! Cover, people! Watch yourselves!
translation: 我操，是埋伏！隐蔽，大家！保持警惕！

original: {Ricky is going through withdrawal}Didn't nobody do this to you but yourself, junkie. Now try suffering in silence for once.
translation: 除了你自己外没人像你这样，你个垃圾。现在给我安静一会儿！

original: {self-pitying}You ain't got no heart, Stella! I swear, you're a monster, and you're gonna regret treating me like this!
translation: 你他妈真没良心，史黛拉！我发誓，你个臭女人，你早晚会后悔今天这么对我！

original: {Ricky is whining}You ain't sick! You're a goddamn junkie, that's what you are! So shut it!
translation: {Ricky is whining}你没病！你就是个该死的瘾君子！所以赶紧闭嘴吧！

original: {going through withdrawal}{sob of self-pity}You don't know how this feels, Stella! I'm sick! Never been so sick my whole life!
translation: 你根本不知道这是什么感觉，史黛拉！我病了！我这辈子都没这么难受过！

original: {Ricky is whining}Enough! Another word of your bitching and I'll put you out of your misery myself!
translation: 够了！再发一句牢骚我就亲自结束你的痛苦！

original: {fed up, under your breath}Goddammit, never should joined this assbackwards caravan...
translation: {fed up, under your breath}上帝啊，早知道我就不来这个莫名其妙的商队了...

original: Dream on, {mocking}Stella. Ricky ain't about to die for nobody. Ricky's fucking in-vin-cible, yessir!{chuckle}
translation: 做梦吧，{mocking}史黛拉。里基不会为任何人而死，里基是赢家，没错，完全同意！

original: {Ricky just boasted he has plenty of drugs}Sounds like you got enough for a fatal overdose, then. Do us all a favor, will ya?
translation: {Ricky just boasted he has plenty of drugs}看起来你已经吸得够多了。为了我们大家，你表现好点行不行？

original: {Ricky has Fixer to handle his addiction}Best fix for you'd be a bullet in the brainpan. Now shut it.
translation: {Ricky has Fixer to handle his addiction}最好的办法就是一枪爆了你的头，现在可以闭嘴了吧。

original: Don't worry, {mocking}Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Johnny-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，{mocking}史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老伙计，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Don't worry, {mocking}Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Janey-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
translation: 别担心，{mocking}史黛拉！这是我最后一针，多亏了那边那个新来的老姐们，里基搞到了点瘾头解。

original: Don't worry, {mocking}Stella! Ol' Ricky won't be running out of Psycho any time soon! Ol' Ricky's downright flush! Yes indeed!
translation: 别担心，{mocking}史黛拉！老里基还有不少疯狂药呢！你看那个里基满脸通红，跟猴屁股似的！

original: {Ricky is yelling}Shut your mouth, you goddamn junkie! Or I'll plant one between your shoulder blades, I swear!
translation: 闭上你的嘴，你这个该死的瘾君子！否则我就在你肩胛骨中间放一枪，我发誓！

original: {to yourself, under your breath}{continuing imaginary conversation with Jed, mocking him}"That's right, little lady. Everything will be just fine with Jed to protect you. Quite the leader is what I am, hell yes."
translation: {to yourself, under your breath}{continuing imaginary conversation with Jed, mocking him}“你说的没错，小姑娘！有我杰德保护你，一切都会没事的。我可是个相当称职的领袖，你放心。"

original: {to yourself, under your breath}{continuing conversation with imaginary Jed}Oh I'm sure you're right, Jed. What's the worst can happen to us out here? Nothing. Perfectly safe, fucking perfectly...
translation: {to yourself, under your breath}{continuing conversation with imaginary Jed}噢，我相信你是对的，杰德。我们在这还能发生什么坏事呢？什么都不会。绝对安全，太他妈的安全了...

original: {to yourself, under your breath}{mocking Jed}"Heard you the fifteenth time, Stella. What's it matter if we're trapped here? Everything will be just fine."
translation: {to yourself, under your breath}{mocking Jed}"我已经听你唠叨了快15次了，史黛拉。即使我们被困在这里又有什么关系呢？一切都会没事的。“

original: {Narration - Daniel died}In the shadow of Daniel's death, those Sorrows who survived the assault on Zion Valley mourned his loss, as was their custom.
translation: {Narration - Daniel died}从锡安峡谷一战中幸存下来的悲恸部落族人，沉浸在丹尼尔牺牲的巨大悲痛中。他们以自己传统的方式悼念这位精神导师与朋友。

original: {Narration}Word of Daniel's passing reached the New Canaanites several weeks later. They prayed that their brother would be well-received by their Lord.
translation: {Narration}丹尼尔的死讯几周后传到了新迦南人的耳中，他们祈祷他们的兄弟能够得到上帝的欢迎。

original: {Narration - Flight from Zion}After leading the Sorrows from their home in Zion to safety in Grand Staircase, Daniel continued to wonder if he'd made the right choice.
translation: {Narration - Flight from Zion}在率领悲恸部落离开锡安峡谷前往安全的大阶梯地区后，丹尼尔一直在思考他所做的这个选择是否明智。

original: {Narration}He spent his life evangelizing the beliefs of his people to a new generation of young men and women, as his ancestors had for centuries before him.
translation: {Narration}正如他几个世纪以前的先辈们一样，他毕生都在向一代又一代年轻人传播着上帝的福音。

original: {Narration}He was happy with his family, but for the rest of his life there were nights when he awoke with sadness to find he had been dreaming of Zion.
translation: {Narration}和他的家人在一起，他感到很快乐，但在他的余生中，有那么几个夜晚他总会悲伤的醒来，发现自己一次又一次地在梦中回到他情牵的锡安。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}For years after the defeat of the White Legs, Daniel did his best to minister to the Sorrows' spiritual needs.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}在击退白腿部落数年之后，丹尼尔竭尽全力满足悲恸部落的精神需求。

original: {Narration}Try as he might, he could not hold back the tribe's increasing militancy and reverence of Joshua Graham.
translation: {Narration}然而尽管他耗尽心力，却依然无法阻止整个悲恸部落日益增长的好战性和对约书亚·格雷厄姆的尊崇。

original: {Narration}Demoralized, he returned to his family and Dead Horse Point. His failures haunted him for the rest of his days.
translation: {Narration}他心灰意冷的回到了他的家庭和死马岬角，强烈的失败感一直折磨着他，直到余生的终结。

original: {Narration - Joshua died}After a long and troubled life, Joshua Graham finally found rest in Zion.
translation: {Narration - Joshua died}在经历了漫长而坎坷的一生后，约书亚·格拉汉姆终于在锡安得到了安息。

original: {Narration}In the end, his unswerving militancy had accomplished what the NCR's finest sharpshooters and Caesar's wrath could not.
translation: {Narration}最后一战，他坚定不移的信念帮助他完成了包括NCR最优秀的神枪手和凯撒的愤怒都无法完成的事迹。

original: {Narration}The New Canaanites took comfort in the belief that their brother's soul would again dwell in Zion at the end of days.
translation: {Narration}新迦南人相信他们兄弟的灵魂会在末日时再次居住在锡安，从而得到了安慰。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}The threat of the White Legs ended, Joshua Graham helped the Sorrows and Dead Horses tend to their fallen comrades and secure Zion.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}白腿部落的威胁终于结束了，约书亚·格拉汉姆开始帮助悲恸部落和死马部落照料他们倒下的同伴，并确保锡安的安全。

original: {Narration}The Courier's words had stayed Joshua's wrath in his darkest hour, and in sparing Salt-Upon-Wounds, he was changed.
translation: {Narration}邮差的劝告在约书亚内心最黑暗的时候平息了他的愤怒。在赦免了伤口撒盐后，他发生了改变。

original: {Narration}While he continued to advocate militant opposition to the enemies of New Canaan, he sometimes showed quarter to those who crossed his family.
translation: {Narration}虽然他继续主张强硬对抗新迦南人的敌人，但有时也会对冒犯家人的敌人表现出仁慈与宽容。

original: {Narration}Eventually this new spirit would diminish the myth of the Burned Man in distant lands - a small price for the peace it brought to Joshua Graham.
translation: {Narration}最终，这种新的精神将在遥远的土地上消弭“火烧人”的神话，这是它给约书亚·格拉汉姆带来和平的一个小小的赏金。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW executed}With the White Legs crushed, Joshua Graham led the Sorrows and Dead Horses in tearing apart and burning the corpses of their enemies.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW executed}随着白腿部落的崩溃，约书亚·格拉汉姆带着悲恸部落和死马部落撕碎并焚烧着敌人的尸体。

original: {Narration}He set about training his army in the "Way of the Canaanite," and soon the New Canaanites and tribes of Zion were feared well into the Mojave.
translation: {Narration}他开始以“新迦南之道”训练一支属于他自己支配的部队。没多久，对新迦南人和锡安部落的恐惧便传遍了莫哈维。

original: {Narration}Legends of the Burned Man grew even more depraved, and terrifying.
translation: {Narration}关于“火烧人”的传说变得更加邪恶，更加可怕。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW defeated in combat}Though the Courier had stopped Joshua Graham from executing Salt-Upon-Wounds, the war chief still fell in battle.
translation: {Narration}虽然邮差制止了约书亚·格拉汉姆处决伤口撒盐，但这位战争领主还是在战场上倒下了。

original: {Narration}The White Legs defeated at Three Marys, Joshua led the Sorrows and Dead Horses in tending to their comrades and burning the corpses of their foes.
translation: {Narration}在三玛丽岩给予白腿部落以重创后，约书亚带着悲恸部落和死马部落开始照料受伤的同伴，并焚烧敌人的尸体。

original: {Narration}He continued to advocate militant opposition to the enemies of New Canaan and showed little quarter to those he fought. And yet he was changed.
translation: {Narration}他继续主张激进地对抗新迦南人的敌人，对那些与他战斗的人毫不留情。然而他还是改变了。

original: {Narration}He no longer reveled in the brutality and cruelty for which he had been known in his former life.
translation: {Narration}他不再沉溺于过去人生中的野蛮和残忍。

original: {Narration}His inner demons, if not extinguished, were at the least... {slight beat}appeased.
translation: {Narration}他内心的恶魔，即使还没有消失的话，那么至少...也缓和了。

original: {Narration - Daniel hides the truth}Waking Cloud turned bitter and resentful toward Daniel and the New Canaanites when she learned her husband's death had been concealed from her.
translation: {Narration - Daniel hides the truth}唤醒白云在得知她丈夫的死讯始终被隐瞒后，对丹尼尔和新迦南人心怀怨恨。

original: {Narration}She poisoned some of her tribe against New Canaanite teachings, making relations between the groups difficult from time to time.
translation: {Narration}她让部分族人对新迦南人的教义心怀恶感，给各部落之间的关系蒙上了一层阴影。

original: {Narration - Daniel tells Waking Cloud}Waking Cloud was distraught when she learned of her husband's death, but took comfort from her tribe, and the compassion of the New Canaanites.
translation: {Narration - Daniel tells Waking Cloud}当唤醒白云得知丈夫的死讯后，心里异常痛苦，但她得到了族人和新迦南人的安慰与同情。

original: {Narration}She forgave Daniel for having concealed her husband's fate from her, and learned to accept his fate.
translation: {Narration}她原谅了丹尼尔对她丈夫死讯的隐瞒，并学会了接受他的命运。

original: {Narration}When her grief faded, she took a husband from the Dead Horse tribe. At her bidding, he stayed close to home.
translation: {Narration}当悲痛逝去，她从死马部落接纳了一位新的丈夫。按照她的吩咐，他待在离家很近的地方。

original: {Narration - Civilization's bad}Follows-Chalk took the Courier's words to heart and decided that the big cities of the Mojave Wasteland and NCR were best left unexplored.
translation: {Narration - Civilization's bad}追踪印记把邮差的话牢记在心，决定不再去探索莫哈维和NCR所在的那些大城市。

original: {Narration}Though he sometimes dreamed of distant lands, he continued to support his family at Dead Horse Point, and eventually his wanderlust faded.
translation: {Narration}尽管他有时还会梦到遥远的未知地域，但他还是尽全力支持位于死马岬角的家人。最终，他的流浪梦想随之退去。

original: {Narration - Civilization is cool}Follows-Chalk took the Courier's words to heart and decided that he would behold the sights and sounds of distant lands with his own eyes and ears.
translation: {Narration - Civilization is cool}追踪印记牢记邮差的话，决定用自己的眼睛和耳朵去观察遥远国度的景象和声音。

original: {Narration}After returning to Dead Horse Point, he quarreled with his family and other tribe members about his ambitions.
translation: {Narration}在返回死马岬角后，他因自己的目标与他的家人和族人发生激烈争吵。

original: {Narration}One morning, they awoke to discover that Follows-Chalk had set off alone, westward, into the wilderness.
translation: {Narration}一天早晨，他的族人醒来后，发现追踪印记已经独自起程，向西远去。

original: {Narration}He was never seen again.
translation: {Narration}从此，再也没有人见过他的身影。

original: {Narration - Daniel killed}Already weakened by several seasons of bad trading, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was devastated by the failure of its expedition.
translation: {Narration - Daniel killed}欢乐小径商队公司在接连几个季度的糟糕贸易中备受打击，而这次探险的失败彻底摧毁了他们。

original: {Narration}The New Canaanites never reestablished ties with the caravan.
translation: {Narration}新迦南人再也没有与他们建立任何联系。

original: {Narration}Their experiences with outsiders near the Great Salt Lake and in Zion had been far too negative.
translation: {Narration}他们与位于大盐湖和锡安附近的人交流的作用微乎其微。

original: {Narration}Within six months, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was bankrupted and dissolved.
translation: {Narration}不到半年，欢乐欢乐商队公司便破产解散了。

original: {Narration - Flight from Zion}Already weakened by several seasons of bad trading, the Happy Trails Caravan Company was initially discouraged by the results of its expedition.
translation: {Narration - Flight from Zion}由于在接连几个季度的糟糕贸易中备受打击，欢乐小径商队公司最初对这次探险的结果十分沮丧。

original: {Narration}The fate of New Canaan, and the evacuation of the Sorrows from Zion, made the prospect of trading seem fruitless.
translation: {Narration}新迦南未知的命运以及悲恸部落从锡安的撤离令贸易前景非常渺茫。

original: {Narration}When Daniel told his family about the exploits of Happy Trails' employee, the Courier, however, New Canaan decided to repay the company's kindness.
translation: {Narration}然而当丹尼尔告诉他的家人们关于一个欢乐小径商队的员工——邮差所作出的贡献时，新迦南人决定报答这家公司的好意。

original: {Narration}Twice per year, New Canaanites made the dangerous journey west to trade with the company in the city of New Reno.
translation: {Narration}每年两次，新迦南人冒险向西，到新里诺城与该公司进行贸易。

original: {Narration}The Happy Trails Caravan Company could not survive on such trading alone, but the New Canaanite's generosity made tough times go easier.
translation: {Narration}尽管欢乐小径商队公司无法仅靠这些贸易生存，但新迦南人的慷慨已经令他们的艰难的日子好过许多了。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}The defeat of the White Legs in Zion marked a turning point in the fortunes of the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}白腿部落在锡安的失败成为了欢乐小径商队公司命运的转折点。

original: {Narration}Every two months, the caravan met with the New Canaanites in Zion Valley to trade. Happy Trails soon returned to prosperity.
translation: {Narration}现在，商队每两个月来锡安峡谷与新迦南人碰面贸易，欢乐小径很快恢复了繁荣。

original: {Narration}The vigilance of the Sorrows and Dead Horses in defending southwestern Utah, initially startling to Happy Trails caravans, soon proved a blessing.
translation: {Narration}悲恸部落和死马部落警惕地守卫着犹他州的西南部。欢乐小径最初感到很吃惊，但很快就证明了这是一件好事。

original: {Narration}The tribes united against the 80s, driving them back from Highway 50, and thus opening yet another trading route for Happy Trails caravans.
translation: {Narration}这两个部落在联合对抗“80号公路帮”，并把他们赶回50号高速公路，而这也因此为欢乐旅行商队开辟了一条新的贸易路线。

original: {Narration - Joshua Dead}Having revered Joshua Graham as a living legend for so many years, the Dead Horses found it difficult to accept his death.
translation: {Narration - Joshua Dead}多年来，死马部落一直将约书亚·格拉汉姆尊为传奇人物，他们很难接受他的死亡。

original: {Narration}New Canaanite missionaries sought to remain in contact with the tribe, but lacking Joshua's authority, their influence dwindled.
translation: {Narration}新的迦南传教士试图与部落保持联系，但缺乏约书亚的权威，他们的影响力逐渐减弱。

original: {Narration}Still, as an expression of enduring respect for their lost spiritual leader, the Dead Horses helped protect the lands where New Canaanites settled.
translation: {Narration}然而，为了表达对他们对这位逝去的精神领袖的尊敬，死马部落仍然愿意帮助新迦南人保护他们定居的土地。

original: {Narration}As generations passed, the Dead Horses came to worship a spirit of the land, a harsh spirit of divine justice. They called it Joshua.
translation: {Narration}经过数代人的变迁，死马部落形成了一种神圣的正义感，一种他们称之为这片土地的精神，他们称之为——“约书亚”精神。

original: {Narration - Flight from Zion}Having helped Daniel and the Sorrows escape from Zion, the Dead Horses returned to their home at Dead Horse Point.
translation: {Narration - Flight from Zion}在帮助丹尼尔和悲恸部落撤离锡安之后，死马部落回到了他们位于死马岬角的家。

original: {Narration}The tribe continued to learn from the New Canaanites, and over many years built a flourishing community along the banks of the Colorado.
translation: {Narration}他们继续向新迦南人学习知识，并在随后的数年时间里沿着科罗拉多河建成了一个繁华的部族群落。

original: {Narration}Though the tribes' bond would endure, it was Joshua Graham's legend the Dead Horses would revere, not the tenets of New Canaan's faith.
translation: {Narration}虽然部落之间的纽带会持续下去，但死马部落尊敬的是约书亚·格雷厄姆的传说，而不是新迦南人信仰的教义。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}Having helped eradicate the White Legs from Zion, the Dead Horses returned to Dead Horse Point in triumph.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs}在帮助丹尼尔和悲恸部落撤离锡安之后，死马部落凯旋般回到了他们位于死马岬角的家。

original: {Narration}They remained neutral toward the Sorrows, but as years went on, there were periods of competitive friction, even violence, between the tribes.
translation: {Narration}他们对悲恸部落保持中立，但随着时间流逝，两个部落之间开始出现频繁的矛盾与摩擦，甚至演变成暴力。

original: {Narration}The New Canaanites - Daniel especially - intervened regularly as mediators, but found it difficult to reconcile the tribes' conflicts.
translation: {Narration}新迦南人，尤其是丹尼尔，始终以中间人的方式试图调和，但他发现任何对解决部落冲突的努力都徒劳无功。

original: {Narration - Flee from Zion, saved lots}Daniel succeeded in leading the Sorrows out of Zion, as he had wanted to do from the start.
translation: {Narration - Flee from Zion, saved lots}丹尼尔成功率领悲恸部落远离了锡安峡谷的纷争，而这也正是他一直所期待的。

original: {Narration}The Courier protected the Sorrows during the evacuation, ensuring that most reached their destination unharmed.
translation: {Narration}在撤退过程中，邮差一直保护着悲恸部落，确保他们中的大多数人毫发无损地到达目的地。

original: {Narration}Over the weeks and months to come, Daniel would see to the Sorrows' resettlement in Grand Staircase.
translation: {Narration}接下来的数周乃至数月，丹尼尔和悲恸部落终于来到了大阶梯定居。

original: {Narration}Their adjustment to their new home was not without difficulty, but eventually the Sorrows came to accept the loss of Zion.
translation: {Narration}适应新家的过程并不十分顺利，但最终，悲恸部落还是坦然接受了失去锡安的事实。

original: {Narration - Flee from Zion, many died}Daniel evacuated the Sorrows from Zion, but due to the Courier's neglect, the White Legs butchered many along the way.
translation: {Narration - Flee from Zion, many died}丹尼尔带着悲恸部落从锡安峡谷撤离，但由于邮差的疏忽，白腿部落沿途屠杀了许多人。

original: {Narration}Those who survived barely reached Grand Staircase, but once there, the Dead Horses and New Canaanites helped them settle.
translation: {Narration}那些幸存者艰难的来到了大阶梯。但一到，死马部落和新迦南人便向他们伸出援助的双手。

original: {Narration}The unfamiliarity of their new surroundings, and the loss of loved ones, evoked a terrible and lasting grief among the Sorrows.
translation: {Narration}由于对新环境的陌生、对死去亲人的挂念，激起了悲恸部落无尽的伤痛。

original: {Narration}For two generations, many would die still lamenting the loss of Zion.
translation: {Narration}在两代人的岁月里，许多人直到死前仍在为失去锡安而哀叹。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}The Sorrows fought beside Joshua Graham and the Dead Horses, eradicating the threat the White Legs posed to Zion.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}悲恸部落与约书亚·格拉汉姆和死马部落并肩作战，彻底消除了白腿部落对锡安的威胁。

original: {Narration}Seeing the Courier convince Joshua Graham to spare Salt-Upon-Wounds, the Sorrows learned that retribution could be tempered by mercy.
translation: {Narration}看到邮差说服约书亚·格拉汉姆饶恕了伤口撒盐，悲恸部落认识到有时候仁慈也是一种惩罚。

original: {Narration}Though he despaired at the Sorrows' loss of innocence, Daniel took some small consolation in the Courier's lesson, and prayed it would take root.
translation: {Narration}而丹尼尔，尽管他对悲恸部落的暴力行为感到失望，但对邮差最后的所作所为还是感到一丝欣慰，并祈祷这能生根发芽。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW executed}The Sorrows fought beside Joshua Graham and the Dead Horses, eradicating the threat the White Legs posed to Zion.
translation: {Narration}悲恸部落与约书亚·格拉汉姆和死马部落并肩作战，彻底消除了白腿部落对锡安的威胁。

original: {Narration}Watching as the Courier encouraged Joshua Graham to execute Salt-Upon-Wounds, the Sorrows learned that New Canaan offered no mercy to the wicked.
translation: {Narration}看到邮差鼓励约书亚·格拉汉姆处决伤口撒盐，悲恸部落意识到，新迦南人对邪恶绝无任何纵容和仁慈之心。

original: {Narration}The Sorrows' transformation from a peaceful, timid tribe into a merciless, warlike people broke Daniel's heart.
translation: {Narration}悲恸部落从原先的坚守和平转变为一个无情好战的部族，丹尼尔为此十分痛苦。

original: {Narration}Over time, the Sorrows became ever more ruthless in their dealings - even with each other.
translation: {Narration}之后，悲恸部落变得越来越冷酷无情，甚至在彼此之间也是如此。

original: {Narration}Daniel traveled to and fro between the New Canaanites and Zion, continuing to plead for a return to the old ways whenever he visited.
translation: {Narration}丹尼尔在新迦南人和锡安处往来求索，无论他何时到访，都在恳求回到过去的方式。

original: {Narration}Eventually, the Sorrows grew tired of his blather, and turned their backs on him.
translation: {Narration}但最终，悲恸部落厌倦了他的喋喋不休，他们再也不再理会这位往日曾经的精神领袖。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW killed in combat}The Sorrows fought beside Joshua Graham and the Dead Horses, eradicating the threat the White Legs posed to Zion.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW killed in combat}悲恸部落与约书亚·格拉汉姆和死马部落并肩作战，彻底消除了白腿部落对锡安的威胁。

original: {Narration}When the Courier and Joshua Graham felled Salt-Upon-Wounds, their victory was celebrated with a great feast.
translation: {Narration}在邮差和约书亚·格拉汉姆一起打倒伤口撒盐后，人们举行了盛大的宴会来庆祝他们的胜利。

original: {Narration}The Sorrows' transformation from a peaceful, timid tribe into a proud and warlike people broke Daniel's heart.
translation: {Narration}悲恸部落从原先的坚守和平转变为一个骄傲好战的部族，丹尼尔为此十分痛苦。

original: {Narration}He tried to take solace in the knowledge that they would remain in Zion, but it was a small comfort. The Sorrows' innocence was lost.
translation: {Narration}他试图通过继续传授原来的和平教义，但收效甚微。悲恸部落的本性已经被彻底改变了。

original: {Narration - Daniel dead}With Daniel dead, the White Legs soon overran Zion and drove the Sorrows and Dead Horses from the Valley.
translation: {Narration - Daniel dead}丹尼尔死后，白腿部落不久便席卷整个锡安峡谷，把悲恸部落和死马部落赶出了山谷。

original: {Narration}The White Legs plundered all of the Pre-War buildings the Sorrows had marked off-limits, their squalor an affront to Zion's natural beauty.
translation: {Narration}白腿部落洗劫了所有被悲恸部落列为禁忌的战前建筑，他们玷污了锡安峡谷的自然之美。

original: {Narration}By year's end, little trace remained that the Sorrows had ever made the valley their home.
translation: {Narration}随着时间的流逝，那里再也找不到关于悲恸部落曾经存在的痕迹。

original: {Narration - Flight from Zion}After the White Legs drove the Sorrows from Zion, they celebrated by destroying all traces of the valley's former inhabitants.
translation: {Narration - Flight from Zion}白腿部落将悲恸部落从锡安赶走后，他们通过摧毁山谷前居民的所有痕迹来庆祝。

original: {Narration}They appealed to the Legion for assimilation, but were denied.
translation: {Narration}他们向军团请求依附，可是遭到了拒绝。

original: {Narration}Their failure to eradicate the New Canaanites in Grand Staircase and farther up the Colorado had not gone unnoticed.
translation: {Narration}他们在大阶梯和更远的科罗拉多消灭新迦南人的失败之举未能逃脱军团的法眼。

original: {Narration}The White Legs made a half-hearted effort to find the New Canaanites, but were driven off by Dead Horses trained in the ways of Joshua Graham.
translation: {Narration}白腿部落漫不经心地找寻新迦南人，但被经过约书亚·格拉汉姆训练的死马部落痛击。

original: {Narration}The White Legs lost all hope of joining the Legion and disintegrated into a number of petty raiding bands, leaving Zion Valley a polluted cistern.
translation: {Narration}白腿部落因此不再抱有融入军团的念头，解体为数个掠夺者团体，留给锡安峡谷的是一个被污染的水池。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}Demoralized by the Dead Horse and Sorrows attack the Courier and Joshua Graham led against them, the White Legs retreated to Great Salt Lake.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW spared}被由邮差和约书亚·格拉汉姆率领的死马部落及悲恸部落一阵痛击，白腿部落撤退到大盐湖地区。

original: {Narration}Their days were numbered. Word soon reached the 80s tribe that the White Legs' spirit was broken, their war chief a dim shadow of his former self.
translation: {Narration}他们的日子已经屈指可数了。很快，80号公路帮听说白腿部落已经精神崩溃，他们的战争领袖整日沉浸在逝去的阴影中。

original: {Narration}By year's end, the 80s would overrun the White Legs' camps, scattering the tribe to the winds and claiming the Great Salt Lake for its own.
translation: {Narration}到年底，80号公路帮的浪潮席卷了白腿部落的营地，白腿像风一样被吹散，大盐湖也成为了80号公路帮的领地。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW executed}Joshua Graham's chilling execution of Salt-Upon-Wounds seared into their minds, the surviving White Legs retreated to the Great Salt Lake.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW executed}约书亚·格拉汉姆对伤口撒盐的残忍处决深深地烙在他们的脑海里，剩余的白腿部落逃回了大盐湖地区。

original: {Narration}Unable to shake the memory of their brutal defeat and the Dead Horses' savagery in battle, the White Legs feared further reprisals.
translation: {Narration}白腿部落无法忘怀他们的惨败和死马部落在战斗中的野蛮行径，他们担心会遭到进一步的报复。

original: {Narration}They fled north, out of Utah, into Wyoming. The wilderness was harsh, and the first winter claimed over half the tribe.
translation: {Narration}他们继续向北逃亡，离开犹他，进入怀俄明。那里的荒野是残酷的，第一个冬天便夺去了部落一半以上的生命。

original: {Narration}When spring came, the survivors parted ways in small bands. And so the White Legs died a quiet, {ig-no-MIHN-ee-us}ignominious death.
translation: {Narration}当春天来临之时，幸存者分裂成数个小型团体。白腿部落就这样安静地、不光彩地消失在历史中。

original: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW killed in combat}Despite their defeat at Three Marys, and the death of their war chief, the White Legs were determined to pursue the other New Canaanites.
translation: {Narration - Crush the White Legs, SUW killed in combat}尽管在三玛丽峰遭到挫败而且族长战死，但白腿部落依然继续坚持追寻新迦南人。

original: {Narration}But when they finally tracked down their prey in Colorado, they discovered the tables had been turned.
translation: {Narration}但当他们最终在科罗拉多州找到猎物时，他们发现形势已经发生了逆转。

original: {Narration}The White Legs who survived the New Canaanites' ambushes were hunted down by Dead Horses before they could reach the safety of the Great Salt Lake.
translation: {Narration}即使能侥幸从新迦南人的伏击中幸存下来，在尚有一丝力气返回安全的大盐湖之前，就被随后赶到的死马部落猎杀干净。

original: {Narration}When word of the White Legs' diminished numbers reached the 80s tribe, war was declared, and by year's end, the White Legs had been wiped out.
translation: {Narration}当“80号公路”部落发现白腿部落大势已去时，又一场战争爆发了。到年末为止，白腿部落曾经的存在彻底沦为了历史。

original: {Narration - Finale}And with that, the Courier walked out of the history of the tribes of Zion and back to the gathering storm of the Mojave Wasteland.
translation: {Narration - Finale}就这样，邮差从锡安部落的历史中走出，重新回到了风暴聚集的莫哈维废土。

original: {Narration - Intro}And so it was that the conflict between the New {KAY-neh-nites}Canaanites and the White Legs was finally resolved.
translation: {Narration - Intro}这场在新迦南人和白腿部落之间的冲突最终得到了解决。

original: {Narration}The Courier's involvement had tipped the scale, shifting the fragile balance of power.
translation: {Narration}因“邮差”的介入使得天平倾斜，改变了脆弱的权力平衡。

original: Never mind. Keep living the dream.
That's right. Stick your nose where it don't belong and it's gonna get stung.
translation: 这就对了。把鼻子伸到不该伸的地方就会被叮，懂吧。

original: I had to kill the Bighorners, but I saved the little one.
translation: 我不得不杀掉这些大角羊，但小的我救下来了。

original: That's... not really what I was hoping for, but... I guess I can give the little guy a home. What the hell.
translation: 这...完全不是我所期望的，但...我看我可以给这个小家伙找个新家。我勒个去。

original: Come on. I got you everything you needed. Just give me the damned map.
translation: 喂，我说，你要的我都给你了。快把那该死的地图给我。

original: Okay. You better listen close because I'm not going to repeat myself. You were not invited here. This is not your home.
translation: 好的。你最竖起耳朵仔细听，因为我不会再重复第二遍。没有人邀请你来这儿，这不是你的家。

original: We have what you might call a {emph}compulsion to help you on account of our beliefs, but if you continue to {emph}spit in our eye with insults and profanity...
translation: 你或许认为这一切是我们基于我们的信仰强迫作出的行为，但如果你继续用污言秽语亵渎我们的心灵...

original: You'll find out what happens when our patience wears out. People died at New Canaan because we bickered and debated about what to do.
translation: 你会发现当我们失去耐心的时候会发生什么。在新迦南，人们因为我们争吵和争论该怎么做而死去。

original: That was a mistake. Complaining to me now, also a mistake. I'm not going to add sin upon sin by listening to your grumbling.
translation: 那完全就是个错误，而你现在对我的抱怨，也是一个错误。我不会因为听你的抱怨而罪上加罪。

original: You want the map? Get out in that valley. Help us. One of the Sorrows, Waking Cloud, will go with you. She knows how to get around the valley unseen.
translation: 你想要地图？到那个山谷去，帮助我们。悲恸部落的一名族人，唤醒白云，会跟你一起走。她知道怎么隐蔽地穿行在山谷中。

original: She's also a midwife and has three kids of her own, so she'll be more tolerant of your whining.
translation: 她同时还是位助产师，和3个孩子的母亲，所以她会更能容忍你的牢骚。

original: If it will get me out of here, sure.
translation: 如果能帮我离开这里，当然可以。

original: Listen, I understand that you want to go home. But we didn't ask you to come to Zion. As far as I'm concerned, you're an uninvited guest.
translation: 听着，我明白你想回家，但我们没有求你来锡安。在我看来，你只是个不速之客。

original: In better times, I'd drop everything to help you out, but I have to ensure the safety of the Sorrows first.
translation: 如果情况好的话，我会放弃一切来帮助你，但现在我要首先确保整个悲恸部落的安全。

original: And don't think you're alone in this. One of the Sorrows, Waking Cloud, has volunteered to help you in the valley.
translation: 你不会孤军奋战的。我的一名悲恸部落族人，唤醒白云，自告奋勇来帮助你。

original: She's an experienced hunter and has a special gift for staying out of sight when she needs to. Should make things easier for you.
translation: 她是名经验丰富的猎手，擅长在别人视线之外巧妙隐蔽自己。她对你会很有帮助。

original: After that, all that's left is to evacuate the Sorrows safe and sound. I'll give you a map and supplies, everything you need to get back home.
translation: 等到一切结束，剩下的任务就是确保悲恸部落安全秘密地撤离。那时，我会给你地图补给品，所有你回家需要的东西。

original: Anything to help. I'll do what I can.
translation: 有什么地方可以帮忙？我会尽我所能。

original: I appreciate the enthusiasm. There aren't a lot of people in the wasteland with kindness to spare for anyone who isn't kin.
translation: 我很感激你的热心。在这片废土上已经很少有人会愿意主动向非亲非故的陌生人如此慷慨。

original: Since you've been poking around the valley, you might see more activity from the White Legs.
translation: 既然你已经在山谷转过，你可能已经见过白腿部落的行迹。

original: One of the Sorrows hunters, Waking Cloud, has volunteered to help guide you through the valley. She has a special talent for staying out of sight.
translation: 有一名悲恸部落的猎手，唤醒白云，主动请求做你在这片山谷的向导。她有一种不让人发现的特殊才能。

original: After this, it's just a matter of getting everyone out of here safe and sound. And hopefully you can head back to the Mojave without any more trouble.
translation: 在这之后，我们要做的就是让大家安全无恙地离开这里。到时希望你也能一切顺利地返回到莫哈维。

original: Who are you to be asking me questions?
translation: 你是谁，凭什么问我这么多问题？

original: {angry}I'm someone who's responsible for protecting a lot of innocent people from raiders and {emph}mercenaries who might try to take advantage of them.
translation: {angry}我是一个保护过很多无辜平民，并将他们从掠夺者和士兵手中解救出来的普通人。

original: I think you need a little perspective on what the heck is going on in Zion. There's a Dead Horse warrior camp at Eastern Virgin. Get there.
translation: 我认为你需要对锡安到底发生了什么有所了解。在东维琴河有一个死马战士营地，到那去。

original: My friend Joshua Graham can fill you in on some of the trouble we've been having with White Legs in these parts. Listen to what he says.
translation: 我的朋友约书亚·格拉汉姆可以向你解释目前我们和白腿部落之间的诸多矛盾与问题。你好好去听听他怎么说。

original: Now if you'll excuse me, I've had enough of your sass for one day.
translation: 恕我失陪，我今天已经受够了你的无礼。

original: Oh, heh. I just walked here. No big deal.
translation: 噢，呵呵，我碰巧刚刚走到这里。没什么大不了的。

original: {annoyed}Okay. Can you do me a favor and "just walk" down to Eastern Virgin?
translation: {annoyed}好的。你能帮我个忙，“碰巧走到”东维琴河去吗？

original: There's a group of Dead Horse warriors there with my colleague, Joshua Graham. I'd like you to talk to him about the route you took to enter Zion.
translation: 那里有一群死马部落勇士，和我的盟友，约书亚·格拉汉姆。我希望你能和他谈谈，尤其是你进入锡安的路线。

original: We've had a lot of problems with White Legs in the area and I'd feel more comfortable if you spoke with him about the situation here. Thanks.
translation: 在这个地区，我们和白腿部落之间有很多冲突与矛盾。如果你能就当前形势和他进行讨论的话，我会感到很欣慰。谢谢。

original: I came in with the Happy Trails Caravan. We were attacked by tribals. I'm the only survivor.
translation: 我跟随欢乐小径商队来到这里。路上我们受到了部落民的攻击。我是唯一一名幸存者。

original: That's... {sighs}I'm so sorry. That's terrible. We've been having a lot of problems with the White Legs here in Zion lately.
translation: 这真是...我很难过，真是太可怕了。最近，我们也和这个白腿部落发生了大量的冲突。

original: In fact, that's why I'm here. I'm Daniel, a New Canaanite missionary to this tribe, the Sorrows.
translation: 事实上，这就是我在这里的原因。我叫丹尼尔，是个新迦南人，悲恸部落的传教士。

original: It's important that you speak to my colleague, Joshua Graham, at the Dead Horses camp at Eastern Virgin. We can speak again later.
translation: 你很有必要去和我的盟友，约书亚·格拉汉姆，谈谈。他现在在东维琴河的死马部落营地。我们俩可以晚会再谈。

original: Again, I'm very sorry for the deaths of your friends.
translation: 再次对你朋友的死表示遗憾。

original: Joshua's a New Canaanite and he's obviously willing to attack the White Legs.
translation: 约书亚是个新迦南人，他准备进攻白腿部落的愿望非常强烈。

original: Joshua is a living bible of all mankind's miseries of war! The debt he has levied through his actions, he repays {emph}every {emph}day!
translation: 约书亚是一本活生生的圣经，记载了人类在战争中的苦难！他曾经的行为欠下的债，如今每天都要偿还！

original: He is a monument both to God's unending forgiveness and to humanity's unfathomable capacity for cruelty. It's written on every inch of his body!
translation: 他就是一座纪念上帝无私的宽容和人性对残酷的包容的纪念碑。他身上的每一寸皮肤都挤满了祷文！

original: When you look at him, do you only see a man of God? Beneath those bandages, he is {emph}burned {emph}flesh. As he burns, so does he consume everyone around him.
translation: 当你看到他时，你只看到一个上帝的子民吗？在那些绷带下面，是被烧伤的肉体，他燃烧的同时，也吞噬了他周围的所有人。

original: Joshua wants to fight because the White Legs have stoked the naked flame inside of him. You, {emph}you see the light, but do not yet feel the heat.
translation: 约书亚想要战斗，是因为白腿部落点燃了他内心依旧燃烧的熊熊烈火。而你，只看到了光，你还没有感觉到它散发出来的灼热之气。

original: I can pray that you never will, but it isn't up to me and it isn't up to God. It's up to Joshua.
translation: 我能祈祷你不要像他那样。但现实的走向不是取决于我，也不取决于上帝，而是取决于约书亚。

original: If you're willing to defend the Sorrows, why not pursue the White Legs?
translation: 如果你想要保护悲恸部落，为什么不去追击白腿部落？

original: There is an important difference between killing in defense and waging war. Even a Gentile like you should know that.
translation: 为了防御而杀戮和发动战争之间有很重要的区别，即使是像你这样的异教徒也应该清楚。

original: You're right to leave, but I don't think you should kill any of the White Legs.
translation: 我对你决定离开没有异议，但我觉得你不该伤害白腿部落的人。

original: You're free to hold that opinion, but you're not responsible for these people. If I have to kill to prevent their blood from being spilled, so be it.
translation: 你可以坚持你的观点，但你不需要为这些人负责。如果我必须杀人才能阻止他们流血，那就这样吧。

original: That's an awful lot of responsibility to take on.
translation: 那你还有很多责任需要承担。

original: The New Canaanites interfered in their lives. {emph}We did that. And we've done it before, with others. Always with good intentions, but things go wrong.
translation: 新迦南人干涉了他们的生活。我们自己干过，我们和别人以前也一起干过。总是怀着美好的愿望，但事情总是出错。

original: When that happens, we can't just abandon them, let them die at the hands of New Canaan's enemies.
translation: 当这种情况发生时，我们不能抛弃他们，让他们死在新迦南的敌人手中。

original: Why are you so eager to evacuate Zion? You don't seem to be a pacifist.
translation: 你为什么急着要撤离锡安？你似乎不像是一名和平主义者。

original: There's an old saying that goes, "If you want peace, get ready for war."
translation: 有一句古老的谚语这样说：“如果你想要和平，就要准备好战争。”

original: You've got me figured half-right. I'll shoot dead any White Leg that tries to creep into this camp, but it's only to protect the Sorrows.
translation: 你猜对了一半。我会主动开枪击毙任何胆敢溜进这个营地的白腿部落成员，但动机的出发点仅仅是为了保护悲恸部落。

original: The Lord helps those who help themselves, but the Sorrows don't know how. Joshua and I do. Since I got them into this mess, I need to get them out.
translation: 上帝帮助自助者，但悲恸部落不懂如何去做，约书亚和我都知道。既然是我害他们陷入困境，我就得把他们救出来。

original: I'll be taking the map now.
You just don't learn, do you?
translation: 你是不是没搞清情况啊你？

original: Fine.
Fantastic.
Sorry, I uh... didn't mean to insult you or whatever.
translation: 对不起，我呃...不是故意要侮辱你。

original: [FAILED] Corrected action is the most sincere form of apology.
translation: [失败] 纠正行动是最真诚的道歉形式。

original: I apologize, Daniel. I think stress got the best of me.
translation: 我向你道歉，丹尼尔。我因为有些压力说错话了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {sigh}I understand. But I hope {emph}you can understand why it's so important for us to leave here as soon as we can.
translation: [成功] 我理解。但我希望你能理解为什么我们尽快离开这里是如此重要。

original: I... {emph}we couldn't save New Canaan. This is a chance to make up for that, to start again. We can't fail.
translation: 我...我们没能拯救新迦南。现在有一个弥补的机会，可以重新开始，我们不能再失败了。

original: I understand.
Thank you. If I can help you in some other way, don't hesitate to ask.
translation: 谢谢你的理解。如果在其它方面能有我可以帮助你的地方，请不要犹豫，尽管来找我。

original: Yeah, but I'm helping you so... come on.
translation: 是的，但你看我正在帮你...来吧。

original: [FAILED] If you need healing, just ask me. I can help you with addiction, radiation poisoning, even broken bones. But I can't give you supplies.
translation: [失败] 如果你需要治疗，尽管来找我。我可以帮你解决毒瘾，辐射中毒，甚至骨折的问题，但我不能给你补给。

original: Most of the Sorrows and Dead Horses are protected. I'm out there getting shot up by White Legs.
translation: 大部分悲恸部落和死马部落的人都正受到很好的保护。我在外面则要冒着生命的危险。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Fair enough. Just be careful and hopefully you won't need these.
translation: [成功] 有道理。小心点，希望你不需要这些。

original: But I have... caps. Many of them. Let me show you all of my fine caps.
translation: 但我有...瓶盖，很多。你瞧，我这些瓶盖长得多漂亮。

original: [FAILED] {laughing softly while speaking}I'm sure your caps are fine, but I have to hold on to the supplies I have here. Sorry.
translation: [失败] {laughing softly while speaking}你这些瓶盖确实保存得不错，但我必须储备好我的这些补给。抱歉。

original: I'm trading Pre-War goods and supplies from the Mojave Wasteland. You need those too, don't you?
translation: 我从莫哈维废土来交易战前商品与物资。你也需要这些，对吧？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I do. {pause}All right. I can provide you with supplies, but be frugal with them.
translation: [成功] 的确。好吧，我可以向你提供补给品，但请节约使用。

original: I don't quite have 300 caps.
Here's 300 caps to cover the expenses.
That should cover it. Hold on. This shouldn't take long.
translation: 这应该足够了。别动，接下来要不了多长时间。

original: Er... it looks like I don't quite have 600 caps.
Well, I do need to cover the cost of supplies. Let me know if you find enough funds.
translation: 嗯，我需要为补给填补足够的成本。等你钱够了就来找我。

original: It looks like I'm a bit short of 300 caps...
Well, I do need to cover the cost of supplies. Let me know if you find enough funds.
translation: 嗯，我需要为补给填补足够的成本。等你钱够了就来找我。

original: Actually, I think I'll be fine. Thanks anyway.
translation: 实际，我感觉良好，应该没什么问题。不过还是谢谢你。

original: Suit yourself.
I guess I don't quite have 150 caps...
Well, I do need to cover the cost of supplies. Let me know if you find enough funds.
translation: 嗯，我需要为补给填补足够的成本。等你钱够了就来找我。

original: I can handle the expenses. 600 caps should cover everything, shouldn't it?
translation: 我不差钱。600个瓶盖搞定一切，怎么样？

original: Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Sure. Will 300 caps cover it?
Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Here's 150 caps for the trouble.
Thanks. Hold still. You'll be better in no time.
translation: 谢谢。站着别动，你很快就会好的。

original: Hmm. I guess I don't have 200 caps.
translation: 恩，我实在是没有200个瓶盖。

original: I'd like to help you, but I have to be able to cover the cost of supplies. If you can find the money, come back and see me.
translation: 我是愿意帮助你的，但我至少必须填补成本。如果你的钱够了，随时回来见我。

original: Yes. Here's 200 caps.
Have a seat. This may be a bit uncomfortable.
translation: 请坐。虽然这地方可能不是很舒服。

original: I need medical supplies.
I can provide medical assistance. I can even use supplies that we have here, but I can't just sell what we have.
translation: 我可以提供一些医疗补给品。我甚至可以直接使用这里现成的，但我不能把我们这些东西卖给你。

original: I need to address problems as they arise, and most of those have to do with the Sorrows or Dead Horses.
translation: 我需要多多储备以备不时之需，免得万一两个部落急需的时候药品短缺。

original: Take a look.
Radiation sickness.
Even after all these years, it's still a problem for prospectors, caravan guards, couriers, and tribals. I can fix it.
translation: 即便这么多年过去了，对探险者、商队守卫、邮差以及部落人来说，这依然是一种常见病。你放心，我能治好。

original: Oh, the usual. A few scrapes, burns, and bullet wounds.
translation: 哦，就是些普通的小伤。一些擦伤、烧伤，还有子弹伤。

original: Huh. You look fine to me. Physically, anyway.
translation: 呵，我觉得你看起来还不错。至少表面上看起来。

original: Yeah, you don't look too bad. Shouldn't take much to get you fixed up.
translation: 啊，你气色看起来不差。我看问题不大。

original: It looks like you have a few nasty injuries, but nothing I haven't seen before. Want me to fix you up?
translation: 看起来有些伤口挺严重，但还没有我没处理过的。你放心。

original: Funny sense of humor. I've seen corpses with injuries less severe than yours. This might take a while.
translation: 你真会开玩笑。我见过的一些尸体上的伤口都没你严重。看来得花点时间好好处理一下。

original: I have an addiction problem.
{sighs}As much as I wish people wouldn't touch alcohol or chems at all, I understand. Would you like me to help?
translation: 唉，虽然我希望人们尽可能少接触那些酒精或药物，但我能理解。你需要我帮你治疗么？

original: I need some medical assistance. Can you help?
translation: 我需要一些医疗辅助。你能帮什么忙吗？

original: I should be able to address most common problems. What's the matter?
translation: 一些常见的问题我都没什么问题。怎么了？

original: Fine. Forget it.
Good.
That's too bad, because I'm going to tell her.
translation: 那太糟了，因为我正准备去告诉她。

original: You'll do what you'll do - I won't try to stop you. I'd ask only that you consider the repercussions of your actions.
translation: 你想做就做吧，我不会阻止你。我只希望你能重新考虑一下你这么做会带来的后果。

original: Aren't you the guy in charge around here?
translation: 你难道不是这里管事的吗？

original: That's not an easy thing to be. I don't like doing this, but I can't see any good coming from telling Waking Cloud her husband died.
translation: 说起来容易，但做起来并不轻松。我也不喜欢这样，但告诉唤醒白云她丈夫的死讯只会弄得一团糟。

original: You're the New Canaanite who's supposed help lead these people, not hide things from them.
translation: 你是名新迦南人，你应该帮助领导这些人，而不是向他们隐瞒一切。

original: {sigh}I know. You're right. I shouldn't have hidden it from her in the first place. I just... we can't fail here again.
translation: {sigh}我知道了，你说得对。我一开始就不该瞒着她，我只是...我们不能再失败了。

original: Zion can't become the next New Canaan. The Sorrows don't deserve that. They don't deserve any of this.
translation: 锡安绝不能成为下一个新迦南。悲恸部落不该遭此命运，他们不该受到这样的待遇。

original: Sometimes I look at them and wonder if they would have been better off if those old trails had stayed forgotten.
translation: 有时我看着他们，心想如果那些古老的小径一直被遗忘，他们会不会过得更好。

original: If we had never found any of them. {long sigh}Tell Waking Cloud if you think that's best. I won't stop you.
translation: 要是我们没有见到他们就好了。如果你认为最好的解决办法就是告诉她真相，那你去这么做吧，我不会阻止你。

original: Settle down. I'm not telling her squat.
translation: 就此打住，我不会告诉她的。

original: Good. I'll tell her after we've helped the rest of the Sorrows reach safety.
translation: 好。一旦我们帮助所有的悲恸部落人民抵达安全地带，我就会择机告诉她。

original: I don't think you should hide this from her, but I see your point. I won't say anything.
translation: 我不赞同你向她隐瞒着一切，但你说得有道理。我会保守秘密的。

original: And I don't like hiding it from her, but I'm between a rock and a hard place here.
translation: 我也不想瞒着她，但我现在进退两难。

original: Her people... honestly, we {emph}all need her help. As much as it pains me to say it, there will be time to mourn later.
translation: 她的人...说实话，我们现在急需她的帮助。尽管我这么说很痛苦，但以后会有时间哀悼的。

original: It's her husband! Don't you think she has a right to know?
translation: 那是她丈夫！你难道不认为她有权力知道这一切吗？

original: To every thing, there is a season. Who are you or I to put this heavy burden on her now?
translation: 每一个问题的存在总是有其道理的。你我有什么资格把这个重担压在她身上？

original: O... kay, let's talk about something else then.
translation: 好...吧，那我们再谈点别的。

original: {sighing, relieved}Good. Fine, whatever you'd like to know.
translation: 很好。好的，你想谈什么都可以。

original: What's the matter? Did something happen?
Her three children are safe. They made it north weeks ago and met up with New Canaanites heading east.
translation: 她的三个孩子很安全。几个星期前，他们从北面安全撤离了，并与东面的新迦南人成功汇合。

original: Her husband didn't make it. He died protecting their children from a White Leg attack.
translation: 但她的丈夫没能安全撤出。他为了保护孩子们，在与白腿部落作战时牺牲了。

original: Do {emph}not tell Waking Cloud. She is one of the only Sorrows who can communicate easily with us and her tribe needs her to be strong right now.
translation: 不要告诉唤醒白云。她是悲恸部落唯一一个可以和我们顺利沟通的人，她的部落现在需要她的坚强。

original: Did you help the rest of her family leave Zion?
translation: 你帮助她的家人离开锡安了吗？

original: {sighing, a bit apprehensive}I did.
She said one of her births was difficult and you helped her through it.
translation: 她说，有一次她在生孩子时遇到了困难，而是你帮助她度过了难关。

original: {a bit relieved}Oh, well that's true. Waking Cloud is a talented midwife. She's certainly brought more children into the world than I have.
translation: 哦，的确是的。不过唤醒白云是位很有天赋的助产师，现在经过她之手来到这个世界的小孩已经比我要多得多了。

original: But there are some problems she's never dealt with. One of them came up when she was having her third child and...
translation: 但有些问题她从来没遇到过，其中一个是在她生第三个孩子的时候出现的...

original: I really didn't do much. I'm surprised she mentioned it.
translation: 我其实也没做什么，她自己也很坚强。不过我很惊讶她竟然提起这件事。

original: The use of violence only leads to more violence.
translation: 滥用暴力只会导致更多的暴力。

original: Try walking alongside a tribal child, a refugee, and holding her hand for three days because her parents were killed by NCR prospectors.
translation: 你试着和一个部落孩子一起散步，牵着她的小手三天。因为她的父母几天前被NCR探险家杀害了。

original: After the prospectors have stalked the remainder of the tribe, they fire off a few shots to scare them, and the tribe bunches together for safety.
translation: 那些家伙始终跟踪着部落。一天夜里，他们开了很多枪，部落的人吓得围成一团。

original: A grenade comes rolling in and kills another six people. The only reason you survive is because someone else's body absorbed the shrapnel.
translation: 这时一个手雷滚了下来，又炸死了六个人。你能活下来的唯一原因就是别人的身体吸收了弹片。

original: You're left sprawled out on the ground with ringing in your ears and a little girl's hand in your hand because that's all that's left of her.
translation: 你在地上无助的爬着，耳朵嗡嗡地响，手里握着一个小女孩的残臂。而这，就是她仅剩下来的东西。

original: After you've done that, if you can look me in the eye and tell me it's better to stand aside, maybe then I'll listen to you.
translation: 如果你亲身经历了这一切，还能看着我的双眼，告诉我不要多管闲事，或许我会听你的。

original: That makes sense. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 这就说得通了。我们再说点别的。

original: What would you like to know?
Joshua's come up with a reasonable alternative. Why not help them fight?
translation: 约书亚想出了一个合理的替代方案，我们为什么不帮助他们战斗呢？

original: Joshua doesn't just want to fight the White Legs. He wants to annihilate them. The stakes are too high for their tribe.
translation: 约书亚不仅仅是想与白腿部落开战，他想彻底歼灭他们。对他们的部落来说，风险太大了。

original: Hurting them won't dissuade them. If they can't join Caesar's Legion, they'll die out in a generation. They've never learned how to survive.
translation: 伤害他们无法阻止他们。如果他们不能加入凯撒军团，他们将在一代人内消亡，因为他们从来没有学会如何生存。

original: Food preservation, tanning, even basic hunting and cooking seem beyond them. They only survive by scavenging and raiding, but that can't last.
translation: 食品保鲜、制革，甚至基本的狩猎和烹饪，似乎都超出了他们的能力范围。它们只能靠拾荒和掠夺生存，但这不能持久。

original: They'll only stop if Joshua and the Dead Horses can kill their war chief and their entire war band. That's exactly what he intends to do.
translation: 除非约书亚和死马部落能杀死他们的战争领主并摧毁他们的战争体制，否则他们完全不会改变。这才是约书亚的意图。

original: This is the way the world is. They're part of it, whether you like it or not.
translation: 这就是世界运转的方式。不管你接不接受，他们只是其中的一部分。

original: No. This is how we made the world. And we brought it to them.
translation: 不。这是我们创造世界的方式，是我们把他们带到这个世界上来的。

original: Joshua must be waiting for you. I'll stay here with the others.
translation: 约书亚一定在等你。我会在这儿和其他人在一起。

original: And you have the right to pull them off of their land?
translation: 那你就有权力把他们驱赶出世世代代生存的家园？

original: I've already explained to them that we're leaving! They've accepted it! What is Joshua going to tell them about being a warrior?
translation: 我已经和他们解释过了我们将要离开这里！而且他们已经都接受了！而约书亚却要教他们如何做一名合格的战士？

original: What are you going to tell them about how to live with themselves after they got lost in the moment, killed someone who didn't {emph}deserve to die?
translation: 当他们迷失在当下，杀了一个本不该死的人之后，你会告诉他们如何面对自己吗？

original: Or does that not matter? Is that just an acceptable consquence if it means holding on to this valley?
translation: 还是说这不重要？如果要继续呆在这个山谷就非要接受那个选择？

original: Maybe there is no place left in this world for mercy. But even if it tramples me into the dust, I will never accept it. And I will never condone it.
translation: 或许这个世界上已经没有怜悯的栖息地。但即使我化为灰烬，我也绝不接受。而且我也决不会宽恕那样的行为。

original: Joshua must be waiting for you. I'll stay here with the others as I told them I would.
translation: 好了，约书亚一定在等你。我会呆在这里，和其他人一起，因为我向他们做过承诺。

original: Let's talk about something else.
Of course.
Why won't you tell me about what happened at New Canaan?
translation: 你为什么不告诉我当时在新迦南发生了什么？

original: It's not a subject I'm fond of discussing. It's over and done with, anyway. Why are you so interested?
translation: 我不太想讨论这个话题。不管怎么说，那一切都已经是历史了。你为什么还这么感兴趣？

original: I'd like to talk to you about Mordecai.
translation: 我想和你谈谈末底改主教。

original: {emph}I'd like you to drop it. It's a private matter.
translation: 我希望你别再提了，这是我的私事。

original: I understand. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我理解你。我们谈点别的吧。

original: Thanks. What would you like to know?
I'm just curious, that's all.
translation: 我只是有点好奇，仅此而已。

original: [FAILED] It's understandable, but this is something for me to work out with the Lord. And I hope you can understand that.
translation: [失败] 这是可以理解的，但这是我要和上帝一起解决的问题。我希望你能理解。

original: You're the man in charge. If something's troubling you, it could affect all of us.
translation: 你是这里的负责人。如果有什么事困扰着你，可能会影响到我们所有人。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I never thought I'd be in charge of anything. Don't know why. Bishop Mordecai was old. He had been sick for years.
translation: [成功] 我从没想过我能有今天这个地位，我也不知道为什么。末底改主教年纪大了，他曾经患病了很多年。

original: He couldn't walk anymore. It wasn't a problem for the rest of us. {laughing a bit}He made it out to be more trouble than it really was. Just his way, I guess.
translation: 他甚至不能再行走。而这对我们其他人来说则不是问题。对他来说着看起来要麻烦得多，我觉得。

original: When the White Legs came... {sigh}he was upstairs. We couldn't get him out in time. The house caught fire at the base and worked its way up. Fast.
translation: 当白腿部落来的时候...{sigh}他正在楼上。我们没能及时把他救出来。房子从底部起火，火势一路蔓延，很快。

original: He didn't die of smoke. I wish he had. Sometimes I wake up and for a minute or two, I think all of it was a dream. But it's not. It wasn't.
translation: 他不是因烟尘窒息而死的，我倒希望他是。有时当我醒来时，在最初的一会儿，我甚至觉得那一切只是场梦。但它不是，不是。

original: I wish all of this were some fevered vision of what could have been. Instead of what is, what we let happen.
translation: 我希望所有这些都是对本来可能发生的事情的狂热想象。但事实上，它们都发生了，是我们令它们都发生了。

original: Why don't you teach them something useful instead of filling their heads with nonsense?
translation: 为什么你不教他们些有用的知识，而是整天灌输那些毫无意义的言论？

original: We teach them practical skills for this life and we prepare them for what's to come.
translation: 我们教他们生存的实用技巧，我们教他们如何为未知的未来做充足的准备。

original: The Sorrows could master all the wonders of the Old World. conquer the Great Basin north to south. But without God's love, they would have nothing.
translation: 悲恸部落完全可以掌握旧世界的所有奇迹，他们甚至可以征服整个大盆地。但是如果没有上帝的爱，他们将一无所有。
